## <a name="june-21-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1357">2019 年 6 月 21 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1357">June 21, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1358">版本 1907 (組建 11815.20002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1358">Version 1907 (build 11815.20002)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1359">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1359">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1360">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1360">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dark-mode-for-black-theme-in-outlook-desktop"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1361">Outlook 電腦版中用於黑色佈景主題的深色模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1361">Dark Mode for Black Theme in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1362">使用深色模式時，黑色佈景主題中的使用者現在也會在讀取電子郵件時看到讀取窗格具有深色背景，並在撰寫電子郵件時擁有深色背景的撰寫體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1362">With dark mode, users in black theme will now also see the reading pane with a dark background when reading emails, and the compose experience with a dark background when writing emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1363">如果使用者想要預覽郵件在淺色背景下的外觀，在讀取窗格或功能區中有太陽/月亮切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1363">There is a sun/moon toggle on the reading pane and in the ribbon in case users want to preview what the message looks like with a light background instead.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1364">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1364">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1365">開啟黑色佈景主題，深色模式預設就會處於開啟狀態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1365">Turn on black theme and dark mode will be on by default.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1366">使用月亮/太陽切換 (在讀取窗格和功能區中) 可為不在深色模式的使用者預覽郵件的外觀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1366">Use the moon/sun toggle (in the reading pane and in the ribbon) to preview what the message looks like for users not in dark mode</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1367">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1367">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1368">在深色模式中讀取電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1368">Read emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1369">如果您無法讀取某些項目，請使用讀取窗格中的太陽切換來切換為淺色背景。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1369">If you are unable to read something, use the sun toggle in the Reading Pane to switch to a light background.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1370">在深色模式中撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1370">Compose emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1371">使用功能區中的太陽切換，預覽您的郵件使用淺色背景時的外觀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1371">Preview what your message will look like with a light background by using the sun toggle in the ribbon.</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1372">如果您遇到未正確顯示的任何電子郵件，請將其 (當作附件) 傳送到 OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1372">If you encounter any emails that don't render properly, please send them (as an attachment) to OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span></span>
 
#### <a name="get-location-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1373">取得位置建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1373">Get location suggestions</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1374">開始輸入，Outlook 就會尋找符合的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1374">Start typing and Outlook will look for matching locations.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1375">建立約會和會議時，這適用於 [位置] 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1375">This applies to the Location field when creating Appointments and Meetings.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1376">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1376">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1377">在 Outlook 中的 O365 或 Outlook.com 行事曆上，建立約會或會議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1377">Create an Appointment or Meeting on an O365 or Outlook.com calendar in Outlook.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1378">按一下 [位置] 欄位，然後開始輸入…</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1378">Click into the Location field and start typing…</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1379">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1379">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1380">當您將會議室加入至會議時，按一下 [位置] 欄位，而不是使用會議室尋找工具增益集或通訊錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1380">When adding a conference room to a meeting, click into Location field, rather than using Room Finder add-in or Address Book.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1381">若是在公共場所 (如餐廳、咖啡廳，甚至是牙醫診所) 的實體位置進行會議，請嘗試使用新的選擇器找到確切的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1381">For appointments at a physical place with a public location - like a restaurant, coffee shop, or even your dentist's office - try finding the exact location using the new picker.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1382">如此一來，您將可以在該離開時，收到 Outlook Mobile 的通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1382">This way, you'll be able to get notified on Outlook Mobile when it's time to leave.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1383">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1383">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="all"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1384">全部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1384">All</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1385">我們已修正在離線時會導致搜尋方塊啟用的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1385">We fixed an issue which would keep the Search Box enabled while offline</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1386">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1386">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1387">我們已修正有時候可能難以查看鍵盤焦點的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1387">We fixed an issue where keyboard focus could sometimes be difficult to see</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1388">我們已修正貼到新文件的文字，有時候文字對齊可能會不正確的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1388">We fixed an issue where text pasted into a new document could sometimes have the wrong text alignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1389">我們已修正將使用者的電腦暫停之後，可能防止部分使用者儲存變更的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1389">We fixed an issue which could prevent some users from saving changes after suspending their computer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1390">我們已修正在某些情況下會列印整份文件，而非所選範圍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1390">We fixed an issue where in certain cases an entire document would be printed instead of the selected range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1391">我們已修正可能會讓註解在較小型的顯示器上難以閱讀的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1391">We fixed an issue which could make comments difficult to read on smaller displays</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1392">我們已修正擷取到裝置時可能會造成當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1392">We fixed an issue which could cause a crash when capturing to a device</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1393">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1393">Excel</span></span>

## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1406">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1406">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1407">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1407">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1408">我們已修正了儲存到 OneDrive 時，使用者可能無法登入的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1408">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from signing in when saving to OneDrive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1409">我們已修正了使用者可能無法變更限制存取模式中之 SharePoint 內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1409">We fixed an issue where a user could be prevented from changing SharePoint properties while in restricted access mode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1410">我們已修正了調整邊界時，可能會變更頁首及頁尾內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1410">We fixed an issue where header and footer content could change when adjusting margins</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1411">我們已修正了切換成網頁檢視時，格式設定可能會中斷的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1411">We fixed an issue where formatting could break when switching to web view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1412">我們已修正了從 SharePoint 開啟時，使用者無法使用自訂欄位的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1412">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from using custom fields when opened from SharePoint</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1413">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1413">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1414">我們已修正了刪除篩選集之資料列時的效能問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1414">We fixed a performance issue when deleting rows of a filtered set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1415">我們已修正了有時可能會造成滑鼠在受保護檢視模式中閃爍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1415">We fixed an issue which could sometimes cause the mouse to flicker in protected view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1416">我們修正了刪除系列時，可能會導致當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1416">We fixed an issue which could have caused a crash when deleting a series</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1417">我們已修正了某些使用者即使在沒有提供的情況下，仍舊有新增版本歷程記錄之選項的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1417">We fixed an issue where some users would have the option to add version history when that was not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1418">我們已修正了使用試算表比較工具時，可能導致例外狀況的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1418">We fixed an issue which could have caused an exception when using the Spreadsheet Compare tool</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1419">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1419">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1420">我們已修正了按一下連結到 SharePoint 時，可能會發生當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1420">We fixed an issue where a crash could occur when clicking a link to SharePoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1421">我們已修正了使用 Surface 手寫筆輸入時，可能將使用者切換到下一個頁面的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1421">We fixed an issue which could switch the user to the next page while typing using a Surface Pen</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1422">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1422">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1423">我們已修正了在某些情況下 [收件者] 欄位大於正常的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1423">We fixed an issue where in some cases the To field was larger than normal</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1424">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1424">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1425">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1425">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1426">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1426">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1434">我們已修正在 Adobe Illustrator 中所建立之向量影像無法正確顯示的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1434">We fixed an issue where vector-based images created in Adobe Illustrator would not display correctly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1439">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1439">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1440">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1440">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1446">我們已修正從舊版本中開啟專案時顯示的完成百分比值可能有誤的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1446">We fixed an issue where Percentage Complete values could be wrong when opening a project from an earlier version</span></span>

## <a name="may-31-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1447">2019 年 5 月 31 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1447">May 31, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1448">版本 1906 (組建 11722.20008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1448">Version 1906 (build 11722.20008)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1449">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1449">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1450">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1450">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dialog-for-contacting-support-now-is-dockable-and-appears-on-the-right"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1451">[連絡支援人員] 對話方塊現在可停駐，且會顯示在右側</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1451">Dialog for Contacting Support now is dockable and appears on the right</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1452">用於 [連絡支援人員] 的對話方塊現在會顯示在右側窗格中，並且會以停駐視窗形式開始。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1452">The dialog used for Contacting support will now appear in a pane on the right and will start off as a docked window.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="ink-in-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1453">在您的電子郵件中使用筆跡！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1453">Ink in Your Email!</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1454">您現在可以在您的 Outlook 電子郵件中繪製圖片並加上註釋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1454">You can now draw and annotate pictures in your Outlook emails.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1455">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1455">Word</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-document-links-in-word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1456">在 Word 中開啟文件連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1456">Open document links in Word</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1457">當您在 Office 中按一下文件連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 Word App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1457">When you click a document link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the Word app by default.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1458">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1458">To update your preference go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1459">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1459">Learn more: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1460">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1460">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1461">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1461">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1462">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1462">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1463">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1463">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1464">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1464">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1465">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1465">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1466">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1466">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1467">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1467">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1468">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 Word 文件的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1468">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link tot a Word document stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1469">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1469">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1470">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1470">PowerPoint</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-presentation-links-in-powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1471">在 PowerPoint 中開啟簡報連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1471">Open presentation links in PowerPoint</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1472">當您在 Office 中按一下連結連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 PowerPoint App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1472">When you click a presentation link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the PowerPoint app by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1473">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1473">To update your preference go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1474">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1474">Learn more: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1475">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1475">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1476">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1476">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1477">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1477">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1478">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1478">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1479">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1479">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1480">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1480">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1481">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1481">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1482">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1482">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1483">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 PowerPoint 簡報的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1483">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link to a PowerPoint presentation stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1484">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1484">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1485">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1485">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-workbook-links-in-excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1486">在 Excel 中開啟活頁簿連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1486">Open workbook links in Excel</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1491">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1491">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1492">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1492">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1495">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1495">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1496">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1496">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1497">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1497">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1498">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 Excel 活頁簿的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1498">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link to an Excel workbook stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1499">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1499">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1500">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1500">Notable Fixes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1502">我們已修正即使在已停用自動儲存的情況下，檔案有時會自動儲存的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1502">We fixed an issue where files could sometimes be auto-saved even when auto-save was disabled</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1507">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1507">PowerPoint</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1509">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1509">Outlook</span></span>

## <a name="may-17-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1538">2019 年 5 月 17 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1538">May 17, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1539">版本 1906 (組建 11708.20006)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1539">Version 1906 (build 11708.20006)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1540">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1540">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1541">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1541">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="user-experience-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1542">使用者體驗更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1542">User Experience Updates</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1543">[即將推出] 中的更新現已發佈，其中包括簡化功能區、資料夾窗格的新版視覺效果、郵件清單，以及讀取窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1543">Updates that have been in Coming Soon are now here, featuring the Simplified Ribbon, and a visual refresh of the folder pane, message list, and reading pane.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1544">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1544">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1545">這些變更會成為新的預設 UI。自 12 月中旬起，即可透過 [即將推出] 開關切換使用這套 UI，協助您徹底發揮生產力</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1545">These change will be part of the new default UI; it has been available behind the Coming Soon switch since mid Dec for 100% prod</span></span>
 
#### <a name="customizable-simplified-ribbon"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1546">自訂簡化功能區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1546">Customizable Simplified Ribbon</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1547">提供輕鬆自訂功能，方便在傳統與 [簡化] 檢視之間切換，以及釘選/取消釘選命令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1547">Easily customizable to switch between classic and Simplified views and pin/unpin commands.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1548">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1548">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1549">使用者可以使用簡化功能區，方法是開啟 [即將推出] (在一開始)，然後按一下功能區中的＞形箭號，即可在傳統的多行功能區與新式的簡化單行功能區之間切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1549">Users can get to the simplified ribbon by turning on Coming Soon (initially) and clicking the chevron in the ribbon to toggle between the classic multi-line ribbon and the new simplified single-line ribbon.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1550">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1550">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1551">從傳統功能區切換到簡化功能區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1551">Switch from Classic ribbon to Simplified ribbon</span></span>
 
#### <a name="pick-your-favorite-action"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1552">挑選您的最愛動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1552">Pick your favorite action</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1553">不使用 [標幟] 和 [刪除] 嗎？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1553">Don't use Flag and Delete?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1554">那麼 [封存] 或 [標示為已讀取] 呢？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1554">How about Archive or Mark as Read?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1555">自訂快速動作功能表，加上您最常使用的命令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1555">Customize the quick action menu with the commands you use most.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1556">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1556">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1557">若要選取 [快速動作]，請以滑鼠右鍵按一下郵件清單中的 [電子郵件]，以顯示內容功能表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1557">To select your Quick Actions, right click on an email in the message list to bring up the Context Menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1558">然後按一下 [設定快速動作...]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1558">Then click "Set Quick Actions..."</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1559">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1559">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1560">將 [標幟] 和 [刪除] 的預設值變更為 [封存]、[移動]、[標示為已讀取] 或 [無]，以便清除郵件清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1560">Change the defaults from flag and delete to either archive, move,  mark as read, or none for a cleaner message list</span></span>
 
#### <a name="relaxed-or-tighter-layout-you-choose"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1561">寬鬆或緊密的版面配置？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1561">Relaxed or tighter layout?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1562">由您選擇</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1562">You choose</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1563">若您想讓郵件之間能有更多空間，可以採用「緊密間距」；或者，您也可以採用緊密的版面配置，以便查看更多郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1563">Use Tighter Spacing lets you decide if you want more space between items, or a tighter layout to see more.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1564">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1564">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1565">前往 [檢視] 索引標籤，勾選 [更緊密的間距] 核取方塊。若是使用傳統功能區，該核取方塊位於「郵件」群組內；若是使用簡化功能區，則是位於「目前檢視」設定當中</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1565">View tab, use tighter spacing checkbox - in Messages group for classic ribbon, Current View settings for simplified ribbon</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1566">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1566">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1567">使用 Outlook 在未啟用設定的情況下分類及撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1567">Use Outlook to triage and write email with and without the setting enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1568">如果開啟 [使用更緊密的間距]，即可讓每個頁面能夠容納得下更多郵件，並讓撰寫表單的控制項更為簡潔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1568">With Use tighter spacing on, more messages fit per page, and controls on the compose forms are more streamlined.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dedupe-mru-entries-when-using-the-onedrive-sync-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1569">使用 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端時的刪除重複資料 MRU 項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1569">Dedupe MRU entries when using the Onedrive sync client</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1570">透過刪除重複資料 MRU 項目，改善 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端與雲端附件的整合度並加快附加速度，讓其速度足以媲美同步處理資料的複製行為</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1570">Enable better integration with onedrive sync client with cloud attachments by deduping the mru entries and to enable faster attach as copy behavior for synchronized data</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1571">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1571">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1572">若您使用的是 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端，將再也看不到「附加檔案 MRU」的檔案重複項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1572">If you use the OneDrive sync client, you will no longer see file duplicates in the Attach File MRU.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1573">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1573">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1574">啟用 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端，並使用 Outlook 電腦版的 [附加檔案] 功能表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1574">Enable the OneDrive sync client and use the Attach File menu in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
#### <a name="improved-shared-folder-synchronization-for-mailboxes-with-many-folders"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1575">已改善擁有多個資料夾的信箱共用資料夾同步處理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1575">Improved shared folder synchronization for mailboxes with many folders</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1576">Outlook 多年來在同步共用信箱時，其資料夾的數量限制最多為 500 個。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1576">For years Outlook has been limited to a maximum of 500 folders when synchronizing shared mailboxes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1577">透過這項變更已讓 Outlook 獲得改善，您在同步時將不會再遇到這 500 個資料夾的數量限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1577">With this change Outlook has been improved to sync in a way that will no longer encounter this 500 folder limit.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1578">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1578">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1579">在信箱中新增 1000 個資料夾、讓其他人存取信箱、新增「其他人」的 Outlook 設定檔，然後確認同步處理是否可正常運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1579">Create 1000 folders in a mailbox, give someone else access to the mailbox, create an Outlook profile for the "someone else" and verify that sync works.</span></span>

Select the Eraser dropdown.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1584">選擇 [小型橡皮擦] 或 [中型橡皮擦]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1584">Choose Small Eraser or Medium Eraser.</span></span>

## <a name="new-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1655">新功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1655">New Features</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1656">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1656">Outlook</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1657">**共用行事曆更新的速度更快：** 針對 Office 365 中的共用行事曆，Outlook 可以使用 REST API 更新這些行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1657">**Shared calendar updates just got faster:** For shared calendars in Office 365, Outlook can update these calendars using the REST API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1658">開啟預覽以更快且更可靠地更新共用行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1658">Turn on the preview for faster and more reliable updates to shared calendars.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1659">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1659">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="coauthoring-improvements"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1660">共同撰寫的增強功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1660">Coauthoring improvements</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1661">改善共同撰寫的體驗，盡可能讓其他人即時收到修改過的內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1661">Improved the coauthoring experience by making it more likely that content changes will be received by others in real time.</span></span>
 
### <a name="visio"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1662">Visio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1662">Visio</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1663">**從 Power BI 匯出 Visio 視覺效果：** 當匯出 Power BI 報表為 PDF 或 PowerPoint 等更多檔案時，Power BI Visio 視覺效果會正常顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1663">**Export Visio visuals from Power BI:** Visio Visual for Power BI will now display properly when you export Power BI reports as PDFs, PowerPoint files, and more.</span></span>

## <a name="april-19-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1678">2019 年 4 月 19 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1678">April 19, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1679">版本 1905 (組建 11609.20002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1679">Version 1905 (build 11609.20002)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1680">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1680">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1681">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1681">Outlook</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1682">**搜尋人員時取得電子郵件建議：** 當您在 [搜尋] 方塊中輸入人員的名稱時，最相關的電子郵件訊息會包括在您的搜尋建議中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1682">**Get email suggestions when you search for a person:** When you type a person's name in the Search box, the most relevant email messages will be included with your search suggestions.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1683">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1683">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="improved-filled-maps-experience-using-data-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1684">使用資料類型改善區域分布圖體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1684">Improved Filled Maps experience using Data Types</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1685">此功能是針對使用 Excel 的地理資料類型繪製區域分布圖圖表使用者的增強功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1685">This feature is an improvement for users who plot Filled Map Charts using Excel's Geographic Data Types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1686">對使用者的優點是功能之間有更豐富的整合，以及使用者要對應的區域會有更好的精確度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1686">The benefit to the end users will be richer integration between the features and better accuracy of the region the end user wants to map.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1687">其他優點包括功能能夠對應城市多邊形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1687">Additional benefits include - ability to map city polygons.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1688">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1688">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1689">此功能是 Excel 內現有功能的增強功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1689">This feature is an improvement to the existing features within Excel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1690">若要使用增強功能，請將位置轉換為豐富的實體，並使用區域分布圖繪製。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1690">To use the improvement - convert locations into Rich Entities and plot with Filled Maps.</span></span> 
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1691">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1691">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1692">使用者可以嘗試對應城市、省/市、縣/市、國家/地區和郵遞區號。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1692">Users can try mapping cities, states, counties, countries and zip codes.</span></span>

## <a name="april-5-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1740">2019 年 4 月 5 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1740">April 5, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1741">版本 1904 (組建 11527.20014)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1741">Version 1904 (build 11527.20014)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1742">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1742">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1743">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1743">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="outlook-for-windows--set-and-share-your-focused-inbox-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1744">Windows 版 Outlook：設定並共用您的 [焦點收件匣] 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1744">Outlook for Windows:  set and share your Focused Inbox settings</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1745">[焦點收件匣] 喜好設定會儲存在雲端內，因此當您在任何電腦上使用 Windows 版 Outlook 和 Outlook 網頁版時，都可以取得相同的一致體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1745">Your Focused Inbox preferences are stored in the cloud so you can enjoy the same consistent experience when using Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web on any computer.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1746">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1746">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1747">在 [檔案] > [選項] > [一般] 索引標籤下，還有一個名為 [將我的 Outlook 設定儲存在雲端中] 的新喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1747">Under File > Options > General tab, there is a new preference for 'Store my Outlook settings in the cloud'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1748">使用者需要核取方塊，才能讓他們的 [焦點收件匣] 設定漫遊到其他電腦的 Outlook 安裝和 OWA。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1748">Users will need to check the box to enable their Focused Inbox setting to roam to other Desktop Outlook installations and OWA.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1749">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1749">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1750">在已開啟雲端設定喜好設定的電腦上變更 [焦點收件匣]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1750">Change Focused Inbox on the machine that has cloud settings preference turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1751">瀏覽至 OWA，然後查看那裡也同樣套用了喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1751">Navigate to OWA and see the preference applied there as well.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1752">在 OWA 變更 [焦點收件匣]，然後啟動電腦版 Outlook 查看已反映喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1752">Change Focused Inbox in OWA and start Desktop Outlook to see the preference reflected.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1753">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1753">Word</span></span>
 
#### <a name="learning-tools-mode-has-additional-support-for-more-page-colors"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1754">[學習工具] 模式額外支援更多頁面色彩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1754">Learning Tools mode has additional support for more page colors</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1755">Word 中的 [學習工具] 新增更多頁面佈景主題色彩的支援，讓您能夠變更頁面的背景色彩。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1755">Learning Tools in Word adds support for more page theme colors, which allows the changing of the background color of the page.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1756">許多人在背景全白或全黑時閱讀會有困難，因此我們在 PC 版和 Mac 版 Word 中擴大了色彩選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1756">Many people have challenges reading with an all-white or all-black background, so we've expanded the choice of colors in Word on PC and Mac.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1757">快速入門：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1757">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1758">若要試用，請移至 [檢視] 索引標籤，選擇 [學習工具]，然後選擇 [頁面色彩]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1758">To try this out, go to the View tab and choose Learning Tools, and then Page Color.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1759">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1759">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1760">若要試用，請移至 [檢視] 索引標籤，選擇 [學習工具]，然後選擇 [頁面色彩]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1760">To try this out, go to the View tab and choose Learning Tools, and then Page Color.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1761">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1761">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="elevate-creativity-with-animated-3d-models"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1762">以具備動畫效果的 3D 模型提高創意</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1762">Elevate Creativity with Animated 3D Models</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1763">Office 現在支援動畫模型，這類模型能在編輯器中播放，讓您的試算表更生動！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1763">Office now supports animated models, which will playback in the editor so you can bring your sheets to life!</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1764">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1764">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1765">開啟 Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1765">Open Excel</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1766">插入具備動畫效果的 3D 模型 (很快會進到 Remix，但現在請在此位置存取動畫模型：\\osan\ogx\Public\TestFiles\3D Models\Animated3D\C3Art)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1766">Insert an animated 3D Model (coming to Remix soon, but for now, access animated models here: \\osan\ogx\Public\TestFiles\3D Models\Animated3D\C3Art)</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1767">動畫模型會在編輯器中播放！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1767">The animated model will play in the editor!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1768">[檢查投影片放映] 模式 - 動畫模型也會在那裡播放！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1768">Check Slideshow mode - it will play there too!</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1769">在 3D 格式功能區中，探索模型中更多的動畫場景</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1769">In the 3D Format Ribbon, explore more animation scenes in the model</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1770">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1770">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1771">插入動畫模型，然後看它在編輯器中播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1771">Insert an animated model and watch it play in the editor</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1772">透過 3D 格式功能區中的 [場景庫]，探索動畫模型中可用的動畫場景</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1772">Explore the animation scenes available in the animated model via the Scenes Gallery, available in the 3D Format Ribbon</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1773">透過功能區、浮動工具列或空格鍵輕鬆地播放/暫停動畫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1773">Easily play/pause the animation via the ribbon, floatie or space bar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1795">我們已修正當撰寫 html 電子郵件時的當地語系化問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1795">We fixed a localization issue when composing html e-mails</span></span>

## <a name="march-22-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1801">2019 年 3 月 22 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1801">March 22, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1802">版本 1904 (組建 11514.20004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1802">Version 1904 (build 11514.20004)</span></span>
 
## <a name="new-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1803">新功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1803">New Features</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1804">**隱私權控制：** 用於診斷資料和連線體驗的新增、更新及改良的控制項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1804">**Privacy controls:** New, updated, and improved controls for diagnostic data and connected experiences.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1805">深入了解 <https://docs.microsoft.com/DeployOffice/privacy/overview-privacy-controls?toc=/deployoffice/toc.json></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1805">Learn more <https://docs.microsoft.com/DeployOffice/privacy/overview-privacy-controls?toc=/deployoffice/toc.json></span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1806">**Office 圖示有新的外觀：** Office 圖示經過重新設計，以反映簡單、功能強大且智慧型的 Office 體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1806">**Office icons have a new look:** The Office icons have been redesigned to reflect simple, powerful, and intelligent Office experiences.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1807">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1807">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1808">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1808">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1809">我們已修正 UI 經常會顯示「正在檢查變更」的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1809">We fixed an issue where the UI would constantly display "Checking for Changes"</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1810">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1810">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1811">我們已修正應用程式可能在移動工作表之後當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1811">We fixed an issue where the application could crash after moving a worksheet</span></span>

### <a name="morph-transition-enhancements---morph-by-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1922">轉化轉場增強效果 - 依名稱轉化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1922">Morph Transition Enhancements - Morph by Name</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1923">選取要轉化的圖形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1923">Specify the shapes you want to morph</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1924">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1924">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1925">若要使轉化將兩個物件視為同一個物件，使用者可以使用 [選取窗格] 重新命名圖形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1925">To get Morph to treat two objects as the same object, the user can rename the shapes using the Selection Pane.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1926">名稱前面必須加上「!!」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1926">The name must be prefaced with "!!"</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1927">(兩個半形驚嘆號)，轉化才能用來覆寫預設比對行為，例如「!!名稱」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1927">(two exclamation points) for Morph to use it to override our default matching behavior, e.g. "!!Name"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1928">使用者可以繼續將圖形重新命名為不是以「!!」為開頭的任何名稱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1928">Users can continue to rename shapes with any name that doesn't start with "!!"</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1929">不必擔心會變更轉化的運作方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1929">without worrying that it will change the way Morph works</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1930">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1930">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1931">在投影片中插入圖形，讓我們假設是矩形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1931">Insert a Shape in a slide, let's say Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1932">建立新投影片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1932">Create a new slide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1933">在第 2 張投影片中插入不同的圖形，讓我們假設是三角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1933">Insert a different shape in the 2nd slide, let's say Triangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1934">開啟 [選取窗格]，將投影片 1 中的矩形重新命名為「!!圖形」，將投影片 2 中的三角形重新命名為「!!圖形」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1934">Open SelectionPane, rename the Rectangle in slide 1 to "!!shape", and rename the Triangle in slide 2 to "!!shape"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-1935">將 [轉化] 套用至第 2 張投影片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-1935">Apply Morph on the 2nd slide</span></span>
 
</BR>

# <a name="release-notes-for-office-insiders"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2017">Office 測試人員的版本資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2017">Release Notes for Office Insiders</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2018">本文包含 Windows 電腦版 Word、Excel、PowerPoint、Outlook、Access 和 Project 測試人員組建的版本資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2018">This article contains release notes for Insider builds of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Access, and Project for Windows desktop.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2019">我們每週都會強調有趣的新功能、重要修正，以及我們想讓您知道的重大問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2019">Every week, we'll highlight interesting new features, important fixes, and any significant issues we want you to know about.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2020">請注意，我們在一段時間內會經常推出新功能 (某些時候還有修正) 給測試人員。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2020">Note that we often roll out features (and sometimes even fixes) to Insiders over a period of time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2021">這樣可讓我們確保功能都運作順利，然後才推出給更廣泛的對象。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2021">This allows us to ensure that things are working smoothly before releasing the feature to a wider audience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2022">因此，如果您沒有在以下描述的內容中看到某些項目，請不用擔心，您最終還是會看到它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2022">So, if you don't see something described below, don't worry you'll get it eventually.</span></span>  

> [!IMPORTANT]
> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2023">我們會變更 Microsoft 365 應用程式的更新通道，包括新增新的更新通道 (每月企業通道)，並變更現有的更新通道名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2023">We’re making some changes to the update channels for Microsoft 365 Apps, including adding a new update channel (Monthly Enterprise Channel) and changing the names of the existing update channels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2024">如需深入了解，[請閱讀本文](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2127441)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2024">To learn more, [read this article](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2127441).</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> - <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2025">版本資訊會每週發佈，可能是多個組建的編譯。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2025">Release notes are posted weekly and may be a compilation of multiple builds.</span></span>
> - <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2026">版本資訊發佈日期可能與實際組建發行日期不相符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2026">The release notes publication date may not match the actual build release date.</span></span>

## <a name="version2006may29"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2029">版本2006：5月29日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2029">Version 2006: May 29</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2030">*版本2006（組建12920.20000）*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2030">*Version 2006 (Build 12920.20000)*</span></span>

### <a name="featureupdates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2031">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2031">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2032">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2032">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2033">**新增至 Outlook toast 通知的其他按鈕：** 快速動作按鈕現在會出現在 Windows 10 上執行 Outlook 的 Outlook toast 通知中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2033">**Additional buttons added to Outlook toast notifications:** Quick Action buttons now appear in Outlook toast notifications when running Outlook on Windows 10.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2034">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2034">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2035">**改進 PowerPoint 中的資料流程影片效能：** 我們已改進 Microsoft Stream 影片的播放效能，以盡可能縮短影片載入時間，並產生流暢的觀賞體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2035">**Improved Stream video performance in PowerPoint:** We've made improvements to the playback performance of Microsoft Stream videos to minimize video loading time and create a smooth viewing experience.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2036">使用 Microsoft Stream 的公司影片來建立更佳的簡報。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2036">Use your corporate videos from Microsoft Stream to create better presentations.</span></span>

### <a name="resolvedissues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2039">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2039">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2040">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2040">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2041">我們已修復此問題：在使用 OneDrive 時，Excel 會不時關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2041">We fixed an issue where Excel would occasionally shut down when engaging OneDrive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2042">我們已修復此問題：按一下相同活頁簿中的已加書簽的超連結時，將會隱藏該活頁簿。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2042">We fixed an issue where clicking a bookmarked hyperlink within the same workbook would cause the workbook to be hidden.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2043">已修正此問題：某些複本和貼上的圖表連結使用對應的磁片磁碟機位址，而不是通用位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2043">We fixed an issue where some copy and pasted chart links used mapped drive addresses rather than universal addresses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2044">我們已修復此問題：在使用 Ctrl + Shift + 箭號鍵以在 Excel 視窗透過團隊共用時，Excel 可能會變得無回應。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2044">We fixed an issue where Excel could become unresponsive after using Ctrl+Shift+Arrow keys to scroll when the Excel window was shared through Teams.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2045">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2045">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2046">我們修正了在使用滑鼠滾輪縮放後，投影片未居中的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2046">We fixed an issue where slides were not centered after zooming using the mouse wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2047">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2047">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2048">我們已修復此問題：將文字複製並貼到批註窗格時，不會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2048">We fixed an issue where copy and pasting text to a comment pane would not be displayed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2049">我們已修正此問題：批註提示氣泡在100% 縮放顯示時會出現模糊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2049">We fixed an issue where comment hint bubbles appeared blurry at 100% zoom.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2050">我們已修復此問題：啟用原則 Word 2007 和更新版本的二進位檔案和範本會導致一些共同撰寫案例失敗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2050">We fixed an issue where enabling policy Word 2007 and later Binary Documents and Templates would cause some co-authoring cases to fail.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2051">我們已修復此問題：不會開啟具有長路徑名稱（大於32K）的檔案，也不會顯示適當的錯誤訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2051">We fixed an issue where files with long path names (greater than 32K) would not open and an appropriate error message was not being displayed.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2056">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2056">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2057">**儲存至固定資料夾：** 固定資料夾可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Office 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2057">**Save to Pinned Folders:** Pin your folders makes saving Office files easier.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2058">我們收到意見反應，讓使用者在儲存新檔案時，更能控制可使用的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2058">We received feedback that users want more control over the folders available when a new file is saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2059">我們非常高興可為您提供新功能：在 [儲存] 對話方塊中固定您的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2059">We're excited to bring a new capability to you: pin your folders in the Save dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2060">這項新功能可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Word、Excel 及 PowerPoint 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2060">This new capability will make saving your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files easier.</span></span><br /><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2061">在[部落格文章](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)中查看詳細資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2061">See details in [blog post](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2062">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2062">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2063">**儲存至固定資料夾：** 固定資料夾可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Office 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2063">**Save to Pinned Folders:** Pin your folders makes saving Office files easier.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2064">我們收到意見反應，讓使用者在儲存新檔案時，更能控制可使用的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2064">We received feedback that users want more control over the folders available when a new file is saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2065">我們非常高興可為您提供新功能：在 [儲存] 對話方塊中固定您的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2065">We're excited to bring a new capability to you: pin your folders in the Save dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2066">這項新功能可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Word、Excel 及 PowerPoint 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2066">This new capability will make saving your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files easier.</span></span><br /><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2067">在[部落格文章](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)中查看詳細資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2067">See details in [blog post](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2076">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2076">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2077">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2077">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2078">我們修正了錯誤訊息：「另一個使用者目前無法關閉此活頁簿」，因為增益集是以字母順序，而不是以使用者指定的順序載入，所以會出現此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2078">We fixed an issue where the error message: “This workbook is currently referenced by another and cannot be closed” would appear because Add-ins were being loaded in alphabetical order rather than in a user specified order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2079">我們已修正此問題：在 Excel 與部分協力廠商的輔助技術應用程式之間管理字體時，記憶體遭到損毀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2079">We fixed an issue where memory was being corrupted when managing fonts between Excel and some third party assistive technology applications.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2080">我們已修復此問題：當增益集要求包含具有 noSelect 鎖定之圖形的工作表上的主項目目時，Excel 會損毀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2080">We fixed an issue where Excel would crash when Add-ins ask for Host Items on worksheets that contain shapes with noSelect locks.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2081">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2081">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2082">已修正此問題：當使用者在資料夾之間移動專案時，未能正確地激發 BeforeItemMove 事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2082">We fixed an issue where the Folder.BeforeItemMove event didn't fire correctly when a user moved items between folders.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2083">我們已修復此問題：使用者看到跨越午夜臨界值的行事曆專案，視為全天事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2083">We fixed an issue where users saw calendar items that spanned the midnight threshold as All day events.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2084">我們已修復此問題：當兩個增益集將按鈕新增至功能區中的相同群組時，Outlook 會當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2084">We fixed an issue where Outlook crashed when two Add-ins added a button to the same group in the ribbon.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2085">我們修正了使用者無法與來賓使用者共用行事曆的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2085">We fixed an issue where users were unable to share a calendar with a guest user.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2086">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2086">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2087">我們修正了簡報區域的放大和縮小導致縮放選取專案選取範圍與滑鼠指標之間的間隙。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2087">We fixed an issue where zooming in and out from the presentation area resulted in a gap between the zoomed selection marquee and the mouse pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2088">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2088">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2089">已修正此問題：在按一下 [選項] 後，Project 會損毀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2089">We fixed an issue where Project would crash after clicking on Options.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2090">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2090">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2091">我們已修正問題：批註中的超連結無法運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2091">We fixed an issue where hyperlinks in comments weren’t working.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2092">我們修正了簡報區域的放大和縮小導致縮放選取專案選取範圍與滑鼠指標之間的間隙。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2092">We fixed an issue where zooming in and out from the presentation area resulted in a gap between the zoomed selection marquee and the mouse pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2093">我們已修正此問題：在行事曆 WordMail 中粘貼 HTML 時無法運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2093">We fixed an issue where pasting HTML into WordMail for Calendar wasn’t working.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2094">我們已修復此問題：回復共同撰寫的會話中的批註有時會導致 Word 凍結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2094">We fixed an issue where replying to a comment in a co-authored session could sometimes cause Word to freeze.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2114">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2114">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2115">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2115">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2116">我們修正了在使用者刪除合併欄時，改善使用者效能的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2116">We fixed an issue that resulted in improved performance time for users when they deleted merged columns.</span></span>
- <div><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2117">我們修正了導致印表機名稱重複出現在可用印表機清單中的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2117">We fixed an issue that caused printer names to be duplicated in the list of available printers.</span></span></div>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2118">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2118">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2119">我們已修復此問題：使用英文（QWERTZ）鍵盤時，鍵盤快速鍵和拼寫檢查不會如預期的方式運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2119">We fixed an issue where keyboard shortcuts and spell check wouldn’t function as expected when using an English Switzerland (QWERTZ) keyboard.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2120">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2120">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2121">我們已修復此問題：在空白檔上新增批註時，不會執行任何動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2121">We fixed an issue where adding a new comment on a blank document wouldn't do anything.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2122">我們已修復此問題：在包含一百個專案的檔中插入或更新索引時，會導致應用程式當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2122">We fixed an issue where inserting or updating an Index in a document containing more than a hundred entries would result in the application crashing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2123">我們已修復此問題：自訂 xml 值開啟的檔案非常緩慢。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2123">We fixed an issue where files with custom xml values opened extremely slowly.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2124">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2124">Office Suite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2125">我們已在 Visual Basic for Applications 中修正了 Microsoft Office 中的問題，在此情況下，Office 應用程式會在載入時，由 Office 應用程式查看包含對文件庫名稱或文件庫路徑中之 DBCS 字元的程式碼庫參考的某些 VBA 專案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2125">We fixed an issue in Visual Basic for Applications in Microsoft Office where certain VBA projects that contain references to code libraries with DBCS characters in the library name or library path would be viewed by the Office application as corrupt on load.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2159">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2159">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2160">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2160">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2161">修正圖表資料表無法正確呈現日期座標軸中的值的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2161">Fixed an issue where chart data table could render values in a date axis incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2162">修正使用 [頁面配置] 或 [分頁預覽] 之後無法停用分頁符號的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2162">Fixed an issue where page breaks could not be disabled after going into Page Layout or Page Break Preview.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2163">修正隱藏和取消隱藏具有系列資料的欄之後，圖表線條樣式可能會遺失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2163">Fixed an issue where chart line styles could be lost after hiding and unhiding columns with series data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2164">在已篩選清單中插入欄的時間會比預期更長。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2164">Inserting a column in a filtered list would take longer than expected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2165">當您使用舊版的「共用活頁簿」模式，嘗試為活頁簿的新工作表列出變更時，就會發生當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2165">A crash could occur when trying to list changes on a new sheet for a workbook using legacy "Shared Workbook" mode.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2166">修正啟用 [負值以補色顯示] 選項後，可能無法儲存樞紐分析表中的自訂格式設定的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2166">Fixed the issue where custom formatting in Pivot charts may not be saved when the "Invert if negative" option was enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2167">修正如果選取 [負值以補色顯示] 選項，可能無法儲存樞紐分析表中單一資料點的自訂格式設定的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2167">Fixed an issue where custom formatting for a single data point in a Pivot chart was not saved if the "Invert if negative" option was selected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2168">這項變更修正在 CSV 檔案中上傳 '@' 字元時，會導致將 '@' 字元之後的字串轉換成公式的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2168">This change fixes an issue where the '@' character uploaded in a CSV file, would result in the string after the '@' character to be converted to a formula.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2169">修正無法正確捨入 SEQUENCE 函數中十進位值的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2169">Fixed an issue where decimal values in the SEQUENCE function were not rounded correctly.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2170">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2170">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2171">解決導致使用者在 Outlook 桌面用戶端中按一下非常長的安全連結時，由於截斷而無法載入的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2171">Addresses an issue that caused very long safelinks that users clicked on in the Outlook Desktop client to fail to load due to truncation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2172">修正當與伺服器同步處理時，名稱中包含 DBCS (雙位元組字元集) 字元的 Outlook 資料夾會間斷消失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2172">Fixed an issue where Outlook folders with names containing DBCS (Double Byte Character Set) characters would intermittently disappear when synchronizing with the server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2173">為此，必須為 Outlook 設定 IMAP 帳戶，並在地區設定設定為日文的系統上執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2173">For this to happen, Outlook had to be configured with an IMAP account and running on a system with the locale set to Japanese.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2174">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2174">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2175">已修正問題：如果使用者建立了註解，但未張貼就關閉 [註解] 窗格，然後開啟新視窗、瀏覽多張投影片並關閉視窗，最後再開啟原始簡報中的 [註解] 窗格，將導致無法使用草稿註解。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2175">Fixed an issue where if a user created a comment without posting it and closed the Comments pane, then opened a new window, navigated through multiple slides and, closed the window, and finally re-opened the Comments pane in the original presentation, the draft comments would not be available.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2176">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2176">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2177">修正問題：如果 Project 連線至 Project Web App，且小數分隔符號是逗號，當新增延遲時，TaskDependencies Add 方法會失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2177">Fixed an issue where if Project is connected to the Project Web App and the decimal separator is a comma, TaskDependencies Add method fails when Lag is added.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2178">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2178">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2179">修正在 [共同作業] 模式時，在文件中插入註解並不總是成功的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2179">Fixed an issue where inserting comments on a document in collaboration mode would not always work.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2180">此變更修正在按一下 @ 提及時，[人員卡片] 會閃動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2180">This change fixes an issue where the People card would flash if the @ mention was clicked.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2181">修正問題：關閉具有草稿註解的文件時，會在不儲存草稿註解的情況下，提示使用者是否要關閉文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2181">Fixed the issue where closing a document with draft comments would prompt the user if they wanted to close the document without saving the draft comments.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2182">取消提示會關閉文件，而不是保持文件開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2182">Cancelling the prompt would close the document rather than leaving it open.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2183">修正翻譯已張貼註解將導致「插入已翻譯的文字失敗」錯誤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2183">Fixed an issue where translating a posted comment would result in the error "Inserting translated text failed".</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2184">在 Web 檢視/沉浸式閱讀器中，如果已在檢視中，按一下提示會捲動到最上方。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2184">In Web View/Immersive reader, clicking on a hint would scroll to the top even though it was already in view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2185">已修正這個問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2185">This has been fixed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2186">我們已修正一個問題，當嘗試使用新名稱儲存包含巨集的檔案時，無論使用者輸入什麼名稱，都會導致該檔案以.docx 副檔名和檔案名稱 WRO0004.docx 儲存，進而導致文件無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2186">We fixed an issue that, when attempting to save a file containing a macro under a new name, would cause it to be saved with .docx extension and the filename WRO0004.docx, regardless of what the user entered, rendering the document unusable.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2192">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2192">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2193">這項變更修正了即使 LINEST 函式傳回正確的值，圖表趨勢線的 R 平方值 (在強制 y 截距的情況下) 仍然不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2193">This change fixes an issue where the chart trendline R-Squared value (in the forced y-intercept case) was incorrect even though the LINEST function returns the correct value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2194">此變更修正了自訂圖表趨勢線格式不一定會儲存的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2194">This change fixes an issue where customized chart trendline formatting was not always being saved.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2195">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2195">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2196">修正了 Office 功能區中群組行事曆分類按鈕已停用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2196">Fixed an issue where the Categorize button for group calendars in the Office Ribbon was disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2197">修正了企業客戶沒有執行或無法使用群組資料夾的問題，該問題會導致 Outlook 顯示「沒有回應」的訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2197">Fixed an issue where enterprise customers with group folders not implemented or not working, would result in Outlook displaying a "not responding" message.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2198">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2198">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2199">修正了將滑鼠游標移到星號 (\*) 符號，但不會顯示上一次更新文件的日期和使用者姓名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2199">Fixed an issue where hovering over the asterisk (\*) symbol did not display the user name and date of the last person to update the document.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2200">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2200">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2201">啟用「顯示書簽」選項卻不會顯示書簽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2201">Enabling the option "Show bookmarks" would not display bookmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2202">已修正這個問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2202">This has been fixed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2203">此變更修正了下列問題：如果已啟用 [顯示功能變數代碼，而非其值] 選項，則含有超連結的文字可能不會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2203">This change fixes an issue where text with hyperlinks may not display if the option "Show field codes instead of their values" was enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2206">*版本 2005 (組建 12810.20002)*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2206">*Version 2005 (Build 12810.20002)*</span></span>
