### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2208">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2208">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2209">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2209">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2210">已增加搭配圖表使用的 [自訂誤差線] 對話方塊上儲存格參照 [編輯] 控制項的大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2210">Increased the size of the cell reference edit controls on the Custom Error Bars dialog used with charts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2211">在 Excel 2016 中使用數位簽章所儲存的活頁簿，會在於目前版本的 Excel 中開啟時導致簽章失效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2211">Workbooks saved with a digital signature in Excel 2016 could have the signature invalidated upon opening in the current version of Excel.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2212">修正列印時表單控制項的核取方塊縮放問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2212">Fixed a problem with the scaling of checkboxes in form controls when printed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2213">在某些情況下，Application.Evaluate (VBA) 無法在使用者定義的函數中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2213">Application.Evaluate (VBA) was not working for User-defined functions in some cases.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2214">此變更會修正設定格式化的條件 (CF) 資訊無法正確儲存到 XLSB 檔案的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2214">This change fixes an issue where conditional formatting (CF) information was not being saved to XLSB files correctly.</span></span>

### <a name="onenote"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2215">OneNote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2215">OneNote</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2216">修正將分行符號儲存為垂直 Tab 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2216">Fixed an issue where line breaks were being stored as vertical tabs.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2217">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2217">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2218">解決會導致使用者無法將個人連絡人群組新增為會議出席者的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2218">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to add a Personal Contact Group as a Meeting attendee.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2219">解決會導致還有 2 個月時間的會議，無法在排程小幫手中顯示會議主題的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2219">Addresses an issue that caused meetings that are more than 2 months away to fail to display a meeting subject in the Scheduling Assistant.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2220">解決會導致使用者在轉寄大型 HTML 郵件時看到郵件內文截斷的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2220">Addresses an issue that caused users to see message body truncation when forwarding large HTML messages.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2221">新增透過群組原則強制執行 S/MIME 預設登入設定的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2221">Added the ability to enforce S/MIME default signing configuration via group policy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2222">解決會導致為使用者主要信箱以外的信箱所建立的刪除規則變得無效的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2222">Addresses an issue that caused delete rules created for mailboxes other than the user's primary mailbox to become invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2223">解決在轉寄加密郵件時導致捨棄附件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2223">Addresses an issue that caused attachments to get dropped when forwarding an encrypted message.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2224">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2224">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2225">在表單檢視中編輯前置/後續任務資料時，會觸發額外的 ProjectBeforeTaskChange 事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2225">When Predecessor/Successor data is edited within a Form view, an extra ProjectBeforeTaskChange event is fired.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2226">修正變更連結至 SharePoint 工作清單之專案的面板狀態欄位時，Project 可能當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2226">Fixed an issue where Project may crash when changing the board status field on a project that is connected to a SharePoint task list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2227">修正儲存使用舊版 Project 建立的專案時，Project 可能當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2227">Fixed an issue where Project may crash when saving projects created with older versions of Project.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2239">**M365 進階版內容選擇器：** 讓您的文件栩栩如生！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2239">**M365 Premium Content Picker:** Bring your documents to life!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2240">探索數千個免費圖庫影像、圖示和貼圖 [深入了解](https://support.office.com/article/3c51edf4-22e1-460a-b372-9329a8724344)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2240">Explore 1000's of royalty free stock images, icons and stickers [Learn more](https://support.office.com/article/3c51edf4-22e1-460a-b372-9329a8724344)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2245">**在簡報時同步處理變更：** 即使簡報處於投影片放映模式，仍可即時同步處理所做的變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2245">**Synchronize changes while you are presenting:** Synchronize changes whenever they are made even when the presentation is in slide show mode.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2253">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2253">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2254">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2254">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2255">修正工作窗格中表格的重新調整及重新整理問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2255">Fixed issues with resizing and refreshing tables in the task pane.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2256">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2256">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2257">修正在工作表上選取儲存格範圍會導致只選取單一儲存格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2257">Fixed an issue where selecting a range of cells on a sheet would result in the selection of a single cell.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2258">修正在為含有 X 軸範圍的圖表縮減大小時，可能會導致 Excel 停止回應的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2258">Fixed an issue which could cause Excel to stop responding when reducing the size of a chart with some x-axis ranges.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2259">修正插入使用者定義的圖表範本來作為預設值會導致其儲存為直條圖的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2259">Fixed an issue where inserting a user defined chart template as default would result in saving it as a column chart.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2260">修正當基礎資料儲存格沒有標題時，圖表上的資料標籤會以空白顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2260">Fixed an issue where Data labels on charts would display as blank when the underlying data cells did not have a caption.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2261">修正已啟用 R1C1 儲存格參照且正在共同撰寫/共用的 Excel 工作表，在將游標移到 [使用者目前狀態] 圖示上方時不會以 R1C1 模式顯示作用中儲存格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2261">Fixed an issue where an Excel sheet with R1C1 cell referencing enabled and is being co-authored / shared, hovering over the user presence icon does not display the active cell reference in R1C1 mode.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2262">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2262">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2263">解決會導致類別有時候會從電子郵件訊息中消失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2263">Addresses an issue that caused categories to occasionally disappear from email messages.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2264">解決會導致代理人在不同機器上所看到的共用信箱有不同資料夾階層的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2264">Addresses an issue that caused delegates to see different folder hierarchies on different machines for shared mailboxes.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2265">解決在嘗試檢視組織表單的屬性時，會導致使用者遇到當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2265">Addresses an issue that caused users to experience a crash when attempting to view the properties of an Organizational Form.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2266">解決在變更機器上的時區時，會導致某些提醒無法觸發的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2266">Addresses an issue that caused some reminders to fail to fire when changing the timezone on a machine.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2267">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2267">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2268">此變更修正了在 PowerPoint 或 Word 中呈現內嵌為 OLE 物件的舊版 Excel 圖表時可能不會永遠顯示圖表標題的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2268">This change fixes an issue where the rendering of a legacy Excel chart embedded as an OLE object in PowerPoint or Word may not always display the chart title.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2269">我們已修正將文字從 Excel 複製到 PowerPoint 時可能會導致其格式設定發生變更的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2269">We have fixed an issue when copying text from Excel to PowerPoint might change its formatting.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2270">此變更修正了使用 [全字拼寫須相符] 來尋找特殊字元時，不一定能正常運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2270">This change fixes an issue where finding special characters using 'find whole words only' did not always work as expected.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2271">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2271">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2272">修正了當開啟保護實際工作的設定時，使用者無法輸入分時期基準工時的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2272">Fixed an issue where the user couldn't enter time-phased Baseline Work when the setting to protect actual work is on.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2273">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2273">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2274">此變更修正了將游標暫留在提示上不會醒目提示其卡片的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2274">This change fixes an issue where hovering a cursor over a hint would not highlight its card.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2275">此變更修正了使用套索選取工具時，群組圖形中的文字會暫時消失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2275">This change fixes an issue that would cause the text in grouped shapes to disappear temporarily when using the Lasso selection tool.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2276">此變更修正了在 PowerPoint 或 Word 中呈現內嵌為 OLE 物件的舊版 Excel 圖表時可能不會永遠顯示圖表標題的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2276">This change fixes an issue where the rendering of a legacy Excel chart embedded as an OLE object in PowerPoint or Word may not always display the chart title.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2277">此變更修正了在雙頁檢視中建立註解時，註解錨點不一定會顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2277">This change fixes an issue in two page view, when creating a comment, the comment anchor did not always come into view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2278">修正如果段落的樣式是連結至清單的樣式上階，則該清單的編號可能會遺失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2278">Fixed an issue where if a paragraph whose style is an ancestor of a style linked to a list, then the numbering of that list could be lost.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2290">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2290">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2291">解決了會讓 [附件工具] 中的 [儲存至雲端] 按鈕不見的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2291">Addresses an issue that caused the "Save to Cloud" button to be missing from Attachment Tools.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2292">解決了以下問題：當使用者從檢查程式視窗回覆受到數位版權管理的郵件，卻沒有所回覆郵件的擁有者權限時，使用者會無法新增簽名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2292">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to add a signature when replying to a digitally rights managed message from an inspector window when the user does not have Owner permission on the message being replied to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2293">解決了以下問題：使用者無法從網頁位置將其他附件新增到先前建立的會議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2293">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to add additional attachments from a web location to a previously created meeting.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2294">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2294">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2295">此變更修正了會導致包含 emojis 的 PowerPoint 檔案在儲存時發生失敗的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2295">This change fixes an error that could cause PowerPoint files containing emojis to fail when saving.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2296">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2296">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2297">修正了以下問題：如果執行 ' CustomFieldValueListGetItem' 且自訂欄位的查閱資料表不存在，系統會建立一個不應建立的空白查閱資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2297">Fixed an issue where if 'CustomFieldValueListGetItem' is executed and a lookup table for the custom field doesn't exist, an empty lookup table is created even though it should not be.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2298">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2298">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2299">此變更修正了以下問題：從 [檢視] 功能表選取多個頁面時，其中的 [註解] 窗格會顯示為空白。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2299">This change fixes an issue with multiple pages selected from the View menu, where the comments pane could be displayed as blank.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2305">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2305">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2306">**行事曆新版視覺效果：** 去年，我們提供了全新的郵件體驗，而今年將為您帶來嶄新的行事曆！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2306">**Calendar visual refresh:** Last year, we brought you a refreshed mail experience, and, this year, it is the calendar's turn to get a facelift!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2307">有幾項更新是新穎卻令人孰悉的，您是經驗豐富的 Outlook 使用者，可以立即使用並提高生產力。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2307">The updates are fresh but familiar so, as a seasoned Outlook user, you can jump in and be more productive right away.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2308">**協助保護群組中的資料：** 建立群組時所選擇的「敏感度」標籤會套用到群組電子郵件、文件及小組網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2308">**Help protect data in your group:** The Sensitivity label you choose when creating a group is applied to group email, documents, and team sites</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2313">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2313">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2314">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2314">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2315">此變更解決了處理格式錯誤或無效通訊協定資訊影像時所導致的延遲問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2315">This change addresses delays when processing images with malformed or invalid protocol information.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2316">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2316">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2317">此變更解決了處理格式錯誤或無效通訊協定資訊影像時所導致的延遲問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2317">This change addresses delays when processing images with malformed or invalid protocol information.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2318">此變更修正了電子郵件草稿最新變更未更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2318">This change fixes an issue where the latest changes to draft emails were not being updated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2319">已修正在檔案上按一下滑鼠右鍵並使用「傳送到」功能無法運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2319">Fixed an issue where right-mouse clicking on a file and using 'Send to' would not work.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2320">已修正如果使用者有自訂的 [通訊錄] 搜尋路徑，則 Outlook 的名稱解析範圍會限制為自訂路徑，而不是包括全域通訊清單 (GAL) 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2320">Fixed an issue where if a user had a customized the search path for the Address book, Outlook's name resolution scope would be limited to the customized path rather than including the Global Address List (GAL).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2321">已修正在一組傳回的搜尋結果中，依類別結果排序不會顯示類別色彩的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2321">Fixed an issue where within a set of returned search results, sorting the results by Categories would not display the Category colors.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2322">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2322">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2323">已修正當使用者按一下 [排程群組] 內 [工作] 功能區中的 [停用] 按鈕時，不會觸發 'ProjectBeforeTaskChange' Visual Basic Applications (VBA) 事件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2323">Fixed an issue where the 'ProjectBeforeTaskChange' Visual Basic Applications (VBA) event did not fire when a user clicked the "Inactivate" button found on the Tasks Ribbon within the Scheduling grouping.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2324">如果您在 [表單類型] 檢視中設定前置任務或後置任務詳細資訊，則 ProjectBeforeTaskChange Visual Basic Applications (VBA) 事件不會一律擷取變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2324">If you set predecessor or successor details from within a Form type view, the ProjectBeforeTaskChange Visual Basic Applications (VBA) event didn't always capture the changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2325">例如，如果刪除了某個相依性，並在表單上按一下 [確定]，則不會觸發該事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2325">For example, if you deleted a dependency and clicked OK on the form, the event did not fire.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2326">已修正此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2326">This behavior has been fixed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2327">已修正在進行變更 (例如日期變更) 之後，實際工作成本 (ACWP) 的最新值不會顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2327">Fixed an issue where the latest values for the Actual Cost of Work Performed (ACWP) would not be displayed after making a change, such as a date change.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2328">已修正使用「最近使用」(MRU) 功能表開啟專案時，會使用 [讀取/寫入] 存取權開啟專案的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2328">Fixed an issue where opening a project using the Most Recently Used (MRU) menu opened the project file with Read/Write access.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2329">這項變更修正了如果您建立包含開始日期和時間 (但無工期) 的手動工作，則時間表上的時間顯示不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2329">This change fixes an issue where if you created a manual task with a start date and a time (but no duration), it would be displayed with an incorrect time on the timeline.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2330">已修正使用回曆列印時間表時，會導致列印檢視中略過或重複一個月的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2330">Fixed an issue where printing a timeline using Hijri calendar would result in a month being skipped or duplicated in the print view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2331">這項變更解決了在團隊規劃中使用 GDI 物件時，可能導致 GDI 物件分配過多並產生記憶體不足的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2331">This change addresses an issue where working in Team Planner with GDI objects, could result in the over allocation of GDI objects and create low memory conditions.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2332">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2332">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2333">已修正張貼留言功能停用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2333">Fixed an issue where the functionality to post comments was disabled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2334">此變更解決了處理格式錯誤或無效通訊協定資訊影像時所導致的延遲問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2334">This change addresses delays when processing images with malformed or invalid protocol information.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2335">這項變更解決了帳戶管理員不會分派訊息而導致協力廠商應用程式懸置的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2335">This change addresses an issue where the account manager would not dispatch messages resulting in a hang with third party applications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2336">這項變更修正了目錄會使用文件中未包含的標題樣式進行更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2336">This change fixes an issue where the Table of Contents would get updated with heading styles which were not present in the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2337">已修正在寄送文件時，儲存在 Word 文件中的數位簽章會被刪除的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2337">Fixed an issue where digital signatures saved in Word documents would be removed when mailing the documents.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2354">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2354">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2355">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2355">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2356">修正國際版 Access 在使用者介面中顯示英文字串的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2356">Fixed an issue where international versions of Access were displaying English strings in the user interface.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2357">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2357">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2358">修正使用者在以程式設計方式編輯大量儲存格範圍時可能遇到的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2358">Fixed a performance issue that users may have experienced when programmatically editing a large range of cells.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2359">修正以日文環境開啟 CSV 檔案時發生的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2359">Fixed a performance issue that occurred when opening csv files with Japanese environments.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2360">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2360">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2361">解決將附件新增至郵件或從郵件拖放 (與透過功能表相對) 來儲存附件時，導致檔案的「上次修改」日期更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2361">Addresses an issue that caused the "Last Modified"; date on a file to be updated when adding an attachment to a mail or saving an attachment from a mail by dragging and dropping it (as opposed to via a menu).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2362">解決會導致在展開的尋找窗格中按一下 Enter 時無法開始搜尋，而是會要求使用者按一下 [搜尋] 按鈕的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2362">Addresses an issue that caused hitting enter in the expanded find pane to fail to start a search, requiring instead that users click on the search button.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2363">修正將 [如果有，顯示使用者的照片] 選項停用時，搜尋不會顯示有關使用者的任何資訊的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2363">Fixed an issue where search shows no information about users when the option to "Show user photographs when available" is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2364">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2364">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2365">修正無法正確計算摘要工作日期的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2365">Fixed an issue where summary task dates weren't always getting calculated correctly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2366">修正不先執行 OpenUndoTransaction 方法就不能觸發 OnUndoOrRedo 事件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2366">Fixed an issue where the OnUndoOrRedo event doesn't fire without first running the OpenUndoTransaction method.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2367">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2367">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2368">修正輸入或編輯備註然後使用 Ctrl+A 時，會導致選取畫布中的文字，而不只是選取備註卡片內文字的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2368">Fixed an issue when typing or editing a comment and using Ctrl+A would result in selecting text in the canvas instead of selecting text just within the comment card.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2369">我們已修正文件中的文字對齊，在使用 [快速列印] 進行列印之後嘗試進行編輯時變得混亂的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2369">We fixed an issue in which the alignment of words in a document gets scrambled when tried to edit after printing using Quick Print.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2370">我們已修正將兩份文件合併成一份文件時的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2370">We fixed an issue when merging two documents into one document.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2371">修正標示的修訂若與方程式有關，在儲存檔案時可能會導致失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2371">Fixed an issue where marking revisions involving equations could result in a failure when saving the file.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2376">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2376">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2377">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2377">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2378">修正使用 Outlook Web Access 建立規則時不會保存到 Exchange 伺服器，並導致衝突的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2378">Fixed an issue where creating a rule with Outlook Web Access did not persist to the Exchange server and resulted in a conflict.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2379">修正 Outlook 在深色模式中不會在 [寄件者:] 欄位中顯示下拉式清單的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2379">Fixed an issue with Outlook in dark mode would not display the drop down list in the 'From:' field.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2380">解決在其他應用程式中開啟某個檔案時，導致使用者無法透過檔案總管將該檔案附加至郵件訊息的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2380">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to attach a file to their mail message via the file explorer when that file was open in another application.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2381">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2381">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2382">修正將滑鼠移至縮圖上時，建議的縮圖閃動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2382">Fixed an issue where the recommended thumbnails flash when hovering your mouse over the thumbnails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2383">在某些情況下，這可能會導致 PowerPoint 當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2383">In some cases this could cause PowerPoint to crash.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2384">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2384">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2385">修正受保護無法編輯之文件的比較功能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2385">Fixed an issue with Compare feature for documents that were protected for editing.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2386">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2386">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2387">修正 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的使用者主體名稱 (UPN) 不再區分大小寫，導致在 SharePoint 上使用檔案時較少發生失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2387">Fixed an issue Word/Excel/PowerPoint where the User Principal Name (UPN) is no longer case sensitive resulting in less failures when working with files on SharePoint.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2388">修正 [檔案]\[選項] 對話方塊上的 [確定] 按鈕顯示為灰色停用狀態，但功能並未受影響的外觀問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2388">Fixed a cosmetic issue where the 'OK' button on the File \ Options dialog was being displayed as grayed out but functionality was not impacted.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2406">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2406">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2407">修正按 Tab 鍵導覽註解卡片時，註解編輯方塊上的焦點無法顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2407">Fixed an issue that when tabbing through a comment card, the focus on the comment edit box would not be visible.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2408">在方程式中插入控制項 (例如文字內容控制項)，然後儲存再開啟檔案，便會導致內容無法讀取的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2408">Inserting a control (such as a Text Content Control) in an equation then saving and opening the file results in an un-readable content error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2409">修正將先前使用密碼保護的檔案儲存到雲端儲存空間無法運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2409">Fixed an issue where saving a previously password protected file to a cloud storage would not work.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2410">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2410">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2411">修正在 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中開啟來自相同 SharePoint 文件庫的多個文件時，僅掃描開啟的第一個文件是否符合原則的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2411">Fixes an issue when multiple documents are open in Word/Excel/PowerPoint from the same SharePoint library, only the first document opened will be scanned for Policy compliance.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2421">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2421">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2422">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2422">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2423">已修正使用者在重新命名樞紐分析表度量值時可能遇到的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2423">Fixed an issue that users may have experienced when renaming pivot table measures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2424">已修正使用者在使用 VBA 巨集清除範圍內容時可能遇到的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2424">Fixed a performance issue that users may have experienced when using a VBA macro to clear the contents of a range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2425">已修正當使用者執行與功能區互動的巨集時，導致 UI 快閃的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2425">Fixed an issue that caused the UI to flash when users executed a macro that interacted with the ribbon.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2426">已修正當檔案中的第一個字為 TABLE 時，CSV 檔案載入錯誤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2426">Fixed an issue where CSV files were loaded incorrectly when the first word in the file was TABLE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2427">已修正當您在兩個具有不同縮放比例的活頁簿之間切換時，使用者可能遇到的當機問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2427">Fixed an issue where users may have experienced crashes when switching between two workbooks that had different zoom levels.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2428">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2428">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2429">已解決當持續整夜執行 Outlook 時，導致使用者無法開啟公用資料夾訊息的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2429">Addressed an issue that caused users to be unable to open public folder messages when Outlook was left running overnight.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2430">已修正在新增 Gmail 帳戶的驗證工作流程中，[權限] 頁面上的 [允許] 和 [拒絕] 按鈕停用的爭用情況。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2430">Fixed a race condition where the 'Allow' and 'Deny' buttons on the permissions page are disabled during the authentication workflow of adding a Gmail account.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2431">已解決即使已關閉記錄，在某些情況下仍導致 Outlook 異常產生記錄輸出的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2431">Addressed an issue that caused Outlook to unexpectedly generate logging output in some scenarios, even when logging was turned off.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2432">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2432">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2433">已修正當滑鼠指標暫留在註解卡片上方時，未醒目提示註解卡片的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2433">Fixed an issue where comment cards don't always get highlighted when a mouse pointer hovers over the comment card.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2434">在使用中的文件共同撰寫工作階段中，直接在註解卡片中新增影像可能會導致新增標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2434">During an active document co-authoring session, adding an image directly in to a comment card may result in the addition of a tag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2435">我們已修正此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2435">This issue has been fixed.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2436">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2436">Office Suite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2437">當您將 Multichoice/Lookup/Managed-metadata 屬性與 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 文件一起使用並儲存至 SharePoint 文件庫時，這些屬性之前限制為 255 個字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2437">When using Multichoice/Lookup/Managed-metadata properties with Word/Excel/PowerPoint documents and saving to a SharePoint Document Library, these properties were previously limited to 255 characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2438">當這些屬性超過 255 個字元時，這類文件就無法儲存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2438">When these properties exceeded 255 characters, such documents could not be saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2439">在此變更中，此限制已增加到 2048 個字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2439">With this change, this limit has been increased to 2048 characters.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2455">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2455">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2456">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2456">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2457">已解決導致使用者無法存取「空閒/忙碌選項」行事曆權限對話方塊的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2457">Addressed an issue that caused users to lose access to the "Free Busy Options" calendar permissions dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2458">修正了開啟某些從不同時區傳送的週期性會議執行個體時，可能會導致出現警示：「很抱歉，無法開啟這此項目」的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2458">Fixed an issue that may result in the alert: "Sorry we're having trouble opening this item" when opening some recurring meeting instances sent from a different time zone.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2459">已解決從該郵件拖放附件後造成使用者無法重新開啟 .msg 檔案的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2459">Addressed an issue that could cause users to be unable to reopen a .msg file after dragging and dropping an attachment from that message.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2460">修正從 Outlook 上傳檔案附件到 OneDrive 後，造成包含括號之附件名稱的檔案名稱被變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2460">Fixed an issue where after uploading a file attachment from Outlook to OneDrive could result in the file name being changed if the attachment's name contained parenthesis.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2461">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2461">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2462">修正儲存包含 Excel 圖表的 PowerPoint 或 Word 文件會導致失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2462">Fixed an issue that could result in a failure to save a document in PowerPoint or Word containing an Excel chart.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2463">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2463">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2464">修正文件中的圖片在匯出成 PDF 後，會失去透明度的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2464">Fixed an issue where pictures in documents lose transparency when exported to PDF.</span></span>

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2469">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2469">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2470">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2470">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2471">**在查詢設計工具、SQL 檢視和關聯視窗中工作時更具生產力：** 在資料表上按一下滑鼠右鍵即可開啟、設計、調整大小及隱藏它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2471">**Be more productive working in Query Designer, SQL view, and the Relationships window:** Right-click a table to open, design, size, and hide it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2472">在 SQL 檢視中搜尋及取代文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2472">Search and replace text in SQL View.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2473">在 [關聯圖] 視窗中選取多個資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2473">Select multiple tables in the Relationships window.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2476">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2476">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2477">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2477">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2478">此更新會修正使用 ADODB 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2478">This update fixes an issue where using an ADODB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2479">VB 程式碼中的記錄器物件可能會不正確地報告錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2479">Recorder object in VB code may incorrectly report an error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2480">此更新修正可能會導致 Microsoft Access 無法識別連結的 SQL Server 資料表中的識別資料行的問題，這可能會導致不正確地將資料列報告為已刪除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2480">This update fixes an issue that can cause Microsoft Access to fail to identify an Identity Column in a linked SQL Server table, which can cause rows to be reported as deleted incorrectly.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2481">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2481">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2482">修正使用「資料剖析」搭配動態陣列時，Excel 會當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2482">Fixed an issue where Excel would crash when using Text To Columns with dynamic arrays.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2483">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2483">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2484">修正以月檢視在行事曆中捲動時，無法顯示之前的行事曆活動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2484">Fixed an issue where scrolling in calendar with month view, fails to show previous calendar events.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2485">解決在 Citrix 環境中檢視 30 個以上的行事曆時，導致使用者遇到當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2485">Addresses an issue that caused users to experience a crash when viewing more than 30 calendars in a Citrix environment.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2486">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2486">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2487">修正關閉檔案之後，如果有任何事件處理常式正在執行，PowerPoint 就不會立即將它從 [簡報] 集合中移除的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2487">Fixed an issue where after closing a file, PowerPoint does not immediately remove it from the Presentations collection if there are any event handlers running.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2488">因此，物件模型報告的開啟中簡報數目會不正確，且會防止關閉 PowerPoint。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2488">Hence the number of open presentations reported by the object model is incorrect, and shutdown of PowerPoint is prevented.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2489">修正具有深色螢光筆色彩的白色文字，在灰階中會以黑色列印的螢光筆問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2489">Fixed an issue with highlighter : White texts with dark highlighter colors are printed as black in Grayscale.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2490">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2490">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2491">更新和瀏覽目錄時，有時可能會在文件上顯示灰色區域的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2491">Updating and scrolling through a table of contents may sometimes display a gray area over the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2492">修正共同撰寫文件時，可能不會保留根註解的草稿版本的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2492">Fixed an issue where if a document is being coauthored, the draft version of a root comment may not be preserved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2493">已修正在註解卡片之間來回切換時，有時會顯示一開始選取的註解，並將某選取範圍醒目提示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2493">Fixed an issue where going back and forth between comment cards would sometimes display the initially selected comment with a selection highlight.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2494">修正在已撰寫註解但未張貼，且使用者嘗試儲存檔案的情況下，使用 [瀏覽] 來儲存檔案沒有作用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2494">Fixed an issue where using 'Browse' to save a file did not work if a comment was written but not posted and the user tried to save the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2495">將 SlideTrack 啟用且 [註解] 窗格關閉時，Ctrl+Alt+M 可能無法開啟 [註解] 窗格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2495">With SlideTrack enabled and the comments pane closed, Ctrl+Alt+M may not open the comments pane.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2496">修正在表格中新增 @提及時可能發生錯誤訊息：「文件中的表格已經毀損」的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2496">Fixed an issue when adding @mention in a table could generate the error message: 'A table in this document has become corrupted'.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2498">解決可能導致挪威耐諾斯克 (nn-no) 校訂工具套件安裝不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2498">Resolves an issue that may have caused Norway Nynorsk (nn-no) proofing tools package to be installed incorrectly.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2517">修正備註內容功能表中的備註命令 (編輯備註、回覆備註、刪除備註、解決備註) 未顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2517">Fixed an issue where comment commands (Edit comment, Reply to comment, Delete comment, Resolve comment) in the comments context menu were not being displayed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2547">**只要在 Word 中繪製圖形即可輕鬆選取筆跡：** [繪圖] 索引標籤上的 [套索] 工具可協助您選取使用筆跡繪製的物件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2547">**Easily select ink in Word by drawing a shape around it.:** The Lasso tool on the Draw tab helps you select objects drawn with ink.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2548">選取個別筆劃或整個字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2548">Select individual strokes, or whole words.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2549">當您有大量筆跡但只想要使用其中一部分時，這功能尤其方便。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2549">It's handy when you have lots of ink and you only want to work with some of it.</span></span> [<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2550">深入了解</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2550">Learn more</span></span>](https://support.office.com/article/6d76c674-7f4b-414d-b67f-b3ffef6ccf53)

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2565">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2565">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2566">有些框線在 A4 大小的紙張上可能無法如預期列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2566">Some border lines may not print as expected on A4 size paper.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2567">使用 VBA 將影像新增到工作表圖表物件的頁首/頁尾可能會導致錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2567">Adding an image to the header/footer of a chart object on a sheet using VBA may result in an error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2568">設定圖表座標軸格式時，標籤之間的間隔限制為 255。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2568">When formatting a chart axis, the interval between labels was limited to 255.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2571">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2571">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2572">切換資料夾可能會導致郵件清單/郵件預覽中「快閃」短暫的空白。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2572">Switching folders may result in a brief white 'flash' in the mail list / mail preview.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2573">此行為在深色模式中更明顯。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2573">This behavior was more pronounced in dark mode.</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2574">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2574">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2575">已修正呼叫 Shape.Paste 方法會導致貼上的圖形置於焦點下的物件模型問題。&nbsp;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2575">Fixed an Object Model issue where calling Shape.Paste method would result in the pasted shape receiving focus.&nbsp;</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2576">已改善複製貼上案例：&nbsp;以程式設計方式從 PowerPoint 投影片複製圖形，並將其貼到循環播放中的另一張投影片會失敗並發生異常錯誤。&nbsp;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2576">Improved a copy-paste scenario:&nbsp;Progamatically copying a shape from a PowerPoint slide and pasting it to another slide in a loop could fail with an exception error.&nbsp;</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2577">折疊及展開節標頭後，投影片節標頭的動畫無法正確呈現。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2577">Animation in the section headers of slides would not render properly after collapsing and expanding section headers.</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2578">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2578">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2579">已修正文字換行在任務和資源使用狀況檢視中無法正常運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2579">Fixed an issue where text wrapping wasn't working in the task and resource usage views.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2580">已修正如果某資源有多個成本比率，則工作分派的成本值可能不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2580">Fixed an issue where if a resource has more than one cost rate, cost value on assignments may not be correct.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2581">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2581">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2582">在方程式中插入控制項 (例如文字內容控制項)，然後儲存再開啟檔案，便會導致內容無法讀取的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2582">Inserting a control (such as a Text Content Control) in an equation, then saving and opening the file would result in an un-readable content error.</span></span>

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2629">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2629">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2630">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2630">Outlook</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2631">**進階群組電子郵件設定：** 此功能可協助使用者自訂要在收件匣中接收/追蹤哪些電子郵件或活動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2631">**Advanced group email settings:** This feature helps groups users to customize which emails or events to receive/follow in their inbox.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2632">**群組命名原則：** 群組命名原則可讓 IT 系統管理員將組織中使用者所建立群組的名稱標準化及管理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2632">**Groups Naming policy:** A group naming policy enables the IT admin to standardize and manage the names of groups created by users in the organization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2633">系統管理員可以要求在建立群組時，將特定首碼和尾碼新增至群組的名稱，而且可以封鎖使用特定字詞。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2633">The admin can require a specific prefix and suffix be added to the name for a group when it's created, and can block specific words from being used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2634">這有助於將群組名稱中使用不當字詞的情況最小化，以及 IT 管理其目錄中群組的表示方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2634">This helps minimize the use of inappropriate words in group names as well as IT manage the representation of groups in their directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2635">命名原則也可協助部署小組網站的組織根據部門來分類。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2635">Naming Policy also helps organizations that deploy team sites to categorize them based on department.</span></span>
 
### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2636">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2636">Office Suite</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2637">**索引標籤式窗格：** 現在您可以使用應用程式右側的索引標籤 UI，在多個窗格之間切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2637">**Tabbed Panes:** Now you can switch between multiple panes using a tab UI on the right hand side of the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-2638">只有當您開啟 2 個以上的窗格時，該 UI 才會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-2638">The UI will only be visible when you have 2+ panes open.</span></span>

### <a name="excel-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3064">Excel 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3064">Excel Feature updates:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3066">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3066">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3067">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3067">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3069">**新的 Office 應用程式圖示：** 重新設計的應用程式圖示，可反映簡單、功能強大且智慧型的 Office 體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3069">**New Office app icons:** Redesigned app icons to reflect the simple, powerful, and intelligent experiences of Office</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="outlook-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3070">Outlook 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3070">Outlook Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3071">**抵禦攻擊的進階防護：** 使用 Office 365 進階威脅防護，您會受到保護，不受電子郵件主旨、附加的郵件、簽署的郵件、網路路徑內超連結的攻擊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3071">**Advanced protection against attack:** With Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection, you're protected against attacks through hyperlinks within email subjects, attached messages, signed messages, network paths, and so on.</span></span>
 
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3072">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3072">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3073">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3073">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="powerpoint-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3074">PowerPoint 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3074">PowerPoint Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3075">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3075">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3076">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3076">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3079">**搜尋並享受：** 我們對插入圖示新增了搜尋，讓您易於找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3079">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3080">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3080">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3097">**轉換檔案，以改善協助工具功能：** 將您的檔案升級為現代格式，讓所有人更容易存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3097">**Convert files to improve accessibility:** Upgrade your files to the modern format to make them more accessible for everyone.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3100">**將敏感度標籤套用至您的文件**：將敏感度標籤套用至您的檔案和電子郵件，使其符合貴組織的資訊保護原則。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3100">**Apply sensitivity labels to your documents:** Apply sensitivity labels to your files and emails to keep them compliant with your organization's information protection policies.</span></span>

#### <a name="sketchy-shapes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3198">素描形狀！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3198">Sketchy Shapes!</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3199">仍在編寫簡報的草稿嗎？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3199">In the middle of drafting a presentation?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3200">套用素描樣式來顯示您仍在處理文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3200">Apply the sketchy style to show that you're still working on it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3201">此功能可在不將物件轉換成自由格式、手繪形狀的情況下，為您的物件賦與個人風格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3201">It gives a personal touch to your objects without turning it into a free form, hand-drawn shapes.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3203">**更快速共用檔案**：不需開啟檔案，即可從最近使用清單直接共用您的檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3203">**Faster file sharing**: Share your documents right from the recently used list without having to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3205">**[在講義上列印投影片編號] 設定已移至 [列印] 功能表，以易於存取：** 選取講義版面配置時，可在 [列印] > [整頁模式] 下拉式清單中找到它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3205">**The setting to Print Slide Numbers in Handouts has been moved to the Print Menu for easier access:**  Find it in the Print > Print Layout dropdown when a Handout layout is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3206">這也會使得每個簡報的設定易於切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3206">This also allows the setting to be easily toggled per presentation.</span></span> [<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3207">深入了解</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3207">Learn more</span></span>](https://support.office.com/article/194d4320-aa03-478b-9300-df25f0d15dc4)
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3208">**更快速共用檔案：** 不需開啟檔案，即可從最近使用清單直接共用您的檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3208">**Faster file sharing:** Share your documents right from the recently used list without having to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3214">我們已修正無法正常顯示 [查看即將推出的新功能] 方塊的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3214">We fixed an issue which prevented the "See what's coming soon" dialog from being displayed properly</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3215">我們已修正可能會導致共同撰寫圖庫飛出視窗中的相片排列錯誤的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3215">We fixed an issue which could cause Photos to be misaligned in the Co-auth Gallery flyout</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3217">我們已修正有時無法加入新註解的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3217">We fixed an issue which could sometimes prevent new comments from being added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3218">我們已修正表格有時可能會造成當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3218">We fixed an issue where tables could sometimes cause a crash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3219">我們已修正無效的資料有時可能會新增至合併列印結尾的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3219">We fixed an issue where invalid data could sometimes be added to the end of a mail merge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3220">我們已修正可能會導致不正確呈現部分 LaTeX 方程式的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3220">We fixed an issue which could cause some LaTeX equations to render incorrectly</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3221">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3221">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3223">我們已修正開啟多個視窗時會顯示不正確功能區的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3223">We fixed an issue where the incorrect ribbon could be displayed when multiple windows were open</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3224">我們已修正巨集開啟活頁簿的第二個執行個體時可能會造成錯誤的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3224">We fixed an issue which could cause an error when a macro opened a second instance of a workbook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3225">我們已修正開啟或建立活頁簿，或切換使用不同的活頁簿時可能會造成當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3225">We fixed an issue which could cause a crash when opening or creating a workbook, or switching between workbooks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3226">我們已修正使用者無法在 Teams 中開啟透過 Word 建立之 PDF 的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3226">We fixed an issue preventing users from opening a PDF created from Word in Teams</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3227">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3227">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3228">我們已修正匯出成 PDF 時會降低圖表品質的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3228">We fixed an issue which would degrade the quality of a chart when exported to a pdf</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3229">我們已修正工具提示無法顯示到達中心之距離的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3229">We fixed an issue which prevented a tooltip indicating the distance to center from displaying</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3230">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3230">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3231">我們已修正有時可能會導致 [磁碟已滿] 錯誤訊息無法顯示的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3231">We fixed an issue which could sometimes prevent a Disk Full error to be displayed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3232">我們已修正更新會議邀請時可能會導致附件重複的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3232">We fixed an issue which could cause attachments to become duplicated when updating a meeting request</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3233">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3233">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3234">我們已修正某些查詢無法傳回大整數值的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3234">We fixed an issue which prevented some queries from returning large integer values</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3235">我們已修正可能會引起 SQL 文字方塊無法編輯的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3235">We fixed an issue which could make the sql textbox uneditable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3236">我們已修正工具提示可能難以在某些高 DPI 顯示器上查看的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3236">We fixed an issue where tooltips could be difficult to see on some High DPI displays</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3237">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3237">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3238">我們已修正在新工作中可能會導致旗標值無法編輯的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3238">We fixed an issue which could cause flag values to become uneditable in new tasks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3239">我們已修正可能導致狀態更新在 [工作分派] 和 [任務] 上不正確地設定 [實際開始日期] 的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3239">We fixed an issue which could cause a status update to improperly set Actual Start Date on Assignments and Tasks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3240">我們已修正可能會導致部分資源錯誤顯示為過度分派的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3240">We fixed an issue which could cause some resources to incorreclty appear overallocated</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3241">我們已修正新增延隔時間、小數點分隔符號是逗號，以及連線至伺服器時，工作相依性新增方法可能會出錯的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3241">We fixed an issue where the TaskDependencies Add method could fail when Lag is added, the decimal separator is a comma, and when connected to a server</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3242">我們已修正透過 CSOM 更新本機自訂欄位的查閱表格值可能會損毀 PCS 的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3242">We fixed an issue where updating local custom field lookup table values via CSOM could crash PCS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3243">我們已修正總工時值示內如果含有小數點時將不正確顯示的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3243">We fixed an issue where the total work values may appear incorrect if they contain a decimal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3248">**使用 Power Query 的增強功能快速撰寫程式碼：** 使用自動完成和語法色彩快速完成程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3248">**Code quickly with Power Query enhancements:** Get to code completion quickly with auto-complete and syntax coloring.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3249">同時輕鬆探索函數、資料行和參數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3249">Easily discover functions, columns, and parameters, too</span></span>

## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3273">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3273">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3274">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3274">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dark-mode-for-black-theme-in-outlook-desktop"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3275">Outlook 電腦版中用於黑色佈景主題的深色模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3275">Dark Mode for Black Theme in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3276">使用深色模式時，黑色佈景主題中的使用者現在也會在讀取電子郵件時看到讀取窗格具有深色背景，並在撰寫電子郵件時擁有深色背景的撰寫體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3276">With dark mode, users in black theme will now also see the reading pane with a dark background when reading emails, and the compose experience with a dark background when writing emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3277">如果使用者想要預覽郵件在淺色背景下的外觀，在讀取窗格或功能區中有太陽/月亮切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3277">There is a sun/moon toggle on the reading pane and in the ribbon in case users want to preview what the message looks like with a light background instead.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3278">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3278">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3279">開啟黑色佈景主題，深色模式預設就會處於開啟狀態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3279">Turn on black theme and dark mode will be on by default.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3280">使用月亮/太陽切換 (在讀取窗格和功能區中) 可為不在深色模式的使用者預覽郵件的外觀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3280">Use the moon/sun toggle (in the reading pane and in the ribbon) to preview what the message looks like for users not in dark mode</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3281">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3281">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3282">在深色模式中讀取電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3282">Read emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3283">如果您無法讀取某些項目，請使用讀取窗格中的太陽切換來切換為淺色背景。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3283">If you are unable to read something, use the sun toggle in the Reading Pane to switch to a light background.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3284">在深色模式中撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3284">Compose emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3285">使用功能區中的太陽切換，預覽您的郵件使用淺色背景時的外觀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3285">Preview what your message will look like with a light background by using the sun toggle in the ribbon.</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3286">如果您遇到未正確顯示的任何電子郵件，請將其 (當作附件) 傳送到 OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3286">If you encounter any emails that don't render properly, please send them (as an attachment) to OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span></span>
 
#### <a name="get-location-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3287">取得位置建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3287">Get location suggestions</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3288">開始輸入，Outlook 就會尋找符合的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3288">Start typing and Outlook will look for matching locations.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3289">建立約會和會議時，這適用於 [位置] 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3289">This applies to the Location field when creating Appointments and Meetings.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3290">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3290">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3291">在 Outlook 中的 O365 或 Outlook.com 行事曆上，建立約會或會議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3291">Create an Appointment or Meeting on an O365 or Outlook.com calendar in Outlook.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3292">按一下 [位置] 欄位，然後開始輸入…</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3292">Click into the Location field and start typing…</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3293">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3293">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3294">當您將會議室加入至會議時，按一下 [位置] 欄位，而不是使用會議室尋找工具增益集或通訊錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3294">When adding a conference room to a meeting, click into Location field, rather than using Room Finder add-in or Address Book.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3295">若是在公共場所 (如餐廳、咖啡廳，甚至是牙醫診所) 的實體位置進行會議，請嘗試使用新的選擇器找到確切的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3295">For appointments at a physical place with a public location - like a restaurant, coffee shop, or even your dentist's office - try finding the exact location using the new picker.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3296">如此一來，您將可以在該離開時，收到 Outlook Mobile 的通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3296">This way, you'll be able to get notified on Outlook Mobile when it's time to leave.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3297">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3297">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="all"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3298">全部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3298">All</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3299">我們已修正在離線時會導致搜尋方塊啟用的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3299">We fixed an issue which would keep the Search Box enabled while offline</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3300">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3300">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3301">我們已修正有時候可能難以查看鍵盤焦點的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3301">We fixed an issue where keyboard focus could sometimes be difficult to see</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3302">我們已修正貼到新文件的文字，有時候文字對齊可能會不正確的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3302">We fixed an issue where text pasted into a new document could sometimes have the wrong text alignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3303">我們已修正將使用者的電腦暫停之後，可能防止部分使用者儲存變更的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3303">We fixed an issue which could prevent some users from saving changes after suspending their computer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3304">我們已修正在某些情況下會列印整份文件，而非所選範圍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3304">We fixed an issue where in certain cases an entire document would be printed instead of the selected range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3305">我們已修正可能會讓註解在較小型的顯示器上難以閱讀的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3305">We fixed an issue which could make comments difficult to read on smaller displays</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3306">我們已修正擷取到裝置時可能會造成當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3306">We fixed an issue which could cause a crash when capturing to a device</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3307">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3307">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3308">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3308">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3309">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3309">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3310">我們已修正有時候可能難以查看鍵盤焦點的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3310">We fixed an issue where keyboard focus could sometimes be difficult to see</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3311">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3311">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3312">我們已修正不正確地將未啟用的增益集顯示為已啟用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3312">We fixed an issue which could incorrectly display an add-in as being enabled when it was not.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3313">我們已修正會在有大量原則時，使得客戶無法檢視所有保留原則的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3313">We fixed an issue which would prevent a customer from viewing all retention policies if there were a large number of them</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3314">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3314">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3315">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3315">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3316">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3316">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3317">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3317">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
</BR></BR>

## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3320">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3320">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3321">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3321">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3322">我們已修正了儲存到 OneDrive 時，使用者可能無法登入的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3322">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from signing in when saving to OneDrive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3323">我們已修正了使用者可能無法變更限制存取模式中之 SharePoint 內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3323">We fixed an issue where a user could be prevented from changing SharePoint properties while in restricted access mode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3324">我們已修正了調整邊界時，可能會變更頁首及頁尾內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3324">We fixed an issue where header and footer content could change when adjusting margins</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3325">我們已修正了切換成網頁檢視時，格式設定可能會中斷的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3325">We fixed an issue where formatting could break when switching to web view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3326">我們已修正了從 SharePoint 開啟時，使用者無法使用自訂欄位的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3326">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from using custom fields when opened from SharePoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3328">我們已修正了刪除篩選集之資料列時的效能問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3328">We fixed a performance issue when deleting rows of a filtered set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3329">我們已修正了有時可能會造成滑鼠在受保護檢視模式中閃爍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3329">We fixed an issue which could sometimes cause the mouse to flicker in protected view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3330">我們修正了刪除系列時，可能會導致當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3330">We fixed an issue which could have caused a crash when deleting a series</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3331">我們已修正了某些使用者即使在沒有提供的情況下，仍舊有新增版本歷程記錄之選項的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3331">We fixed an issue where some users would have the option to add version history when that was not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3332">我們已修正了使用試算表比較工具時，可能導致例外狀況的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3332">We fixed an issue which could have caused an exception when using the Spreadsheet Compare tool</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3334">我們已修正了按一下連結到 SharePoint 時，可能會發生當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3334">We fixed an issue where a crash could occur when clicking a link to SharePoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3335">我們已修正了使用 Surface 手寫筆輸入時，可能將使用者切換到下一個頁面的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3335">We fixed an issue which could switch the user to the next page while typing using a Surface Pen</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3336">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3336">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3337">我們已修正了在某些情況下 [收件者] 欄位大於正常的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3337">We fixed an issue where in some cases the To field was larger than normal</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3338">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3338">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3339">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3339">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3340">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3340">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3348">我們已修正在 Adobe Illustrator 中所建立之向量影像無法正確顯示的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3348">We fixed an issue where vector-based images created in Adobe Illustrator would not display correctly</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3352">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3352">PowerPoint</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3354">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3354">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3355">我們已修正內嵌附件有時未正確縮放的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3355">We fixed an issue where inline attachments would sometimes be incorrectly scaled</span></span>

## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3363">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3363">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3364">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3364">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dialog-for-contacting-support-now-is-dockable-and-appears-on-the-right"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3365">[連絡支援人員] 對話方塊現在可停駐，且會顯示在右側</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3365">Dialog for Contacting Support now is dockable and appears on the right</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3366">用於 [連絡支援人員] 的對話方塊現在會顯示在右側窗格中，並且會以停駐視窗形式開始。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3366">The dialog used for Contacting support will now appear in a pane on the right and will start off as a docked window.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="ink-in-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-3367">在您的電子郵件中使用筆跡！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-3367">Ink in Your Email!</span></span>
