### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4268">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4268">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4269">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4269">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4270">修正國際版 Access 在使用者介面中顯示英文字串的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4270">Fixed an issue where international versions of Access were displaying English strings in the user interface.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4271">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4271">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4272">修正使用者在以程式設計方式編輯大量儲存格範圍時可能遇到的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4272">Fixed a performance issue that users may have experienced when programmatically editing a large range of cells.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4273">修正以日文環境開啟 CSV 檔案時發生的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4273">Fixed a performance issue that occurred when opening csv files with Japanese environments.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4274">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4274">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4275">解決將附件新增至郵件或從郵件拖放 (與透過功能表相對) 來儲存附件時，導致檔案的「上次修改」日期更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4275">Addresses an issue that caused the "Last Modified"; date on a file to be updated when adding an attachment to a mail or saving an attachment from a mail by dragging and dropping it (as opposed to via a menu).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4276">解決會導致在展開的尋找窗格中按一下 Enter 時無法開始搜尋，而是會要求使用者按一下 [搜尋] 按鈕的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4276">Addresses an issue that caused hitting enter in the expanded find pane to fail to start a search, requiring instead that users click on the search button.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4277">修正將 [如果有，顯示使用者的照片] 選項停用時，搜尋不會顯示有關使用者的任何資訊的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4277">Fixed an issue where search shows no information about users when the option to "Show user photographs when available" is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4278">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4278">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4279">修正無法正確計算摘要工作日期的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4279">Fixed an issue where summary task dates weren't always getting calculated correctly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4280">修正不先執行 OpenUndoTransaction 方法就不能觸發 OnUndoOrRedo 事件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4280">Fixed an issue where the OnUndoOrRedo event doesn't fire without first running the OpenUndoTransaction method.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4281">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4281">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4282">修正輸入或編輯備註然後使用 Ctrl+A 時，會導致選取畫布中的文字，而不只是選取備註卡片內文字的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4282">Fixed an issue when typing or editing a comment and using Ctrl+A would result in selecting text in the canvas instead of selecting text just within the comment card.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4283">我們已修正文件中的文字對齊，在使用 [快速列印] 進行列印之後嘗試進行編輯時變得混亂的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4283">We fixed an issue in which the alignment of words in a document gets scrambled when tried to edit after printing using Quick Print.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4284">我們已修正將兩份文件合併成一份文件時的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4284">We fixed an issue when merging two documents into one document.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4285">修正標示的修訂若與方程式有關，在儲存檔案時可能會導致失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4285">Fixed an issue where marking revisions involving equations could result in a failure when saving the file.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4290">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4290">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4291">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4291">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4292">修正使用 Outlook Web Access 建立規則時不會保存到 Exchange 伺服器，並導致衝突的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4292">Fixed an issue where creating a rule with Outlook Web Access did not persist to the Exchange server and resulted in a conflict.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4293">修正 Outlook 在深色模式中不會在 [寄件者:] 欄位中顯示下拉式清單的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4293">Fixed an issue with Outlook in dark mode would not display the drop down list in the 'From:' field.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4294">解決在其他應用程式中開啟某個檔案時，導致使用者無法透過檔案總管將該檔案附加至郵件訊息的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4294">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to attach a file to their mail message via the file explorer when that file was open in another application.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4295">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4295">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4296">修正將滑鼠移至縮圖上時，建議的縮圖閃動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4296">Fixed an issue where the recommended thumbnails flash when hovering your mouse over the thumbnails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4297">在某些情況下，這可能會導致 PowerPoint 當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4297">In some cases this could cause PowerPoint to crash.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4298">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4298">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4299">修正受保護無法編輯之文件的比較功能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4299">Fixed an issue with Compare feature for documents that were protected for editing.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4300">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4300">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4301">修正 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的使用者主體名稱 (UPN) 不再區分大小寫，導致在 SharePoint 上使用檔案時較少發生失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4301">Fixed an issue Word/Excel/PowerPoint where the User Principal Name (UPN) is no longer case sensitive resulting in less failures when working with files on SharePoint.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4302">修正 [檔案]\[選項] 對話方塊上的 [確定] 按鈕顯示為灰色停用狀態，但功能並未受影響的外觀問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4302">Fixed a cosmetic issue where the 'OK' button on the File \ Options dialog was being displayed as grayed out but functionality was not impacted.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4316">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4316">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4317">已修正交叉分析篩選器中的文字在預覽列印中無法正確縮放的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4317">Fixed an issue where text in a slicer isn't scaled properly in Print Preview.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4318">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4318">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4319">解決將附件新增至郵件或從郵件拖放 (與透過功能表相對) 來儲存附件時，導致檔案的「上次修改」日期更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4319">Addresses an issue that caused the "Last Modified" date on a file to be updated when adding an attachment to a mail or saving an attachment from a mail by dragging and dropping it (as opposed to via a menu).</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4320">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4320">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4321">修正按 Tab 鍵導覽註解卡片時，註解編輯方塊上的焦點無法顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4321">Fixed an issue that when tabbing through a comment card, the focus on the comment edit box would not be visible.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4322">在方程式中插入控制項 (例如文字內容控制項)，然後儲存再開啟檔案，便會導致內容無法讀取的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4322">Inserting a control (such as a Text Content Control) in an equation then saving and opening the file results in an un-readable content error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4323">修正將先前使用密碼保護的檔案儲存到雲端儲存空間無法運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4323">Fixed an issue where saving a previously password protected file to a cloud storage would not work.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4324">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4324">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4325">修正在 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中開啟來自相同 SharePoint 文件庫的多個文件時，僅掃描開啟的第一個文件是否符合原則的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4325">Fixes an issue when multiple documents are open in Word/Excel/PowerPoint from the same SharePoint library, only the first document opened will be scanned for Policy compliance.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4335">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4335">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4336">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4336">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4337">已修正使用者在重新命名樞紐分析表度量值時可能遇到的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4337">Fixed an issue that users may have experienced when renaming pivot table measures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4338">已修正使用者在使用 VBA 巨集清除範圍內容時可能遇到的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4338">Fixed a performance issue that users may have experienced when using a VBA macro to clear the contents of a range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4339">已修正當使用者執行與功能區互動的巨集時，導致 UI 快閃的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4339">Fixed an issue that caused the UI to flash when users executed a macro that interacted with the ribbon.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4340">已修正當檔案中的第一個字為 TABLE 時，CSV 檔案載入錯誤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4340">Fixed an issue where CSV files were loaded incorrectly when the first word in the file was TABLE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4341">已修正當您在兩個具有不同縮放比例的活頁簿之間切換時，使用者可能遇到的當機問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4341">Fixed an issue where users may have experienced crashes when switching between two workbooks that had different zoom levels.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4342">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4342">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4343">已解決當持續整夜執行 Outlook 時，導致使用者無法開啟公用資料夾訊息的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4343">Addressed an issue that caused users to be unable to open public folder messages when Outlook was left running overnight.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4344">已修正在新增 Gmail 帳戶的驗證工作流程中，[權限] 頁面上的 [允許] 和 [拒絕] 按鈕停用的爭用情況。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4344">Fixed a race condition where the 'Allow' and 'Deny' buttons on the permissions page are disabled during the authentication workflow of adding a Gmail account.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4345">已解決即使已關閉記錄，在某些情況下仍導致 Outlook 異常產生記錄輸出的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4345">Addressed an issue that caused Outlook to unexpectedly generate logging output in some scenarios, even when logging was turned off.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4346">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4346">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4347">已修正當滑鼠指標暫留在註解卡片上方時，未醒目提示註解卡片的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4347">Fixed an issue where comment cards don't always get highlighted when a mouse pointer hovers over the comment card.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4348">在使用中的文件共同撰寫工作階段中，直接在註解卡片中新增影像可能會導致新增標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4348">During an active document co-authoring session, adding an image directly in to a comment card may result in the addition of a tag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4349">我們已修正此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4349">This issue has been fixed.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4350">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4350">Office Suite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4351">當您將 Multichoice/Lookup/Managed-metadata 屬性與 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 文件一起使用並儲存至 SharePoint 文件庫時，這些屬性之前限制為 255 個字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4351">When using Multichoice/Lookup/Managed-metadata properties with Word/Excel/PowerPoint documents and saving to a SharePoint Document Library, these properties were previously limited to 255 characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4352">當這些屬性超過 255 個字元時，這類文件就無法儲存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4352">When these properties exceeded 255 characters, such documents could not be saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4353">在此變更中，此限制已增加到 2048 個字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4353">With this change, this limit has been increased to 2048 characters.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4384">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4384">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4385">**在查詢設計工具、SQL 檢視和關聯視窗中工作時更具生產力：** 在資料表上按一下滑鼠右鍵即可開啟、設計、調整大小及隱藏它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4385">**Be more productive working in Query Designer, SQL view, and the Relationships window:** Right-click a table to open, design, size, and hide it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4386">在 SQL 檢視中搜尋及取代文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4386">Search and replace text in SQL View.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4387">在 [關聯圖] 視窗中選取多個資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4387">Select multiple tables in the Relationships window.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE FEATUREDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4390">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4390">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4391">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4391">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4392">此更新會修正使用 ADODB 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4392">This update fixes an issue where using an ADODB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4393">VB 程式碼中的記錄器物件可能會不正確地報告錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4393">Recorder object in VB code may incorrectly report an error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4394">此更新修正可能會導致 Microsoft Access 無法識別連結的 SQL Server 資料表中的識別資料行的問題，這可能會導致不正確地將資料列報告為已刪除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4394">This update fixes an issue that can cause Microsoft Access to fail to identify an Identity Column in a linked SQL Server table, which can cause rows to be reported as deleted incorrectly.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4395">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4395">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4396">修正使用「資料剖析」搭配動態陣列時，Excel 會當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4396">Fixed an issue where Excel would crash when using Text To Columns with dynamic arrays.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4397">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4397">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4398">修正以月檢視在行事曆中捲動時，無法顯示之前的行事曆活動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4398">Fixed an issue where scrolling in calendar with month view, fails to show previous calendar events.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4399">解決在 Citrix 環境中檢視 30 個以上的行事曆時，導致使用者遇到當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4399">Addresses an issue that caused users to experience a crash when viewing more than 30 calendars in a Citrix environment.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4400">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4400">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4401">修正關閉檔案之後，如果有任何事件處理常式正在執行，PowerPoint 就不會立即將它從 [簡報] 集合中移除的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4401">Fixed an issue where after closing a file, PowerPoint does not immediately remove it from the Presentations collection if there are any event handlers running.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4402">因此，物件模型報告的開啟中簡報數目會不正確，且會防止關閉 PowerPoint。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4402">Hence the number of open presentations reported by the object model is incorrect, and shutdown of PowerPoint is prevented.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4403">修正具有深色螢光筆色彩的白色文字，在灰階中會以黑色列印的螢光筆問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4403">Fixed an issue with highlighter : White texts with dark highlighter colors are printed as black in Grayscale.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4404">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4404">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4405">更新和瀏覽目錄時，有時可能會在文件上顯示灰色區域的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4405">Updating and scrolling through a table of contents may sometimes display a gray area over the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4406">修正共同撰寫文件時，可能不會保留根註解的草稿版本的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4406">Fixed an issue where if a document is being coauthored, the draft version of a root comment may not be preserved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4407">已修正在註解卡片之間來回切換時，有時會顯示一開始選取的註解，並將某選取範圍醒目提示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4407">Fixed an issue where going back and forth between comment cards would sometimes display the initially selected comment with a selection highlight.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4408">修正在已撰寫註解但未張貼，且使用者嘗試儲存檔案的情況下，使用 [瀏覽] 來儲存檔案沒有作用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4408">Fixed an issue where using 'Browse' to save a file did not work if a comment was written but not posted and the user tried to save the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4409">將 SlideTrack 啟用且 [註解] 窗格關閉時，Ctrl+Alt+M 可能無法開啟 [註解] 窗格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4409">With SlideTrack enabled and the comments pane closed, Ctrl+Alt+M may not open the comments pane.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4410">修正在表格中新增 @提及時可能發生錯誤訊息：「文件中的表格已經毀損」的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4410">Fixed an issue when adding @mention in a table could generate the error message: 'A table in this document has become corrupted'.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4411">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4411">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4412">解決可能導致挪威耐諾斯克 (nn-no) 校訂工具套件安裝不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4412">Resolves an issue that may have caused Norway Nynorsk (nn-no) proofing tools package to be installed incorrectly.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4419">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4419">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4421">**查詢編輯器中的資料分析：** 取得欄位資料的概覽分析、識別錯誤和空白值，查看分佈長條圖等。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4421">**Data Profiling in Query Editor:** Get-a-glance analysis of the data in your columns, identify error and empty values, see distribution histograms and more.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4424">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4424">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4425">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4425">Outlook</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4426">修正根據保留原則到期的電子郵件會顯示兩個標籤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4426">Fixed an issue where emails expiring based on a retention policy would display two labels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4427">其中一個顯示郵件將在一天內過期，另一個則顯示將在兩天內到期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4427">One showing that the mail will expire in one day and another displaying that it will expire in two days.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4428">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4428">Word</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4429">修正在具有「反轉」頁面色彩的閱讀模式中，備註提示未顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4429">Fixed an issue where comment hint was not visible in read mode with &quot;Inverse&quot; page color.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4430">修正在編輯備註之後將文字設為斜體然後再張貼，斜體格式設定遺失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4430">Fixed an issue where italics formatting is lost after editing a comment, italicizing the text and then posting it.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4431">修正備註內容功能表中的備註命令 (編輯備註、回覆備註、刪除備註、解決備註) 未顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4431">Fixed an issue where comment commands (Edit comment, Reply to comment, Delete comment, Resolve comment) in the comments context menu were not being displayed.</span></span>

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4452">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4452">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4453">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4453">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4454">**將圖形另存為圖片：** 只要按幾下，即可將圖形、圖示或其他物件另存成圖片，便於您於任何其他地方使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4454">**Save shapes as pictures:** In just a few clicks, save a shape, icon, or other object as a picture file so you can reuse it elsewhere.</span></span> [<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4455">深入了解</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4455">Learn more</span></span>](https://support.office.com/article/3c4f9ca4-945a-4c33-af91-d10e4e3ea715)
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4456">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4456">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4457">**使用者現在可以將 Word/Excel/Outlook 中的物件另存為 Windows 的圖片：** 如同在 PowerPoint 中已具有的功能，使用者現在可以將 Word、Excel 和 Outlook 中的物件另存為圖片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4457">**User can now save objects in Word/Excel/Outlook as a picture for Windows.:** With the ability already seen in PowerPoint, users can now save objects in Word, Excel and Outlook as a picture.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4458">物件包括圖形、圖示、圖片及其他內容！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4458">Objects include shapes, icons, pictures, and more!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4459">此功能只要按滑鼠右鍵的功能表就能存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4459">This can be accessed through the right-click menu.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4460">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4460">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4461">**只要在 Word 中繪製圖形即可輕鬆選取筆跡：** [繪圖] 索引標籤上的 [套索] 工具可協助您選取使用筆跡繪製的物件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4461">**Easily select ink in Word by drawing a shape around it.:** The Lasso tool on the Draw tab helps you select objects drawn with ink.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4462">選取個別筆劃或整個字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4462">Select individual strokes, or whole words.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4463">當您有大量筆跡但只想要使用其中一部分時，這功能尤其方便。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4463">It's handy when you have lots of ink and you only want to work with some of it.</span></span> [<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4464">深入了解</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4464">Learn more</span></span>](https://support.office.com/article/6d76c674-7f4b-414d-b67f-b3ffef6ccf53)

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4478">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4478">Resolved issues</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4479">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4479">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4480">有些框線在 A4 大小的紙張上可能無法如預期列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4480">Some border lines may not print as expected on A4 size paper.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4481">使用 VBA 將影像新增到工作表圖表物件的頁首/頁尾可能會導致錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4481">Adding an image to the header/footer of a chart object on a sheet using VBA may result in an error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4482">設定圖表座標軸格式時，標籤之間的間隔限制為 255。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4482">When formatting a chart axis, the interval between labels was limited to 255.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4483">已修正嘗試重新整理 XML 查詢 (資料來源 URL 遭截斷) 時發生錯誤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4483">Fixed an issue where an error would occur trying to refresh an XML query in which the URL to the datasource was being truncated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4484">活頁簿統計資料會報告所有開啟的活頁簿 (包括個人巨集活頁簿) 中的巨集計數。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4484">Workbook Statistics would report a macro count from all open workbooks, including the personal macro workbook.</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4485">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4485">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4486">切換資料夾可能會導致郵件清單/郵件預覽中「快閃」短暫的空白。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4486">Switching folders may result in a brief white 'flash' in the mail list / mail preview.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4487">此行為在深色模式中更明顯。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4487">This behavior was more pronounced in dark mode.</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4488">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4488">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4489">已修正呼叫 Shape.Paste 方法會導致貼上的圖形置於焦點下的物件模型問題。&nbsp;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4489">Fixed an Object Model issue where calling Shape.Paste method would result in the pasted shape receiving focus.&nbsp;</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4490">已改善複製貼上案例：&nbsp;以程式設計方式從 PowerPoint 投影片複製圖形，並將其貼到循環播放中的另一張投影片會失敗並發生異常錯誤。&nbsp;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4490">Improved a copy-paste scenario:&nbsp;Progamatically copying a shape from a PowerPoint slide and pasting it to another slide in a loop could fail with an exception error.&nbsp;</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4491">折疊及展開節標頭後，投影片節標頭的動畫無法正確呈現。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4491">Animation in the section headers of slides would not render properly after collapsing and expanding section headers.</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4492">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4492">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4493">已修正文字換行在任務和資源使用狀況檢視中無法正常運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4493">Fixed an issue where text wrapping wasn't working in the task and resource usage views.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4494">已修正如果某資源有多個成本比率，則工作分派的成本值可能不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4494">Fixed an issue where if a resource has more than one cost rate, cost value on assignments may not be correct.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4495">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4495">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4496">在方程式中插入控制項 (例如文字內容控制項)，然後儲存再開啟檔案，便會導致內容無法讀取的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4496">Inserting a control (such as a Text Content Control) in an equation, then saving and opening the file would result in an un-readable content error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4497">共同撰寫時，Word 電腦版可能不會顯示使用 Word Online 新增註解的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4497">When co-authoring, adding a comment using Word online may not appear in Word desktop.</span></span>
 
### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4498">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4498">Office Suite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4499">嘗試在只有一個授權的情況下變更授權時，不再顯示有效授權的錯誤到期日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4499">Removed showing an erroneous expiry date of the valid license when trying to change license with only one license.</span></span>

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4543">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4543">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4544">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4544">Outlook</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4545">**進階群組電子郵件設定：** 此功能可協助使用者自訂要在收件匣中接收/追蹤哪些電子郵件或活動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4545">**Advanced group email settings:** This feature helps groups users to customize which emails or events to receive/follow in their inbox.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4546">**群組命名原則：** 群組命名原則可讓 IT 系統管理員將組織中使用者所建立群組的名稱標準化及管理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4546">**Groups Naming policy:** A group naming policy enables the IT admin to standardize and manage the names of groups created by users in the organization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4547">系統管理員可以要求在建立群組時，將特定首碼和尾碼新增至群組的名稱，而且可以封鎖使用特定字詞。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4547">The admin can require a specific prefix and suffix be added to the name for a group when it's created, and can block specific words from being used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4548">這有助於將群組名稱中使用不當字詞的情況最小化，以及 IT 管理其目錄中群組的表示方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4548">This helps minimize the use of inappropriate words in group names as well as IT manage the representation of groups in their directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4549">命名原則也可協助部署小組網站的組織根據部門來分類。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4549">Naming Policy also helps organizations that deploy team sites to categorize them based on department.</span></span>
 
### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4550">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4550">Office Suite</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4551">**索引標籤式窗格：** 現在您可以使用應用程式右側的索引標籤 UI，在多個窗格之間切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4551">**Tabbed Panes:** Now you can switch between multiple panes using a tab UI on the right hand side of the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4552">只有當您開啟 2 個以上的窗格時，該 UI 才會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4552">The UI will only be visible when you have 2+ panes open.</span></span>

- <div><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4750">發現檔案可能遭某個使用者鎖定，但不會在錯誤訊息中顯示任何使用者名稱的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4750">Identified an issue where a file could be locked by a user, but no username would be displayed in the error message</span></span></div>

## <a name="august-09-2019br"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4976">**2019 年 8 月 9 日**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4976">**August 09, 2019**</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4977">版本 1909 (組建 12001.20000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4977">Version 1909 (Build 12001.20000)</span></span><br/>
 
### <a name="excel-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4978">Excel 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4978">Excel Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4979">**共同作業變得更容易：** 共同撰寫的增強功能表示，使用條件式格式設定、儲存格樣式等等時，您的變更會與共同作業者的變更順暢地合併。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4979">**Collaboration just got easier:** Co-authoring improvements mean that when working with conditional formatting, cell styles, and more, your changes are merged seamlessly with those of your collaborators.</span></span>
 
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4980">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4980">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4981">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4981">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="office-suite-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4982">Office 套件功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4982">Office Suite Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4983">**新的 Office 應用程式圖示：** 重新設計的應用程式圖示，可反映簡單、功能強大且智慧型的 Office 體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4983">**New Office app icons:** Redesigned app icons to reflect the simple, powerful, and intelligent experiences of Office</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="outlook-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4984">Outlook 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4984">Outlook Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4985">**抵禦攻擊的進階防護：** 使用 Office 365 進階威脅防護，您會受到保護，不受電子郵件主旨、附加的郵件、簽署的郵件、網路路徑內超連結的攻擊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4985">**Advanced protection against attack:** With Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection, you're protected against attacks through hyperlinks within email subjects, attached messages, signed messages, network paths, and so on.</span></span>
 
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4986">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4986">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4987">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4987">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="powerpoint-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4988">PowerPoint 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4988">PowerPoint Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4989">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4989">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-4990">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-4990">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>

## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5110">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5110">What's New:</span></span>

#### <a name="sketchy-shapes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5112">素描形狀！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5112">Sketchy Shapes!</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5113">仍在編寫簡報的草稿嗎？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5113">In the middle of drafting a presentation?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5114">套用素描樣式來顯示您仍在處理文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5114">Apply the sketchy style to show that you're still working on it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5115">此功能可在不將物件轉換成自由格式、手繪形狀的情況下，為您的物件賦與個人風格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5115">It gives a personal touch to your objects without turning it into a free form, hand-drawn shapes.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5139">我們已修正開啟或建立活頁簿，或切換使用不同的活頁簿時可能會造成當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5139">We fixed an issue which could cause a crash when opening or creating a workbook, or switching between workbooks</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5144">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5144">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5146">我們已修正更新會議邀請時可能會導致附件重複的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5146">We fixed an issue which could cause attachments to become duplicated when updating a meeting request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5153">我們已修正可能導致狀態更新在 [工作分派] 和 [任務] 上不正確地設定 [實際開始日期] 的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5153">We fixed an issue which could cause a status update to improperly set Actual Start Date on Assignments and Tasks</span></span>

## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5160">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5160">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5161">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5161">Excel</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5162">**使用 Power Query 的增強功能快速撰寫程式碼：** 使用自動完成和語法色彩快速完成程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5162">**Code quickly with Power Query enhancements:** Get to code completion quickly with auto-complete and syntax coloring.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5163">同時輕鬆探索函數、資料行和參數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5163">Easily discover functions, columns, and parameters, too</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5164">**聯結類似欄位上的表格：** 在比較合併表格的欄位時，取得及轉換 (Power Query) 現在具有近似文字比對邏輯 (也稱為模糊比對)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5164">**Join tables on similar columns:** Get & Transform (Power Query) now features approximate text matching logic (also called fuzzy matching) when comparing columns for merging tables.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5165">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5165">Word</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5166">**共同撰寫的增強功能**：增強共同撰寫時的可靠性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5166">**Coauthoring improvements:** Improved reliability when coauthoring.</span></span>

### <a name="word-excel-powerpoint-and-visio"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5167">Word、Excel、PowerPoint 和 Visio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5167">Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Visio</span></span>
 
#### <a name="recommended-documents"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5168">建譯的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5168">Recommended Documents</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5169">透過建議您的相關活動尋找文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5169">Find documents with relevant activity recommended to you.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5170">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5170">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5171">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5171">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5172">我們已修正可能會導致有些 .DOC 檔案無法開啟的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5172">We fixed an issue which could prevent some .DOC files from opening</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5173">我們已修正可能會導致註解無法正確載入的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5173">We fixed an issue which could have prevented comments from loading properly</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5174">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5174">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5175">我們已改善 Power Query 的效能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5175">We improved the performance of Power Queries</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5176">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5176">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5177">我們已修正在 Surface 裝置上使用手寫筆可能會導致螢幕閃爍的相關問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5177">We fixed an issue related to using a pen on a Surface device which could cause the screen to flicker</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5178">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5178">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5179">我們已修正將約會轉換成會議時可能會變更約會的空閒/忙碌狀態問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5179">We fixed an issue which could change the free/busy status of an appointment when converted to a meeting</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5180">我們已修正電子郵件有臨時範本的保護時會顯示錯誤範本和描述的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5180">We fixed an issue where the wrong template and description would be displayed when an e-mail was protected with an ad-hoc template</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5181">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5181">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5182">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5182">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5183">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5183">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5184">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5184">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>

## <a name="june-21-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5185">2019 年 6 月 21 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5185">June 21, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5186">版本 1907 (組建 11815.20002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5186">Version 1907 (build 11815.20002)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5187">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5187">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5188">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5188">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dark-mode-for-black-theme-in-outlook-desktop"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5189">Outlook 電腦版中用於黑色佈景主題的深色模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5189">Dark Mode for Black Theme in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5190">使用深色模式時，黑色佈景主題中的使用者現在也會在讀取電子郵件時看到讀取窗格具有深色背景，並在撰寫電子郵件時擁有深色背景的撰寫體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5190">With dark mode, users in black theme will now also see the reading pane with a dark background when reading emails, and the compose experience with a dark background when writing emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5191">如果使用者想要預覽郵件在淺色背景下的外觀，在讀取窗格或功能區中有太陽/月亮切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5191">There is a sun/moon toggle on the reading pane and in the ribbon in case users want to preview what the message looks like with a light background instead.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5192">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5192">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5193">開啟黑色佈景主題，深色模式預設就會處於開啟狀態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5193">Turn on black theme and dark mode will be on by default.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5194">使用月亮/太陽切換 (在讀取窗格和功能區中) 可為不在深色模式的使用者預覽郵件的外觀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5194">Use the moon/sun toggle (in the reading pane and in the ribbon) to preview what the message looks like for users not in dark mode</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5195">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5195">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5196">在深色模式中讀取電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5196">Read emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5197">如果您無法讀取某些項目，請使用讀取窗格中的太陽切換來切換為淺色背景。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5197">If you are unable to read something, use the sun toggle in the Reading Pane to switch to a light background.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5198">在深色模式中撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5198">Compose emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5199">使用功能區中的太陽切換，預覽您的郵件使用淺色背景時的外觀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5199">Preview what your message will look like with a light background by using the sun toggle in the ribbon.</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5200">如果您遇到未正確顯示的任何電子郵件，請將其 (當作附件) 傳送到 OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5200">If you encounter any emails that don't render properly, please send them (as an attachment) to OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span></span>
 
#### <a name="get-location-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5201">取得位置建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5201">Get location suggestions</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5202">開始輸入，Outlook 就會尋找符合的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5202">Start typing and Outlook will look for matching locations.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5203">建立約會和會議時，這適用於 [位置] 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5203">This applies to the Location field when creating Appointments and Meetings.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5204">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5204">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5205">在 Outlook 中的 O365 或 Outlook.com 行事曆上，建立約會或會議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5205">Create an Appointment or Meeting on an O365 or Outlook.com calendar in Outlook.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5206">按一下 [位置] 欄位，然後開始輸入…</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5206">Click into the Location field and start typing…</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5207">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5207">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5208">當您將會議室加入至會議時，按一下 [位置] 欄位，而不是使用會議室尋找工具增益集或通訊錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5208">When adding a conference room to a meeting, click into Location field, rather than using Room Finder add-in or Address Book.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5209">若是在公共場所 (如餐廳、咖啡廳，甚至是牙醫診所) 的實體位置進行會議，請嘗試使用新的選擇器找到確切的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5209">For appointments at a physical place with a public location - like a restaurant, coffee shop, or even your dentist's office - try finding the exact location using the new picker.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5210">如此一來，您將可以在該離開時，收到 Outlook Mobile 的通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5210">This way, you'll be able to get notified on Outlook Mobile when it's time to leave.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5211">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5211">Notable Fixes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5215">我們已修正有時候可能難以查看鍵盤焦點的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5215">We fixed an issue where keyboard focus could sometimes be difficult to see</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5216">我們已修正貼到新文件的文字，有時候文字對齊可能會不正確的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5216">We fixed an issue where text pasted into a new document could sometimes have the wrong text alignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5217">我們已修正將使用者的電腦暫停之後，可能防止部分使用者儲存變更的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5217">We fixed an issue which could prevent some users from saving changes after suspending their computer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5218">我們已修正在某些情況下會列印整份文件，而非所選範圍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5218">We fixed an issue where in certain cases an entire document would be printed instead of the selected range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5219">我們已修正可能會讓註解在較小型的顯示器上難以閱讀的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5219">We fixed an issue which could make comments difficult to read on smaller displays</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5220">我們已修正擷取到裝置時可能會造成當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5220">We fixed an issue which could cause a crash when capturing to a device</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5221">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5221">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5222">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5222">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5223">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5223">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5224">我們已修正有時候可能難以查看鍵盤焦點的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5224">We fixed an issue where keyboard focus could sometimes be difficult to see</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5225">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5225">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5226">我們已修正不正確地將未啟用的增益集顯示為已啟用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5226">We fixed an issue which could incorrectly display an add-in as being enabled when it was not.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5227">我們已修正會在有大量原則時，使得客戶無法檢視所有保留原則的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5227">We fixed an issue which would prevent a customer from viewing all retention policies if there were a large number of them</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5228">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5228">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5229">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5229">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5231">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5231">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>

## <a name="june-14-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5232">2019 年 6 月 14 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5232">June 14, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5233">版本 1907 (組建 11807.20000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5233">Version 1907 (build 11807.20000)</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5234">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5234">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5235">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5235">Word</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5236">我們已修正了儲存到 OneDrive 時，使用者可能無法登入的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5236">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from signing in when saving to OneDrive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5237">我們已修正了使用者可能無法變更限制存取模式中之 SharePoint 內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5237">We fixed an issue where a user could be prevented from changing SharePoint properties while in restricted access mode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5238">我們已修正了調整邊界時，可能會變更頁首及頁尾內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5238">We fixed an issue where header and footer content could change when adjusting margins</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5239">我們已修正了切換成網頁檢視時，格式設定可能會中斷的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5239">We fixed an issue where formatting could break when switching to web view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5240">我們已修正了從 SharePoint 開啟時，使用者無法使用自訂欄位的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5240">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from using custom fields when opened from SharePoint</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5241">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5241">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5242">我們已修正了刪除篩選集之資料列時的效能問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5242">We fixed a performance issue when deleting rows of a filtered set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5243">我們已修正了有時可能會造成滑鼠在受保護檢視模式中閃爍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5243">We fixed an issue which could sometimes cause the mouse to flicker in protected view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5244">我們修正了刪除系列時，可能會導致當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5244">We fixed an issue which could have caused a crash when deleting a series</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5245">我們已修正了某些使用者即使在沒有提供的情況下，仍舊有新增版本歷程記錄之選項的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5245">We fixed an issue where some users would have the option to add version history when that was not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5246">我們已修正了使用試算表比較工具時，可能導致例外狀況的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5246">We fixed an issue which could have caused an exception when using the Spreadsheet Compare tool</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5247">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5247">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5261">我們已改善在 SharePoint 上編輯文件時的效能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5261">We improved performance when editing a document on SharePoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5262">我們已修正在 Adobe Illustrator 中所建立之向量影像無法正確顯示的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5262">We fixed an issue where vector-based images created in Adobe Illustrator would not display correctly</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5266">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5266">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5267">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5267">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5268">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5268">Outlook</span></span>

## <a name="may-31-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5275">2019 年 5 月 31 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5275">May 31, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5276">版本 1906 (組建 11722.20008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5276">Version 1906 (build 11722.20008)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5277">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5277">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5278">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5278">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dialog-for-contacting-support-now-is-dockable-and-appears-on-the-right"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5279">[連絡支援人員] 對話方塊現在可停駐，且會顯示在右側</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5279">Dialog for Contacting Support now is dockable and appears on the right</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5280">用於 [連絡支援人員] 的對話方塊現在會顯示在右側窗格中，並且會以停駐視窗形式開始。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5280">The dialog used for Contacting support will now appear in a pane on the right and will start off as a docked window.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="ink-in-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5281">在您的電子郵件中使用筆跡！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5281">Ink in Your Email!</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5282">您現在可以在您的 Outlook 電子郵件中繪製圖片並加上註釋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5282">You can now draw and annotate pictures in your Outlook emails.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5283">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5283">Word</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-document-links-in-word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5284">在 Word 中開啟文件連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5284">Open document links in Word</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5285">當您在 Office 中按一下文件連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 Word App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5285">When you click a document link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the Word app by default.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5286">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5286">To update your preference go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5287">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5287">Learn more: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5288">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5288">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5289">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5289">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5290">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5290">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5291">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5291">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5292">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5292">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5293">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5293">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5294">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5294">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5295">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5295">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5296">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 Word 文件的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5296">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link tot a Word document stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5297">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5297">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5298">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5298">PowerPoint</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-presentation-links-in-powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5299">在 PowerPoint 中開啟簡報連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5299">Open presentation links in PowerPoint</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5300">當您在 Office 中按一下連結連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 PowerPoint App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5300">When you click a presentation link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the PowerPoint app by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5301">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5301">To update your preference go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5302">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5302">Learn more: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5303">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5303">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5304">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5304">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5305">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5305">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5306">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5306">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5307">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5307">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5308">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5308">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5309">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5309">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5310">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5310">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5311">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 PowerPoint 簡報的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5311">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link to a PowerPoint presentation stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5312">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5312">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5313">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5313">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-workbook-links-in-excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5314">在 Excel 中開啟活頁簿連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5314">Open workbook links in Excel</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5315">當您在 Office 中按一下活頁簿連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 Excel App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5315">When you click a workbook link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the Excel app by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5316">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5316">To update your preference, go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5317">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5317">Learn More: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5318">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5318">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5319">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5319">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5320">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5320">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5321">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5321">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5322">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5322">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5323">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5323">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5324">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5324">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5325">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5325">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5326">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 Excel 活頁簿的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5326">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link to an Excel workbook stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5327">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5327">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5335">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5335">PowerPoint</span></span>

## <a name="may-17-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5366">2019 年 5 月 17 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5366">May 17, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5367">版本 1906 (組建 11708.20006)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5367">Version 1906 (build 11708.20006)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5368">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5368">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5369">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5369">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="user-experience-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5370">使用者體驗更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5370">User Experience Updates</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5371">[即將推出] 中的更新現已發佈，其中包括簡化功能區、資料夾窗格的新版視覺效果、郵件清單，以及讀取窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5371">Updates that have been in Coming Soon are now here, featuring the Simplified Ribbon, and a visual refresh of the folder pane, message list, and reading pane.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5372">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5372">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5373">這些變更會成為新的預設 UI。自 12 月中旬起，即可透過 [即將推出] 開關切換使用這套 UI，協助您徹底發揮生產力</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5373">These change will be part of the new default UI; it has been available behind the Coming Soon switch since mid Dec for 100% prod</span></span>
 
#### <a name="customizable-simplified-ribbon"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5374">自訂簡化功能區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5374">Customizable Simplified Ribbon</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5375">提供輕鬆自訂功能，方便在傳統與 [簡化] 檢視之間切換，以及釘選/取消釘選命令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5375">Easily customizable to switch between classic and Simplified views and pin/unpin commands.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5376">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5376">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5377">使用者可以使用簡化功能區，方法是開啟 [即將推出] (在一開始)，然後按一下功能區中的＞形箭號，即可在傳統的多行功能區與新式的簡化單行功能區之間切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5377">Users can get to the simplified ribbon by turning on Coming Soon (initially) and clicking the chevron in the ribbon to toggle between the classic multi-line ribbon and the new simplified single-line ribbon.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5378">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5378">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5379">從傳統功能區切換到簡化功能區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5379">Switch from Classic ribbon to Simplified ribbon</span></span>
 
#### <a name="pick-your-favorite-action"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5380">挑選您的最愛動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5380">Pick your favorite action</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5381">不使用 [標幟] 和 [刪除] 嗎？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5381">Don't use Flag and Delete?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5382">那麼 [封存] 或 [標示為已讀取] 呢？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5382">How about Archive or Mark as Read?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5383">自訂快速動作功能表，加上您最常使用的命令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5383">Customize the quick action menu with the commands you use most.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5384">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5384">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5385">若要選取 [快速動作]，請以滑鼠右鍵按一下郵件清單中的 [電子郵件]，以顯示內容功能表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5385">To select your Quick Actions, right click on an email in the message list to bring up the Context Menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5386">然後按一下 [設定快速動作...]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5386">Then click "Set Quick Actions..."</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5387">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5387">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5388">將 [標幟] 和 [刪除] 的預設值變更為 [封存]、[移動]、[標示為已讀取] 或 [無]，以便清除郵件清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5388">Change the defaults from flag and delete to either archive, move,  mark as read, or none for a cleaner message list</span></span>
 
#### <a name="relaxed-or-tighter-layout-you-choose"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5389">寬鬆或緊密的版面配置？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5389">Relaxed or tighter layout?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5390">由您選擇</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5390">You choose</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5391">若您想讓郵件之間能有更多空間，可以採用「緊密間距」；或者，您也可以採用緊密的版面配置，以便查看更多郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5391">Use Tighter Spacing lets you decide if you want more space between items, or a tighter layout to see more.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5392">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5392">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5393">前往 [檢視] 索引標籤，勾選 [更緊密的間距] 核取方塊。若是使用傳統功能區，該核取方塊位於「郵件」群組內；若是使用簡化功能區，則是位於「目前檢視」設定當中</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5393">View tab, use tighter spacing checkbox - in Messages group for classic ribbon, Current View settings for simplified ribbon</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5394">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5394">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5395">使用 Outlook 在未啟用設定的情況下分類及撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5395">Use Outlook to triage and write email with and without the setting enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5396">如果開啟 [使用更緊密的間距]，即可讓每個頁面能夠容納得下更多郵件，並讓撰寫表單的控制項更為簡潔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5396">With Use tighter spacing on, more messages fit per page, and controls on the compose forms are more streamlined.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dedupe-mru-entries-when-using-the-onedrive-sync-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5397">使用 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端時的刪除重複資料 MRU 項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5397">Dedupe MRU entries when using the Onedrive sync client</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5398">透過刪除重複資料 MRU 項目，改善 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端與雲端附件的整合度並加快附加速度，讓其速度足以媲美同步處理資料的複製行為</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5398">Enable better integration with onedrive sync client with cloud attachments by deduping the mru entries and to enable faster attach as copy behavior for synchronized data</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5399">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5399">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5400">若您使用的是 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端，將再也看不到「附加檔案 MRU」的檔案重複項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5400">If you use the OneDrive sync client, you will no longer see file duplicates in the Attach File MRU.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5401">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5401">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5402">啟用 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端，並使用 Outlook 電腦版的 [附加檔案] 功能表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5402">Enable the OneDrive sync client and use the Attach File menu in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
#### <a name="improved-shared-folder-synchronization-for-mailboxes-with-many-folders"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5403">已改善擁有多個資料夾的信箱共用資料夾同步處理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5403">Improved shared folder synchronization for mailboxes with many folders</span></span>

## <a name="april-19-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5506">2019 年 4 月 19 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5506">April 19, 2019</span></span>
