## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5508">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5508">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5509">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5509">Outlook</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5510">**搜尋人員時取得電子郵件建議：** 當您在 [搜尋] 方塊中輸入人員的名稱時，最相關的電子郵件訊息會包括在您的搜尋建議中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5510">**Get email suggestions when you search for a person:** When you type a person's name in the Search box, the most relevant email messages will be included with your search suggestions.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5511">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5511">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="improved-filled-maps-experience-using-data-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5512">使用資料類型改善區域分布圖體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5512">Improved Filled Maps experience using Data Types</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5513">此功能是針對使用 Excel 的地理資料類型繪製區域分布圖圖表使用者的增強功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5513">This feature is an improvement for users who plot Filled Map Charts using Excel's Geographic Data Types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5514">對使用者的優點是功能之間有更豐富的整合，以及使用者要對應的區域會有更好的精確度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5514">The benefit to the end users will be richer integration between the features and better accuracy of the region the end user wants to map.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5515">其他優點包括功能能夠對應城市多邊形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5515">Additional benefits include - ability to map city polygons.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5516">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5516">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5517">此功能是 Excel 內現有功能的增強功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5517">This feature is an improvement to the existing features within Excel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5518">若要使用增強功能，請將位置轉換為豐富的實體，並使用區域分布圖繪製。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5518">To use the improvement - convert locations into Rich Entities and plot with Filled Maps.</span></span> 
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5519">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5519">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5520">使用者可以嘗試對應城市、省/市、縣/市、國家/地區和郵遞區號。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5520">Users can try mapping cities, states, counties, countries and zip codes.</span></span>

## <a name="april-5-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5568">2019 年 4 月 5 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5568">April 5, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5569">版本 1904 (組建 11527.20014)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5569">Version 1904 (build 11527.20014)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5570">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5570">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5571">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5571">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="outlook-for-windows--set-and-share-your-focused-inbox-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5572">Windows 版 Outlook：設定並共用您的 [焦點收件匣] 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5572">Outlook for Windows:  set and share your Focused Inbox settings</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5573">[焦點收件匣] 喜好設定會儲存在雲端內，因此當您在任何電腦上使用 Windows 版 Outlook 和 Outlook 網頁版時，都可以取得相同的一致體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5573">Your Focused Inbox preferences are stored in the cloud so you can enjoy the same consistent experience when using Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web on any computer.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5574">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5574">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5575">在 [檔案] > [選項] > [一般] 索引標籤下，還有一個名為 [將我的 Outlook 設定儲存在雲端中] 的新喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5575">Under File > Options > General tab, there is a new preference for 'Store my Outlook settings in the cloud'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5576">使用者需要核取方塊，才能讓他們的 [焦點收件匣] 設定漫遊到其他電腦的 Outlook 安裝和 OWA。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5576">Users will need to check the box to enable their Focused Inbox setting to roam to other Desktop Outlook installations and OWA.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5577">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5577">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5578">在已開啟雲端設定喜好設定的電腦上變更 [焦點收件匣]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5578">Change Focused Inbox on the machine that has cloud settings preference turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5579">瀏覽至 OWA，然後查看那裡也同樣套用了喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5579">Navigate to OWA and see the preference applied there as well.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5580">在 OWA 變更 [焦點收件匣]，然後啟動電腦版 Outlook 查看已反映喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5580">Change Focused Inbox in OWA and start Desktop Outlook to see the preference reflected.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5581">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5581">Word</span></span>
 
#### <a name="learning-tools-mode-has-additional-support-for-more-page-colors"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5582">[學習工具] 模式額外支援更多頁面色彩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5582">Learning Tools mode has additional support for more page colors</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5583">Word 中的 [學習工具] 新增更多頁面佈景主題色彩的支援，讓您能夠變更頁面的背景色彩。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5583">Learning Tools in Word adds support for more page theme colors, which allows the changing of the background color of the page.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5584">許多人在背景全白或全黑時閱讀會有困難，因此我們在 PC 版和 Mac 版 Word 中擴大了色彩選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5584">Many people have challenges reading with an all-white or all-black background, so we've expanded the choice of colors in Word on PC and Mac.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5585">快速入門：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5585">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5586">若要試用，請移至 [檢視] 索引標籤，選擇 [學習工具]，然後選擇 [頁面色彩]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5586">To try this out, go to the View tab and choose Learning Tools, and then Page Color.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5587">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5587">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5588">若要試用，請移至 [檢視] 索引標籤，選擇 [學習工具]，然後選擇 [頁面色彩]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5588">To try this out, go to the View tab and choose Learning Tools, and then Page Color.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5589">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5589">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="elevate-creativity-with-animated-3d-models"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5590">以具備動畫效果的 3D 模型提高創意</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5590">Elevate Creativity with Animated 3D Models</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5591">Office 現在支援動畫模型，這類模型能在編輯器中播放，讓您的試算表更生動！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5591">Office now supports animated models, which will playback in the editor so you can bring your sheets to life!</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5592">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5592">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5593">開啟 Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5593">Open Excel</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5594">插入具備動畫效果的 3D 模型 (很快會進到 Remix，但現在請在此位置存取動畫模型：\\osan\ogx\Public\TestFiles\3D Models\Animated3D\C3Art)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5594">Insert an animated 3D Model (coming to Remix soon, but for now, access animated models here: \\osan\ogx\Public\TestFiles\3D Models\Animated3D\C3Art)</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5595">動畫模型會在編輯器中播放！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5595">The animated model will play in the editor!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5596">[檢查投影片放映] 模式 - 動畫模型也會在那裡播放！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5596">Check Slideshow mode - it will play there too!</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5597">在 3D 格式功能區中，探索模型中更多的動畫場景</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5597">In the 3D Format Ribbon, explore more animation scenes in the model</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5598">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5598">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5599">插入動畫模型，然後看它在編輯器中播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5599">Insert an animated model and watch it play in the editor</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5600">透過 3D 格式功能區中的 [場景庫]，探索動畫模型中可用的動畫場景</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5600">Explore the animation scenes available in the animated model via the Scenes Gallery, available in the 3D Format Ribbon</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5601">透過功能區、浮動工具列或空格鍵輕鬆地播放/暫停動畫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5601">Easily play/pause the animation via the ribbon, floatie or space bar</span></span>

-

## <a name="february-15-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5746">2019 年 2 月 15 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5746">February 15, 2019</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5747">版本 1903 (組建 11310.20016)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5747">Version 1903 (build 11310.20016)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5748">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5748">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5749">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5749">PowerPoint</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="morph-transition-enhancements---morph-by-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5750">轉化轉場增強效果 - 依名稱轉化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5750">Morph Transition Enhancements - Morph by Name</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5751">選取要轉化的圖形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5751">Specify the shapes you want to morph</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5752">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5752">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5753">若要使轉化將兩個物件視為同一個物件，使用者可以使用 [選取窗格] 重新命名圖形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5753">To get Morph to treat two objects as the same object, the user can rename the shapes using the Selection Pane.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5754">名稱前面必須加上「!!」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5754">The name must be prefaced with "!!"</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5755">(兩個半形驚嘆號)，轉化才能用來覆寫預設比對行為，例如「!!名稱」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5755">(two exclamation points) for Morph to use it to override our default matching behavior, e.g. "!!Name"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5756">使用者可以繼續將圖形重新命名為不是以「!!」為開頭的任何名稱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5756">Users can continue to rename shapes with any name that doesn't start with "!!"</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5757">不必擔心會變更轉化的運作方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5757">without worrying that it will change the way Morph works</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5760">建立新投影片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5760">Create a new slide</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5762">開啟 [選取窗格]，將投影片 1 中的矩形重新命名為「!!圖形」，將投影片 2 中的三角形重新命名為「!!圖形」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5762">Open SelectionPane, rename the Rectangle in slide 1 to "!!shape", and rename the Triangle in slide 2 to "!!shape"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5763">將 [轉化] 套用至第 2 張投影片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5763">Apply Morph on the 2nd slide</span></span>

# <a name="release-notes-for-office-insiders"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5845">Office 測試人員的版本資訊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5845">Release Notes for Office Insiders</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5846">本文包含 Windows 電腦版 Word、Excel、PowerPoint、Outlook、Access 和 Project 測試人員組建的版本資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5846">This article contains release notes for Insider builds of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Access, and Project for Windows desktop.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5847">我們每週都會強調有趣的新功能、重要修正，以及我們想讓您知道的重大問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5847">Every week, we'll highlight interesting new features, important fixes, and any significant issues we want you to know about.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5848">請注意，我們在一段時間內會經常推出新功能 (某些時候還有修正) 給測試人員。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5848">Note that we often roll out features (and sometimes even fixes) to Insiders over a period of time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5849">這樣可讓我們確保功能都運作順利，然後才推出給更廣泛的對象。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5849">This allows us to ensure that things are working smoothly before releasing the feature to a wider audience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5850">因此，如果您沒有在以下描述的內容中看到某些項目，請不用擔心，您最終還是會看到它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5850">So, if you don't see something described below, don't worry you'll get it eventually.</span></span>  

> [!IMPORTANT]
> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5851">我們會變更 Microsoft 365 應用程式的更新通道，包括新增新的更新通道 (每月企業通道)，並變更現有的更新通道名稱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5851">We’re making some changes to the update channels for Microsoft 365 Apps, including adding a new update channel (Monthly Enterprise Channel) and changing the names of the existing update channels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5852">如需深入了解，[請閱讀本文](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2127441)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5852">To learn more, [read this article](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2127441).</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> - <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5853">版本資訊會每週發佈，可能是多個組建的編譯。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5853">Release notes are posted weekly and may be a compilation of multiple builds.</span></span>
> - <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5854">版本資訊發佈日期可能與實際組建發行日期不相符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5854">The release notes publication date may not match the actual build release date.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE)

## <a name="version2006may29"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5857">版本2006：5月29日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5857">Version 2006: May 29</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5858">*版本2006（組建12920.20000）*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5858">*Version 2006 (Build 12920.20000)*</span></span>

### <a name="featureupdates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5859">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5859">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5860">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5860">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5861">**新增至 Outlook toast 通知的其他按鈕：** 快速動作按鈕現在會出現在 Windows 10 上執行 Outlook 的 Outlook toast 通知中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5861">**Additional buttons added to Outlook toast notifications:** Quick Action buttons now appear in Outlook toast notifications when running Outlook on Windows 10.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5862">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5862">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5863">**改進 PowerPoint 中的資料流程影片效能：** 我們已改進 Microsoft Stream 影片的播放效能，以盡可能縮短影片載入時間，並產生流暢的觀賞體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5863">**Improved Stream video performance in PowerPoint:** We've made improvements to the playback performance of Microsoft Stream videos to minimize video loading time and create a smooth viewing experience.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5864">使用 Microsoft Stream 的公司影片來建立更佳的簡報。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5864">Use your corporate videos from Microsoft Stream to create better presentations.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE FEATUREDETAILS CONTENT END)

<br/>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT START)

### <a name="resolvedissues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5867">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5867">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5868">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5868">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5869">我們已修復此問題：在使用 OneDrive 時，Excel 會不時關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5869">We fixed an issue where Excel would occasionally shut down when engaging OneDrive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5870">我們已修復此問題：按一下相同活頁簿中的已加書簽的超連結時，將會隱藏該活頁簿。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5870">We fixed an issue where clicking a bookmarked hyperlink within the same workbook would cause the workbook to be hidden.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5871">已修正此問題：某些複本和貼上的圖表連結使用對應的磁片磁碟機位址，而不是通用位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5871">We fixed an issue where some copy and pasted chart links used mapped drive addresses rather than universal addresses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5872">我們已修復此問題：在使用 Ctrl + Shift + 箭號鍵以在 Excel 視窗透過團隊共用時，Excel 可能會變得無回應。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5872">We fixed an issue where Excel could become unresponsive after using Ctrl+Shift+Arrow keys to scroll when the Excel window was shared through Teams.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5873">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5873">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5874">我們修正了在使用滑鼠滾輪縮放後，投影片未居中的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5874">We fixed an issue where slides were not centered after zooming using the mouse wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5875">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5875">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5876">我們已修復此問題：將文字複製並貼到批註窗格時，不會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5876">We fixed an issue where copy and pasting text to a comment pane would not be displayed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5877">我們已修正此問題：批註提示氣泡在100% 縮放顯示時會出現模糊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5877">We fixed an issue where comment hint bubbles appeared blurry at 100% zoom.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5878">我們已修復此問題：啟用原則 Word 2007 和更新版本的二進位檔案和範本會導致一些共同撰寫案例失敗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5878">We fixed an issue where enabling policy Word 2007 and later Binary Documents and Templates would cause some co-authoring cases to fail.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5879">我們已修復此問題：不會開啟具有長路徑名稱（大於32K）的檔案，也不會顯示適當的錯誤訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5879">We fixed an issue where files with long path names (greater than 32K) would not open and an appropriate error message was not being displayed.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5883">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5883">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5884">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5884">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5885">**儲存至固定資料夾：** 固定資料夾可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Office 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5885">**Save to Pinned Folders:** Pin your folders makes saving Office files easier.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5886">我們收到意見反應，讓使用者在儲存新檔案時，更能控制可使用的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5886">We received feedback that users want more control over the folders available when a new file is saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5887">我們非常高興可為您提供新功能：在 [儲存] 對話方塊中固定您的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5887">We're excited to bring a new capability to you: pin your folders in the Save dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5888">這項新功能可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Word、Excel 及 PowerPoint 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5888">This new capability will make saving your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files easier.</span></span><br /><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5889">在[部落格文章](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)中查看詳細資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5889">See details in [blog post](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5890">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5890">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5891">**儲存至固定資料夾：** 固定資料夾可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Office 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5891">**Save to Pinned Folders:** Pin your folders makes saving Office files easier.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5892">我們收到意見反應，讓使用者在儲存新檔案時，更能控制可使用的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5892">We received feedback that users want more control over the folders available when a new file is saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5893">我們非常高興可為您提供新功能：在 [儲存] 對話方塊中固定您的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5893">We're excited to bring a new capability to you: pin your folders in the Save dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5894">這項新功能可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Word、Excel 及 PowerPoint 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5894">This new capability will make saving your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files easier.</span></span><br /><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5895">在[部落格文章](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)中查看詳細資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5895">See details in [blog post](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5896">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5896">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5897">**儲存至固定資料夾：** 固定資料夾可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Office 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5897">**Save to Pinned Folders:** Pin your folders makes saving Office files easier.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5898">我們收到意見反應，讓使用者在儲存新檔案時，更能控制可使用的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5898">We received feedback that users want more control over the folders available when a new file is saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5899">我們非常高興可為您提供新功能：在 [儲存] 對話方塊中固定您的資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5899">We're excited to bring a new capability to you: pin your folders in the Save dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5900">這項新功能可讓您更輕鬆地儲存 Word、Excel 及 PowerPoint 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5900">This new capability will make saving your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files easier.</span></span><br /><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5901">在[部落格文章](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)中查看詳細資料</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5901">See details in [blog post](https://blog-insider.office.com/2020/05/18/pin-your-folders-makes-saving-office-files-easier/)</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5904">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5904">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5905">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5905">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5906">我們修正了錯誤訊息：「另一個使用者目前無法關閉此活頁簿」，因為增益集是以字母順序，而不是以使用者指定的順序載入，所以會出現此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5906">We fixed an issue where the error message: “This workbook is currently referenced by another and cannot be closed” would appear because Add-ins were being loaded in alphabetical order rather than in a user specified order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5907">我們已修正此問題：在 Excel 與部分協力廠商的輔助技術應用程式之間管理字體時，記憶體遭到損毀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5907">We fixed an issue where memory was being corrupted when managing fonts between Excel and some third party assistive technology applications.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5908">我們已修復此問題：當增益集要求包含具有 noSelect 鎖定之圖形的工作表上的主項目目時，Excel 會損毀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5908">We fixed an issue where Excel would crash when Add-ins ask for Host Items on worksheets that contain shapes with noSelect locks.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5909">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5909">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5910">已修正此問題：當使用者在資料夾之間移動專案時，未能正確地激發 BeforeItemMove 事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5910">We fixed an issue where the Folder.BeforeItemMove event didn't fire correctly when a user moved items between folders.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5911">我們已修復此問題：使用者看到跨越午夜臨界值的行事曆專案，視為全天事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5911">We fixed an issue where users saw calendar items that spanned the midnight threshold as All day events.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5912">我們已修復此問題：當兩個增益集將按鈕新增至功能區中的相同群組時，Outlook 會當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5912">We fixed an issue where Outlook crashed when two Add-ins added a button to the same group in the ribbon.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5913">我們修正了使用者無法與來賓使用者共用行事曆的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5913">We fixed an issue where users were unable to share a calendar with a guest user.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5914">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5914">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5915">我們修正了簡報區域的放大和縮小導致縮放選取專案選取範圍與滑鼠指標之間的間隙。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5915">We fixed an issue where zooming in and out from the presentation area resulted in a gap between the zoomed selection marquee and the mouse pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5916">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5916">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5917">已修正此問題：在按一下 [選項] 後，Project 會損毀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5917">We fixed an issue where Project would crash after clicking on Options.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5918">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5918">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5919">我們已修正問題：批註中的超連結無法運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5919">We fixed an issue where hyperlinks in comments weren’t working.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5920">我們修正了簡報區域的放大和縮小導致縮放選取專案選取範圍與滑鼠指標之間的間隙。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5920">We fixed an issue where zooming in and out from the presentation area resulted in a gap between the zoomed selection marquee and the mouse pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5921">我們已修正此問題：在行事曆 WordMail 中粘貼 HTML 時無法運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5921">We fixed an issue where pasting HTML into WordMail for Calendar wasn’t working.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5922">我們已修復此問題：回復共同撰寫的會話中的批註有時會導致 Word 凍結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5922">We fixed an issue where replying to a comment in a co-authored session could sometimes cause Word to freeze.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5942">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5942">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5943">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5943">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5944">我們修正了在使用者刪除合併欄時，改善使用者效能的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5944">We fixed an issue that resulted in improved performance time for users when they deleted merged columns.</span></span>
- <div><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5945">我們修正了導致印表機名稱重複出現在可用印表機清單中的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5945">We fixed an issue that caused printer names to be duplicated in the list of available printers.</span></span></div>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5946">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5946">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5947">我們已修復此問題：使用英文（QWERTZ）鍵盤時，鍵盤快速鍵和拼寫檢查不會如預期的方式運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5947">We fixed an issue where keyboard shortcuts and spell check wouldn’t function as expected when using an English Switzerland (QWERTZ) keyboard.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5948">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5948">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5949">我們已修復此問題：在空白檔上新增批註時，不會執行任何動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5949">We fixed an issue where adding a new comment on a blank document wouldn't do anything.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5950">我們已修復此問題：在包含一百個專案的檔中插入或更新索引時，會導致應用程式當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5950">We fixed an issue where inserting or updating an Index in a document containing more than a hundred entries would result in the application crashing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5951">我們已修復此問題：自訂 xml 值開啟的檔案非常緩慢。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5951">We fixed an issue where files with custom xml values opened extremely slowly.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5952">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5952">Office Suite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5953">我們已在 Visual Basic for Applications 中修正了 Microsoft Office 中的問題，在此情況下，Office 應用程式會在載入時，由 Office 應用程式查看包含對文件庫名稱或文件庫路徑中之 DBCS 字元的程式碼庫參考的某些 VBA 專案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5953">We fixed an issue in Visual Basic for Applications in Microsoft Office where certain VBA projects that contain references to code libraries with DBCS characters in the library name or library path would be viewed by the Office application as corrupt on load.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5987">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5987">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5988">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5988">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5989">修正圖表資料表無法正確呈現日期座標軸中的值的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5989">Fixed an issue where chart data table could render values in a date axis incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5990">修正使用 [頁面配置] 或 [分頁預覽] 之後無法停用分頁符號的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5990">Fixed an issue where page breaks could not be disabled after going into Page Layout or Page Break Preview.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5991">修正隱藏和取消隱藏具有系列資料的欄之後，圖表線條樣式可能會遺失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5991">Fixed an issue where chart line styles could be lost after hiding and unhiding columns with series data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5992">在已篩選清單中插入欄的時間會比預期更長。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5992">Inserting a column in a filtered list would take longer than expected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5993">當您使用舊版的「共用活頁簿」模式，嘗試為活頁簿的新工作表列出變更時，就會發生當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5993">A crash could occur when trying to list changes on a new sheet for a workbook using legacy "Shared Workbook" mode.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5994">修正啟用 [負值以補色顯示] 選項後，可能無法儲存樞紐分析表中的自訂格式設定的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5994">Fixed the issue where custom formatting in Pivot charts may not be saved when the "Invert if negative" option was enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5995">修正如果選取 [負值以補色顯示] 選項，可能無法儲存樞紐分析表中單一資料點的自訂格式設定的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5995">Fixed an issue where custom formatting for a single data point in a Pivot chart was not saved if the "Invert if negative" option was selected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5996">這項變更修正在 CSV 檔案中上傳 '@' 字元時，會導致將 '@' 字元之後的字串轉換成公式的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5996">This change fixes an issue where the '@' character uploaded in a CSV file, would result in the string after the '@' character to be converted to a formula.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5997">修正無法正確捨入 SEQUENCE 函數中十進位值的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5997">Fixed an issue where decimal values in the SEQUENCE function were not rounded correctly.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5998">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5998">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-5999">解決導致使用者在 Outlook 桌面用戶端中按一下非常長的安全連結時，由於截斷而無法載入的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-5999">Addresses an issue that caused very long safelinks that users clicked on in the Outlook Desktop client to fail to load due to truncation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6000">修正當與伺服器同步處理時，名稱中包含 DBCS (雙位元組字元集) 字元的 Outlook 資料夾會間斷消失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6000">Fixed an issue where Outlook folders with names containing DBCS (Double Byte Character Set) characters would intermittently disappear when synchronizing with the server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6001">為此，必須為 Outlook 設定 IMAP 帳戶，並在地區設定設定為日文的系統上執行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6001">For this to happen, Outlook had to be configured with an IMAP account and running on a system with the locale set to Japanese.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6002">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6002">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6003">已修正問題：如果使用者建立了註解，但未張貼就關閉 [註解] 窗格，然後開啟新視窗、瀏覽多張投影片並關閉視窗，最後再開啟原始簡報中的 [註解] 窗格，將導致無法使用草稿註解。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6003">Fixed an issue where if a user created a comment without posting it and closed the Comments pane, then opened a new window, navigated through multiple slides and, closed the window, and finally re-opened the Comments pane in the original presentation, the draft comments would not be available.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6004">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6004">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6005">修正問題：如果 Project 連線至 Project Web App，且小數分隔符號是逗號，當新增延遲時，TaskDependencies Add 方法會失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6005">Fixed an issue where if Project is connected to the Project Web App and the decimal separator is a comma, TaskDependencies Add method fails when Lag is added.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6006">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6006">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6007">修正在 [共同作業] 模式時，在文件中插入註解並不總是成功的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6007">Fixed an issue where inserting comments on a document in collaboration mode would not always work.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6008">此變更修正在按一下 @ 提及時，[人員卡片] 會閃動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6008">This change fixes an issue where the People card would flash if the @ mention was clicked.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6009">修正問題：關閉具有草稿註解的文件時，會在不儲存草稿註解的情況下，提示使用者是否要關閉文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6009">Fixed the issue where closing a document with draft comments would prompt the user if they wanted to close the document without saving the draft comments.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6010">取消提示會關閉文件，而不是保持文件開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6010">Cancelling the prompt would close the document rather than leaving it open.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6011">修正翻譯已張貼註解將導致「插入已翻譯的文字失敗」錯誤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6011">Fixed an issue where translating a posted comment would result in the error "Inserting translated text failed".</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6012">在 Web 檢視/沉浸式閱讀器中，如果已在檢視中，按一下提示會捲動到最上方。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6012">In Web View/Immersive reader, clicking on a hint would scroll to the top even though it was already in view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6013">已修正這個問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6013">This has been fixed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6014">我們已修正一個問題，當嘗試使用新名稱儲存包含巨集的檔案時，無論使用者輸入什麼名稱，都會導致該檔案以.docx 副檔名和檔案名稱 WRO0004.docx 儲存，進而導致文件無法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6014">We fixed an issue that, when attempting to save a file containing a macro under a new name, would cause it to be saved with .docx extension and the filename WRO0004.docx, regardless of what the user entered, rendering the document unusable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6017">版本 2005 (組建 12816.20006)\*\*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6017">*Version 2005 (Build 12816.20006)*</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6019">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6019">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6020">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6020">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6021">這項變更修正了即使 LINEST 函式傳回正確的值，圖表趨勢線的 R 平方值 (在強制 y 截距的情況下) 仍然不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6021">This change fixes an issue where the chart trendline R-Squared value (in the forced y-intercept case) was incorrect even though the LINEST function returns the correct value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6022">此變更修正了自訂圖表趨勢線格式不一定會儲存的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6022">This change fixes an issue where customized chart trendline formatting was not always being saved.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6023">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6023">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6024">修正了 Office 功能區中群組行事曆分類按鈕已停用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6024">Fixed an issue where the Categorize button for group calendars in the Office Ribbon was disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6025">修正了企業客戶沒有執行或無法使用群組資料夾的問題，該問題會導致 Outlook 顯示「沒有回應」的訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6025">Fixed an issue where enterprise customers with group folders not implemented or not working, would result in Outlook displaying a "not responding" message.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6026">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6026">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6027">修正了將滑鼠游標移到星號 (\*) 符號，但不會顯示上一次更新文件的日期和使用者姓名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6027">Fixed an issue where hovering over the asterisk (\*) symbol did not display the user name and date of the last person to update the document.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6028">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6028">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6029">啟用「顯示書簽」選項卻不會顯示書簽。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6029">Enabling the option "Show bookmarks" would not display bookmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6030">已修正這個問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6030">This has been fixed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6031">此變更修正了下列問題：如果已啟用 [顯示功能變數代碼，而非其值] 選項，則含有超連結的文字可能不會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6031">This change fixes an issue where text with hyperlinks may not display if the option "Show field codes instead of their values" was enabled.</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT END)


## <a name="version-2005-april-17"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6033">版本 2005：4 月 17 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6033">Version 2005: April 17</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6034">*版本 2005 (組建 12810.20002)*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6034">*Version 2005 (Build 12810.20002)*</span></span>

[//]: # (DO NOT REMOVE BUGDETAILS CONTENT START)

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6036">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6036">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6037">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6037">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6038">已增加搭配圖表使用的 [自訂誤差線] 對話方塊上儲存格參照 [編輯] 控制項的大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6038">Increased the size of the cell reference edit controls on the Custom Error Bars dialog used with charts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6039">在 Excel 2016 中使用數位簽章所儲存的活頁簿，會在於目前版本的 Excel 中開啟時導致簽章失效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6039">Workbooks saved with a digital signature in Excel 2016 could have the signature invalidated upon opening in the current version of Excel.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6040">修正列印時表單控制項的核取方塊縮放問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6040">Fixed a problem with the scaling of checkboxes in form controls when printed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6041">在某些情況下，Application.Evaluate (VBA) 無法在使用者定義的函數中運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6041">Application.Evaluate (VBA) was not working for User-defined functions in some cases.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6042">此變更會修正設定格式化的條件 (CF) 資訊無法正確儲存到 XLSB 檔案的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6042">This change fixes an issue where conditional formatting (CF) information was not being saved to XLSB files correctly.</span></span>

### <a name="onenote"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6043">OneNote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6043">OneNote</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6044">修正將分行符號儲存為垂直 Tab 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6044">Fixed an issue where line breaks were being stored as vertical tabs.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6045">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6045">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6046">解決會導致使用者無法將個人連絡人群組新增為會議出席者的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6046">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to add a Personal Contact Group as a Meeting attendee.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6047">解決會導致還有 2 個月時間的會議，無法在排程小幫手中顯示會議主題的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6047">Addresses an issue that caused meetings that are more than 2 months away to fail to display a meeting subject in the Scheduling Assistant.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6048">解決會導致使用者在轉寄大型 HTML 郵件時看到郵件內文截斷的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6048">Addresses an issue that caused users to see message body truncation when forwarding large HTML messages.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6049">新增透過群組原則強制執行 S/MIME 預設登入設定的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6049">Added the ability to enforce S/MIME default signing configuration via group policy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6050">解決會導致為使用者主要信箱以外的信箱所建立的刪除規則變得無效的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6050">Addresses an issue that caused delete rules created for mailboxes other than the user's primary mailbox to become invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6051">解決在轉寄加密郵件時導致捨棄附件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6051">Addresses an issue that caused attachments to get dropped when forwarding an encrypted message.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6052">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6052">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6053">在表單檢視中編輯前置/後續任務資料時，會觸發額外的 ProjectBeforeTaskChange 事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6053">When Predecessor/Successor data is edited within a Form view, an extra ProjectBeforeTaskChange event is fired.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6054">修正變更連結至 SharePoint 工作清單之專案的面板狀態欄位時，Project 可能當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6054">Fixed an issue where Project may crash when changing the board status field on a project that is connected to a SharePoint task list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6055">修正儲存使用舊版 Project 建立的專案時，Project 可能當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6055">Fixed an issue where Project may crash when saving projects created with older versions of Project.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6081">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6081">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6082">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6082">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6083">修正工作窗格中表格的重新調整及重新整理問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6083">Fixed issues with resizing and refreshing tables in the task pane.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6084">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6084">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6085">修正在工作表上選取儲存格範圍會導致只選取單一儲存格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6085">Fixed an issue where selecting a range of cells on a sheet would result in the selection of a single cell.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6086">修正在為含有 X 軸範圍的圖表縮減大小時，可能會導致 Excel 停止回應的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6086">Fixed an issue which could cause Excel to stop responding when reducing the size of a chart with some x-axis ranges.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6087">修正插入使用者定義的圖表範本來作為預設值會導致其儲存為直條圖的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6087">Fixed an issue where inserting a user defined chart template as default would result in saving it as a column chart.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6088">修正當基礎資料儲存格沒有標題時，圖表上的資料標籤會以空白顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6088">Fixed an issue where Data labels on charts would display as blank when the underlying data cells did not have a caption.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6089">修正已啟用 R1C1 儲存格參照且正在共同撰寫/共用的 Excel 工作表，在將游標移到 [使用者目前狀態] 圖示上方時不會以 R1C1 模式顯示作用中儲存格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6089">Fixed an issue where an Excel sheet with R1C1 cell referencing enabled and is being co-authored / shared, hovering over the user presence icon does not display the active cell reference in R1C1 mode.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6090">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6090">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6091">解決會導致類別有時候會從電子郵件訊息中消失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6091">Addresses an issue that caused categories to occasionally disappear from email messages.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6092">解決會導致代理人在不同機器上所看到的共用信箱有不同資料夾階層的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6092">Addresses an issue that caused delegates to see different folder hierarchies on different machines for shared mailboxes.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6093">解決在嘗試檢視組織表單的屬性時，會導致使用者遇到當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6093">Addresses an issue that caused users to experience a crash when attempting to view the properties of an Organizational Form.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6094">解決在變更機器上的時區時，會導致某些提醒無法觸發的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6094">Addresses an issue that caused some reminders to fail to fire when changing the timezone on a machine.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6095">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6095">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6096">此變更修正了在 PowerPoint 或 Word 中呈現內嵌為 OLE 物件的舊版 Excel 圖表時可能不會永遠顯示圖表標題的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6096">This change fixes an issue where the rendering of a legacy Excel chart embedded as an OLE object in PowerPoint or Word may not always display the chart title.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6097">我們已修正將文字從 Excel 複製到 PowerPoint 時可能會導致其格式設定發生變更的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6097">We have fixed an issue when copying text from Excel to PowerPoint might change its formatting.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6098">此變更修正了使用 [全字拼寫須相符] 來尋找特殊字元時，不一定能正常運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6098">This change fixes an issue where finding special characters using 'find whole words only' did not always work as expected.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6099">專案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6099">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6100">修正了當開啟保護實際工作的設定時，使用者無法輸入分時期基準工時的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6100">Fixed an issue where the user couldn't enter time-phased Baseline Work when the setting to protect actual work is on.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6101">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6101">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6102">此變更修正了將游標暫留在提示上不會醒目提示其卡片的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6102">This change fixes an issue where hovering a cursor over a hint would not highlight its card.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6103">此變更修正了使用套索選取工具時，群組圖形中的文字會暫時消失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6103">This change fixes an issue that would cause the text in grouped shapes to disappear temporarily when using the Lasso selection tool.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6104">此變更修正了在 PowerPoint 或 Word 中呈現內嵌為 OLE 物件的舊版 Excel 圖表時可能不會永遠顯示圖表標題的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6104">This change fixes an issue where the rendering of a legacy Excel chart embedded as an OLE object in PowerPoint or Word may not always display the chart title.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6105">此變更修正了在雙頁檢視中建立註解時，註解錨點不一定會顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6105">This change fixes an issue in two page view, when creating a comment, the comment anchor did not always come into view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6106">修正如果段落的樣式是連結至清單的樣式上階，則該清單的編號可能會遺失的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6106">Fixed an issue where if a paragraph whose style is an ancestor of a style linked to a list, then the numbering of that list could be lost.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6118">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6118">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6119">解決了會讓 [附件工具] 中的 [儲存至雲端] 按鈕不見的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6119">Addresses an issue that caused the "Save to Cloud" button to be missing from Attachment Tools.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6120">解決了以下問題：當使用者從檢查程式視窗回覆受到數位版權管理的郵件，卻沒有所回覆郵件的擁有者權限時，使用者會無法新增簽名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6120">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to add a signature when replying to a digitally rights managed message from an inspector window when the user does not have Owner permission on the message being replied to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6121">解決了以下問題：使用者無法從網頁位置將其他附件新增到先前建立的會議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6121">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to add additional attachments from a web location to a previously created meeting.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6123">此變更修正了會導致包含 emojis 的 PowerPoint 檔案在儲存時發生失敗的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6123">This change fixes an error that could cause PowerPoint files containing emojis to fail when saving.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6124">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6124">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6125">修正了以下問題：如果執行 ' CustomFieldValueListGetItem' 且自訂欄位的查閱資料表不存在，系統會建立一個不應建立的空白查閱資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6125">Fixed an issue where if 'CustomFieldValueListGetItem' is executed and a lookup table for the custom field doesn't exist, an empty lookup table is created even though it should not be.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6126">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6126">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6127">此變更修正了以下問題：從 [檢視] 功能表選取多個頁面時，其中的 [註解] 窗格會顯示為空白。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6127">This change fixes an issue with multiple pages selected from the View menu, where the comments pane could be displayed as blank.</span></span>

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6132">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6132">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6133">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6133">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6134">**行事曆新版視覺效果：** 去年，我們提供了全新的郵件體驗，而今年將為您帶來嶄新的行事曆！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6134">**Calendar visual refresh:** Last year, we brought you a refreshed mail experience, and, this year, it is the calendar's turn to get a facelift!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6135">有幾項更新是新穎卻令人孰悉的，您是經驗豐富的 Outlook 使用者，可以立即使用並提高生產力。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6135">The updates are fresh but familiar so, as a seasoned Outlook user, you can jump in and be more productive right away.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6136">**協助保護群組中的資料：** 建立群組時所選擇的「敏感度」標籤會套用到群組電子郵件、文件及小組網站</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6136">**Help protect data in your group:** The Sensitivity label you choose when creating a group is applied to group email, documents, and team sites</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6138">**在投影片放映期間更新投影片：** 在簡報期間，更新由其他作者變更的投影片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6138">**Update slides during slide show:** Update slides changed by other authors during your presentation.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6141">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6141">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6142">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6142">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6143">此變更解決了處理格式錯誤或無效通訊協定資訊影像時所導致的延遲問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6143">This change addresses delays when processing images with malformed or invalid protocol information.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6144">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6144">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6145">此變更解決了處理格式錯誤或無效通訊協定資訊影像時所導致的延遲問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6145">This change addresses delays when processing images with malformed or invalid protocol information.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6146">此變更修正了電子郵件草稿最新變更未更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6146">This change fixes an issue where the latest changes to draft emails were not being updated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6147">已修正在檔案上按一下滑鼠右鍵並使用「傳送到」功能無法運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6147">Fixed an issue where right-mouse clicking on a file and using 'Send to' would not work.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6148">已修正如果使用者有自訂的 [通訊錄] 搜尋路徑，則 Outlook 的名稱解析範圍會限制為自訂路徑，而不是包括全域通訊清單 (GAL) 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6148">Fixed an issue where if a user had a customized the search path for the Address book, Outlook's name resolution scope would be limited to the customized path rather than including the Global Address List (GAL).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6149">已修正在一組傳回的搜尋結果中，依類別結果排序不會顯示類別色彩的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6149">Fixed an issue where within a set of returned search results, sorting the results by Categories would not display the Category colors.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6150">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6150">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6151">已修正當使用者按一下 [排程群組] 內 [工作] 功能區中的 [停用] 按鈕時，不會觸發 'ProjectBeforeTaskChange' Visual Basic Applications (VBA) 事件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6151">Fixed an issue where the 'ProjectBeforeTaskChange' Visual Basic Applications (VBA) event did not fire when a user clicked the "Inactivate" button found on the Tasks Ribbon within the Scheduling grouping.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6152">如果您在 [表單類型] 檢視中設定前置任務或後置任務詳細資訊，則 ProjectBeforeTaskChange Visual Basic Applications (VBA) 事件不會一律擷取變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6152">If you set predecessor or successor details from within a Form type view, the ProjectBeforeTaskChange Visual Basic Applications (VBA) event didn't always capture the changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6153">例如，如果刪除了某個相依性，並在表單上按一下 [確定]，則不會觸發該事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6153">For example, if you deleted a dependency and clicked OK on the form, the event did not fire.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6154">已修正此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6154">This behavior has been fixed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6155">已修正在進行變更 (例如日期變更) 之後，實際工作成本 (ACWP) 的最新值不會顯示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6155">Fixed an issue where the latest values for the Actual Cost of Work Performed (ACWP) would not be displayed after making a change, such as a date change.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6156">已修正使用「最近使用」(MRU) 功能表開啟專案時，會使用 [讀取/寫入] 存取權開啟專案的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6156">Fixed an issue where opening a project using the Most Recently Used (MRU) menu opened the project file with Read/Write access.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6157">這項變更修正了如果您建立包含開始日期和時間 (但無工期) 的手動工作，則時間表上的時間顯示不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6157">This change fixes an issue where if you created a manual task with a start date and a time (but no duration), it would be displayed with an incorrect time on the timeline.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6158">已修正使用回曆列印時間表時，會導致列印檢視中略過或重複一個月的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6158">Fixed an issue where printing a timeline using Hijri calendar would result in a month being skipped or duplicated in the print view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6159">這項變更解決了在團隊規劃中使用 GDI 物件時，可能導致 GDI 物件分配過多並產生記憶體不足的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6159">This change addresses an issue where working in Team Planner with GDI objects, could result in the over allocation of GDI objects and create low memory conditions.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6160">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6160">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6161">已修正張貼留言功能停用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6161">Fixed an issue where the functionality to post comments was disabled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6162">此變更解決了處理格式錯誤或無效通訊協定資訊影像時所導致的延遲問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6162">This change addresses delays when processing images with malformed or invalid protocol information.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6163">這項變更解決了帳戶管理員不會分派訊息而導致協力廠商應用程式懸置的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6163">This change addresses an issue where the account manager would not dispatch messages resulting in a hang with third party applications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6164">這項變更修正了目錄會使用文件中未包含的標題樣式進行更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6164">This change fixes an issue where the Table of Contents would get updated with heading styles which were not present in the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6165">已修正在寄送文件時，儲存在 Word 文件中的數位簽章會被刪除的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6165">Fixed an issue where digital signatures saved in Word documents would be removed when mailing the documents.</span></span>

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6170">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6170">Feature updates</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6171">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6171">Excel</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6182">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6182">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6183">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6183">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6184">修正國際版 Access 在使用者介面中顯示英文字串的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6184">Fixed an issue where international versions of Access were displaying English strings in the user interface.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6185">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6185">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6186">修正使用者在以程式設計方式編輯大量儲存格範圍時可能遇到的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6186">Fixed a performance issue that users may have experienced when programmatically editing a large range of cells.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6187">修正以日文環境開啟 CSV 檔案時發生的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6187">Fixed a performance issue that occurred when opening csv files with Japanese environments.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6188">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6188">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6189">解決將附件新增至郵件或從郵件拖放 (與透過功能表相對) 來儲存附件時，導致檔案的「上次修改」日期更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6189">Addresses an issue that caused the "Last Modified"; date on a file to be updated when adding an attachment to a mail or saving an attachment from a mail by dragging and dropping it (as opposed to via a menu).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6190">解決會導致在展開的尋找窗格中按一下 Enter 時無法開始搜尋，而是會要求使用者按一下 [搜尋] 按鈕的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6190">Addresses an issue that caused hitting enter in the expanded find pane to fail to start a search, requiring instead that users click on the search button.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6191">修正將 [如果有，顯示使用者的照片] 選項停用時，搜尋不會顯示有關使用者的任何資訊的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6191">Fixed an issue where search shows no information about users when the option to "Show user photographs when available" is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6192">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6192">Project</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6193">修正無法正確計算摘要工作日期的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6193">Fixed an issue where summary task dates weren't always getting calculated correctly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6194">修正不先執行 OpenUndoTransaction 方法就不能觸發 OnUndoOrRedo 事件的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6194">Fixed an issue where the OnUndoOrRedo event doesn't fire without first running the OpenUndoTransaction method.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6195">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6195">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6196">修正輸入或編輯備註然後使用 Ctrl+A 時，會導致選取畫布中的文字，而不只是選取備註卡片內文字的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6196">Fixed an issue when typing or editing a comment and using Ctrl+A would result in selecting text in the canvas instead of selecting text just within the comment card.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6197">我們已修正文件中的文字對齊，在使用 [快速列印] 進行列印之後嘗試進行編輯時變得混亂的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6197">We fixed an issue in which the alignment of words in a document gets scrambled when tried to edit after printing using Quick Print.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6198">我們已修正將兩份文件合併成一份文件時的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6198">We fixed an issue when merging two documents into one document.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6199">修正標示的修訂若與方程式有關，在儲存檔案時可能會導致失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6199">Fixed an issue where marking revisions involving equations could result in a failure when saving the file.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6204">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6204">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6205">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6205">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6206">修正使用 Outlook Web Access 建立規則時不會保存到 Exchange 伺服器，並導致衝突的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6206">Fixed an issue where creating a rule with Outlook Web Access did not persist to the Exchange server and resulted in a conflict.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6207">修正 Outlook 在深色模式中不會在 [寄件者:] 欄位中顯示下拉式清單的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6207">Fixed an issue with Outlook in dark mode would not display the drop down list in the 'From:' field.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6208">解決在其他應用程式中開啟某個檔案時，導致使用者無法透過檔案總管將該檔案附加至郵件訊息的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6208">Addresses an issue that caused users to be unable to attach a file to their mail message via the file explorer when that file was open in another application.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6209">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6209">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6210">修正將滑鼠移至縮圖上時，建議的縮圖閃動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6210">Fixed an issue where the recommended thumbnails flash when hovering your mouse over the thumbnails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6211">在某些情況下，這可能會導致 PowerPoint 當機。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6211">In some cases this could cause PowerPoint to crash.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6212">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6212">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6213">修正受保護無法編輯之文件的比較功能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6213">Fixed an issue with Compare feature for documents that were protected for editing.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6214">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6214">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6215">修正 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的使用者主體名稱 (UPN) 不再區分大小寫，導致在 SharePoint 上使用檔案時較少發生失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6215">Fixed an issue Word/Excel/PowerPoint where the User Principal Name (UPN) is no longer case sensitive resulting in less failures when working with files on SharePoint.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6216">修正 [檔案]\[選項] 對話方塊上的 [確定] 按鈕顯示為灰色停用狀態，但功能並未受影響的外觀問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6216">Fixed a cosmetic issue where the 'OK' button on the File \ Options dialog was being displayed as grayed out but functionality was not impacted.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6230">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6230">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6231">已修正交叉分析篩選器中的文字在預覽列印中無法正確縮放的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6231">Fixed an issue where text in a slicer isn't scaled properly in Print Preview.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6232">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6232">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6233">解決將附件新增至郵件或從郵件拖放 (與透過功能表相對) 來儲存附件時，導致檔案的「上次修改」日期更新的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6233">Addresses an issue that caused the "Last Modified" date on a file to be updated when adding an attachment to a mail or saving an attachment from a mail by dragging and dropping it (as opposed to via a menu).</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6234">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6234">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6236">在方程式中插入控制項 (例如文字內容控制項)，然後儲存再開啟檔案，便會導致內容無法讀取的錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6236">Inserting a control (such as a Text Content Control) in an equation then saving and opening the file results in an un-readable content error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6237">修正將先前使用密碼保護的檔案儲存到雲端儲存空間無法運作的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6237">Fixed an issue where saving a previously password protected file to a cloud storage would not work.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6238">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6238">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6239">修正在 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中開啟來自相同 SharePoint 文件庫的多個文件時，僅掃描開啟的第一個文件是否符合原則的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6239">Fixes an issue when multiple documents are open in Word/Excel/PowerPoint from the same SharePoint library, only the first document opened will be scanned for Policy compliance.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6249">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6249">Resolved issues</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6250">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6250">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6251">已修正使用者在重新命名樞紐分析表度量值時可能遇到的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6251">Fixed an issue that users may have experienced when renaming pivot table measures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6252">已修正使用者在使用 VBA 巨集清除範圍內容時可能遇到的效能問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6252">Fixed a performance issue that users may have experienced when using a VBA macro to clear the contents of a range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6253">已修正當使用者執行與功能區互動的巨集時，導致 UI 快閃的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6253">Fixed an issue that caused the UI to flash when users executed a macro that interacted with the ribbon.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6254">已修正當檔案中的第一個字為 TABLE 時，CSV 檔案載入錯誤的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6254">Fixed an issue where CSV files were loaded incorrectly when the first word in the file was TABLE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6255">已修正當您在兩個具有不同縮放比例的活頁簿之間切換時，使用者可能遇到的當機問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6255">Fixed an issue where users may have experienced crashes when switching between two workbooks that had different zoom levels.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6256">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6256">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6257">已解決當持續整夜執行 Outlook 時，導致使用者無法開啟公用資料夾訊息的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6257">Addressed an issue that caused users to be unable to open public folder messages when Outlook was left running overnight.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6258">已修正在新增 Gmail 帳戶的驗證工作流程中，[權限] 頁面上的 [允許] 和 [拒絕] 按鈕停用的爭用情況。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6258">Fixed a race condition where the 'Allow' and 'Deny' buttons on the permissions page are disabled during the authentication workflow of adding a Gmail account.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6259">已解決即使已關閉記錄，在某些情況下仍導致 Outlook 異常產生記錄輸出的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6259">Addressed an issue that caused Outlook to unexpectedly generate logging output in some scenarios, even when logging was turned off.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6260">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6260">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6261">已修正當滑鼠指標暫留在註解卡片上方時，未醒目提示註解卡片的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6261">Fixed an issue where comment cards don't always get highlighted when a mouse pointer hovers over the comment card.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6262">在使用中的文件共同撰寫工作階段中，直接在註解卡片中新增影像可能會導致新增標籤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6262">During an active document co-authoring session, adding an image directly in to a comment card may result in the addition of a tag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6263">我們已修正此問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6263">This issue has been fixed.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6264">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6264">Office Suite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6265">當您將 Multichoice/Lookup/Managed-metadata 屬性與 Word/Excel/PowerPoint 文件一起使用並儲存至 SharePoint 文件庫時，這些屬性之前限制為 255 個字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6265">When using Multichoice/Lookup/Managed-metadata properties with Word/Excel/PowerPoint documents and saving to a SharePoint Document Library, these properties were previously limited to 255 characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6266">當這些屬性超過 255 個字元時，這類文件就無法儲存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6266">When these properties exceeded 255 characters, such documents could not be saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6267">在此變更中，此限制已增加到 2048 個字元。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6267">With this change, this limit has been increased to 2048 characters.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6283">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6283">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6284">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6284">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6285">已解決導致使用者無法存取「空閒/忙碌選項」行事曆權限對話方塊的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6285">Addressed an issue that caused users to lose access to the "Free Busy Options" calendar permissions dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6286">修正了開啟某些從不同時區傳送的週期性會議執行個體時，可能會導致出現警示：「很抱歉，無法開啟這此項目」的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6286">Fixed an issue that may result in the alert: "Sorry we're having trouble opening this item" when opening some recurring meeting instances sent from a different time zone.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6287">已解決從該郵件拖放附件後造成使用者無法重新開啟 .msg 檔案的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6287">Addressed an issue that could cause users to be unable to reopen a .msg file after dragging and dropping an attachment from that message.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6288">修正從 Outlook 上傳檔案附件到 OneDrive 後，造成包含括號之附件名稱的檔案名稱被變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6288">Fixed an issue where after uploading a file attachment from Outlook to OneDrive could result in the file name being changed if the attachment's name contained parenthesis.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6289">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6289">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6290">修正儲存包含 Excel 圖表的 PowerPoint 或 Word 文件會導致失敗的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6290">Fixed an issue that could result in a failure to save a document in PowerPoint or Word containing an Excel chart.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6291">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6291">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6292">修正文件中的圖片在匯出成 PDF 後，會失去透明度的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6292">Fixed an issue where pictures in documents lose transparency when exported to PDF.</span></span>
