### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6297">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6297">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6298">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6298">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6299">**在查詢設計工具、SQL 檢視和關聯視窗中工作時更具生產力：** 在資料表上按一下滑鼠右鍵即可開啟、設計、調整大小及隱藏它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6299">**Be more productive working in Query Designer, SQL view, and the Relationships window:** Right-click a table to open, design, size, and hide it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6300">在 SQL 檢視中搜尋及取代文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6300">Search and replace text in SQL View.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6301">在 [關聯圖] 視窗中選取多個資料表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6301">Select multiple tables in the Relationships window.</span></span>

### <a name="resolved-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6304">解決的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6304">Resolved issues</span></span>
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6305">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6305">Access</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6306">此更新會修正使用 ADODB 的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6306">This update fixes an issue where using an ADODB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6307">VB 程式碼中的記錄器物件可能會不正確地報告錯誤。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6307">Recorder object in VB code may incorrectly report an error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6308">此更新修正可能會導致 Microsoft Access 無法識別連結的 SQL Server 資料表中的識別資料行的問題，這可能會導致不正確地將資料列報告為已刪除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6308">This update fixes an issue that can cause Microsoft Access to fail to identify an Identity Column in a linked SQL Server table, which can cause rows to be reported as deleted incorrectly.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6309">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6309">Excel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6310">修正使用「資料剖析」搭配動態陣列時，Excel 會當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6310">Fixed an issue where Excel would crash when using Text To Columns with dynamic arrays.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6311">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6311">Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6312">修正以月檢視在行事曆中捲動時，無法顯示之前的行事曆活動的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6312">Fixed an issue where scrolling in calendar with month view, fails to show previous calendar events.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6313">解決在 Citrix 環境中檢視 30 個以上的行事曆時，導致使用者遇到當機的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6313">Addresses an issue that caused users to experience a crash when viewing more than 30 calendars in a Citrix environment.</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6314">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6314">PowerPoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6315">修正關閉檔案之後，如果有任何事件處理常式正在執行，PowerPoint 就不會立即將它從 [簡報] 集合中移除的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6315">Fixed an issue where after closing a file, PowerPoint does not immediately remove it from the Presentations collection if there are any event handlers running.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6316">因此，物件模型報告的開啟中簡報數目會不正確，且會防止關閉 PowerPoint。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6316">Hence the number of open presentations reported by the object model is incorrect, and shutdown of PowerPoint is prevented.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6317">修正具有深色螢光筆色彩的白色文字，在灰階中會以黑色列印的螢光筆問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6317">Fixed an issue with highlighter : White texts with dark highlighter colors are printed as black in Grayscale.</span></span>

### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6318">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6318">Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6319">更新和瀏覽目錄時，有時可能會在文件上顯示灰色區域的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6319">Updating and scrolling through a table of contents may sometimes display a gray area over the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6320">修正共同撰寫文件時，可能不會保留根註解的草稿版本的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6320">Fixed an issue where if a document is being coauthored, the draft version of a root comment may not be preserved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6321">已修正在註解卡片之間來回切換時，有時會顯示一開始選取的註解，並將某選取範圍醒目提示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6321">Fixed an issue where going back and forth between comment cards would sometimes display the initially selected comment with a selection highlight.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6322">修正在已撰寫註解但未張貼，且使用者嘗試儲存檔案的情況下，使用 [瀏覽] 來儲存檔案沒有作用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6322">Fixed an issue where using 'Browse' to save a file did not work if a comment was written but not posted and the user tried to save the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6323">將 SlideTrack 啟用且 [註解] 窗格關閉時，Ctrl+Alt+M 可能無法開啟 [註解] 窗格的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6323">With SlideTrack enabled and the comments pane closed, Ctrl+Alt+M may not open the comments pane.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6324">修正在表格中新增 @提及時可能發生錯誤訊息：「文件中的表格已經毀損」的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6324">Fixed an issue when adding @mention in a table could generate the error message: 'A table in this document has become corrupted'.</span></span>

### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6325">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6325">Office Suite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6326">解決可能導致挪威耐諾斯克 (nn-no) 校訂工具套件安裝不正確的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6326">Resolves an issue that may have caused Norway Nynorsk (nn-no) proofing tools package to be installed incorrectly.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6368">**將圖形另存為圖片：** 只要按幾下，即可將圖形、圖示或其他物件另存成圖片，便於您於任何其他地方使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6368">**Save shapes as pictures:** In just a few clicks, save a shape, icon, or other object as a picture file so you can reuse it elsewhere.</span></span> [<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6369">深入了解</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6369">Learn more</span></span>](https://support.office.com/article/3c4f9ca4-945a-4c33-af91-d10e4e3ea715)

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6371">**使用者現在可以將 Word/Excel/Outlook 中的物件另存為 Windows 的圖片：** 如同在 PowerPoint 中已具有的功能，使用者現在可以將 Word、Excel 和 Outlook 中的物件另存為圖片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6371">**User can now save objects in Word/Excel/Outlook as a picture for Windows.:** With the ability already seen in PowerPoint, users can now save objects in Word, Excel and Outlook as a picture.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6372">物件包括圖形、圖示、圖片及其他內容！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6372">Objects include shapes, icons, pictures, and more!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6373">此功能只要按滑鼠右鍵的功能表就能存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6373">This can be accessed through the right-click menu.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6374">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6374">Word</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6375">**只要在 Word 中繪製圖形即可輕鬆選取筆跡：** [繪圖] 索引標籤上的 [套索] 工具可協助您選取使用筆跡繪製的物件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6375">**Easily select ink in Word by drawing a shape around it.:** The Lasso tool on the Draw tab helps you select objects drawn with ink.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6376">選取個別筆劃或整個字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6376">Select individual strokes, or whole words.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6377">當您有大量筆跡但只想要使用其中一部分時，這功能尤其方便。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6377">It's handy when you have lots of ink and you only want to work with some of it.</span></span> [<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6378">深入了解</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6378">Learn more</span></span>](https://support.office.com/article/6d76c674-7f4b-414d-b67f-b3ffef6ccf53)

### <a name="feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6457">功能更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6457">Feature updates</span></span>
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6458">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6458">Outlook</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6459">**進階群組電子郵件設定：** 此功能可協助使用者自訂要在收件匣中接收/追蹤哪些電子郵件或活動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6459">**Advanced group email settings:** This feature helps groups users to customize which emails or events to receive/follow in their inbox.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6460">**群組命名原則：** 群組命名原則可讓 IT 系統管理員將組織中使用者所建立群組的名稱標準化及管理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6460">**Groups Naming policy:** A group naming policy enables the IT admin to standardize and manage the names of groups created by users in the organization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6461">系統管理員可以要求在建立群組時，將特定首碼和尾碼新增至群組的名稱，而且可以封鎖使用特定字詞。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6461">The admin can require a specific prefix and suffix be added to the name for a group when it's created, and can block specific words from being used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6462">這有助於將群組名稱中使用不當字詞的情況最小化，以及 IT 管理其目錄中群組的表示方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6462">This helps minimize the use of inappropriate words in group names as well as IT manage the representation of groups in their directory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6463">命名原則也可協助部署小組網站的組織根據部門來分類。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6463">Naming Policy also helps organizations that deploy team sites to categorize them based on department.</span></span>
 
### <a name="office-suite"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6464">Office 套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6464">Office Suite</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6465">**索引標籤式窗格：** 現在您可以使用應用程式右側的索引標籤 UI，在多個窗格之間切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6465">**Tabbed Panes:** Now you can switch between multiple panes using a tab UI on the right hand side of the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6466">只有當您開啟 2 個以上的窗格時，該 UI 才會顯示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6466">The UI will only be visible when you have 2+ panes open.</span></span>

## <a name="august-09-2019br"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6890">**2019 年 8 月 9 日**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6890">**August 09, 2019**</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6891">版本 1909 (組建 12001.20000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6891">Version 1909 (Build 12001.20000)</span></span><br/>
 
### <a name="excel-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6892">Excel 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6892">Excel Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6893">**共同作業變得更容易：** 共同撰寫的增強功能表示，使用條件式格式設定、儲存格樣式等等時，您的變更會與共同作業者的變更順暢地合併。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6893">**Collaboration just got easier:** Co-authoring improvements mean that when working with conditional formatting, cell styles, and more, your changes are merged seamlessly with those of your collaborators.</span></span>
 
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6894">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6894">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6895">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6895">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="office-suite-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6896">Office 套件功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6896">Office Suite Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6897">**新的 Office 應用程式圖示：** 重新設計的應用程式圖示，可反映簡單、功能強大且智慧型的 Office 體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6897">**New Office app icons:** Redesigned app icons to reflect the simple, powerful, and intelligent experiences of Office</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="outlook-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6898">Outlook 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6898">Outlook Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6899">**抵禦攻擊的進階防護：** 使用 Office 365 進階威脅防護，您會受到保護，不受電子郵件主旨、附加的郵件、簽署的郵件、網路路徑內超連結的攻擊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6899">**Advanced protection against attack:** With Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection, you're protected against attacks through hyperlinks within email subjects, attached messages, signed messages, network paths, and so on.</span></span>
 
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6900">**搜尋並享受：** 我們對插入圖示新增了搜尋，讓您易於找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6900">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6901">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6901">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="powerpoint-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6902">PowerPoint 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6902">PowerPoint Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6903">**搜尋並享受：** 我們新增了 [搜尋以插入] 圖示，讓您輕鬆找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6903">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6904">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6904">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>
 
 
### <a name="word-feature-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6905">Word 功能更新：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6905">Word Feature updates:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6906">**其他人更快速看到您的變更：** 共同撰寫增強功能表示，共同作業者可較以往更快速看到您的變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6906">**Others see your changes quickly:** Co-authoring improvements mean your collaborators can see your changes faster than ever before.</span></span>
 
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6907">**搜尋並享受：** 我們對插入圖示新增了搜尋，讓您易於找到您要的圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6907">**Search and enjoy:** We've added Search to Insert Icons to make it easy to find the icon you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-6908">而當您選取時，[插入] 按鈕會告知您已經選取的數量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-6908">And when you're selecting, the Insert button tells you how many you've picked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7076">**使用 Power Query 的增強功能快速撰寫程式碼：** 使用自動完成和語法色彩快速完成程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7076">**Code quickly with Power Query enhancements:** Get to code completion quickly with auto-complete and syntax coloring.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7077">同時輕鬆探索函數、資料行和參數</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7077">Easily discover functions, columns, and parameters, too</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7078">**聯結類似欄位上的表格：** 在比較合併表格的欄位時，取得及轉換 (Power Query) 現在具有近似文字比對邏輯 (也稱為模糊比對)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7078">**Join tables on similar columns:** Get & Transform (Power Query) now features approximate text matching logic (also called fuzzy matching) when comparing columns for merging tables.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7079">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7079">Word</span></span>

### <a name="word-excel-powerpoint-and-visio"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7081">Word、Excel、PowerPoint 和 Visio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7081">Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Visio</span></span>

## <a name="june-21-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7099">2019 年 6 月 21 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7099">June 21, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7100">版本 1907 (組建 11815.20002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7100">Version 1907 (build 11815.20002)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7101">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7101">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7102">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7102">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dark-mode-for-black-theme-in-outlook-desktop"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7103">Outlook 電腦版中用於黑色佈景主題的深色模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7103">Dark Mode for Black Theme in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7104">使用深色模式時，黑色佈景主題中的使用者現在也會在讀取電子郵件時看到讀取窗格具有深色背景，並在撰寫電子郵件時擁有深色背景的撰寫體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7104">With dark mode, users in black theme will now also see the reading pane with a dark background when reading emails, and the compose experience with a dark background when writing emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7105">如果使用者想要預覽郵件在淺色背景下的外觀，在讀取窗格或功能區中有太陽/月亮切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7105">There is a sun/moon toggle on the reading pane and in the ribbon in case users want to preview what the message looks like with a light background instead.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7106">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7106">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7107">開啟黑色佈景主題，深色模式預設就會處於開啟狀態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7107">Turn on black theme and dark mode will be on by default.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7108">使用月亮/太陽切換 (在讀取窗格和功能區中) 可為不在深色模式的使用者預覽郵件的外觀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7108">Use the moon/sun toggle (in the reading pane and in the ribbon) to preview what the message looks like for users not in dark mode</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7109">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7109">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7110">在深色模式中讀取電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7110">Read emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7111">如果您無法讀取某些項目，請使用讀取窗格中的太陽切換來切換為淺色背景。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7111">If you are unable to read something, use the sun toggle in the Reading Pane to switch to a light background.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7112">在深色模式中撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7112">Compose emails in dark mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7113">使用功能區中的太陽切換，預覽您的郵件使用淺色背景時的外觀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7113">Preview what your message will look like with a light background by using the sun toggle in the ribbon.</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7114">如果您遇到未正確顯示的任何電子郵件，請將其 (當作附件) 傳送到 OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7114">If you encounter any emails that don't render properly, please send them (as an attachment) to OutlookDarkModeFail@service.microsoft.com</span></span>
 
#### <a name="get-location-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7115">取得位置建議</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7115">Get location suggestions</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7116">開始輸入，Outlook 就會尋找符合的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7116">Start typing and Outlook will look for matching locations.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7117">建立約會和會議時，這適用於 [位置] 欄位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7117">This applies to the Location field when creating Appointments and Meetings.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7118">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7118">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7119">在 Outlook 中的 O365 或 Outlook.com 行事曆上，建立約會或會議。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7119">Create an Appointment or Meeting on an O365 or Outlook.com calendar in Outlook.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7120">按一下 [位置] 欄位，然後開始輸入…</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7120">Click into the Location field and start typing…</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7121">可嘗試使用的案例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7121">Scenarios to Try</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7122">當您將會議室加入至會議時，按一下 [位置] 欄位，而不是使用會議室尋找工具增益集或通訊錄。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7122">When adding a conference room to a meeting, click into Location field, rather than using Room Finder add-in or Address Book.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7123">若是在公共場所 (如餐廳、咖啡廳，甚至是牙醫診所) 的實體位置進行會議，請嘗試使用新的選擇器找到確切的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7123">For appointments at a physical place with a public location - like a restaurant, coffee shop, or even your dentist's office - try finding the exact location using the new picker.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7124">如此一來，您將可以在該離開時，收到 Outlook Mobile 的通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7124">This way, you'll be able to get notified on Outlook Mobile when it's time to leave.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7125">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7125">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="all"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7126">全部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7126">All</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7130">我們已修正貼到新文件的文字，有時候文字對齊可能會不正確的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7130">We fixed an issue where text pasted into a new document could sometimes have the wrong text alignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7131">我們已修正將使用者的電腦暫停之後，可能防止部分使用者儲存變更的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7131">We fixed an issue which could prevent some users from saving changes after suspending their computer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7132">我們已修正在某些情況下會列印整份文件，而非所選範圍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7132">We fixed an issue where in certain cases an entire document would be printed instead of the selected range</span></span>

### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7137">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7137">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7138">我們已修正有時候可能難以查看鍵盤焦點的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7138">We fixed an issue where keyboard focus could sometimes be difficult to see</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7139">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7139">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7140">我們已修正不正確地將未啟用的增益集顯示為已啟用的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7140">We fixed an issue which could incorrectly display an add-in as being enabled when it was not.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7141">我們已修正會在有大量原則時，使得客戶無法檢視所有保留原則的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7141">We fixed an issue which would prevent a customer from viewing all retention policies if there were a large number of them</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7142">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7142">Access</span></span>

## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7148">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7148">Notable Fixes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7150">我們已修正了儲存到 OneDrive 時，使用者可能無法登入的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7150">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from signing in when saving to OneDrive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7151">我們已修正了使用者可能無法變更限制存取模式中之 SharePoint 內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7151">We fixed an issue where a user could be prevented from changing SharePoint properties while in restricted access mode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7152">我們已修正了調整邊界時，可能會變更頁首及頁尾內容的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7152">We fixed an issue where header and footer content could change when adjusting margins</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7153">我們已修正了切換成網頁檢視時，格式設定可能會中斷的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7153">We fixed an issue where formatting could break when switching to web view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7154">我們已修正了從 SharePoint 開啟時，使用者無法使用自訂欄位的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7154">We fixed an issue which could prevent a user from using custom fields when opened from SharePoint</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7155">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7155">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7156">我們已修正了刪除篩選集之資料列時的效能問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7156">We fixed a performance issue when deleting rows of a filtered set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7157">我們已修正了有時可能會造成滑鼠在受保護檢視模式中閃爍的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7157">We fixed an issue which could sometimes cause the mouse to flicker in protected view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7158">我們修正了刪除系列時，可能會導致當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7158">We fixed an issue which could have caused a crash when deleting a series</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7159">我們已修正了某些使用者即使在沒有提供的情況下，仍舊有新增版本歷程記錄之選項的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7159">We fixed an issue where some users would have the option to add version history when that was not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7160">我們已修正了使用試算表比較工具時，可能導致例外狀況的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7160">We fixed an issue which could have caused an exception when using the Spreadsheet Compare tool</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7161">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7161">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7162">我們已修正了按一下連結到 SharePoint 時，可能會發生當機的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7162">We fixed an issue where a crash could occur when clicking a link to SharePoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7163">我們已修正了使用 Surface 手寫筆輸入時，可能將使用者切換到下一個頁面的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7163">We fixed an issue which could switch the user to the next page while typing using a Surface Pen</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7164">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7164">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7165">我們已修正了在某些情況下 [收件者] 欄位大於正常的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7165">We fixed an issue where in some cases the To field was larger than normal</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7166">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7166">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7167">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7167">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7168">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7168">Project</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7176">我們已修正在 Adobe Illustrator 中所建立之向量影像無法正確顯示的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7176">We fixed an issue where vector-based images created in Adobe Illustrator would not display correctly</span></span>

## <a name="may-31-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7189">2019 年 5 月 31 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7189">May 31, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7190">版本 1906 (組建 11722.20008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7190">Version 1906 (build 11722.20008)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7191">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7191">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7192">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7192">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dialog-for-contacting-support-now-is-dockable-and-appears-on-the-right"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7193">[連絡支援人員] 對話方塊現在可停駐，且會顯示在右側</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7193">Dialog for Contacting Support now is dockable and appears on the right</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7194">用於 [連絡支援人員] 的對話方塊現在會顯示在右側窗格中，並且會以停駐視窗形式開始。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7194">The dialog used for Contacting support will now appear in a pane on the right and will start off as a docked window.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="ink-in-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7195">在您的電子郵件中使用筆跡！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7195">Ink in Your Email!</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7196">您現在可以在您的 Outlook 電子郵件中繪製圖片並加上註釋。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7196">You can now draw and annotate pictures in your Outlook emails.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7197">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7197">Word</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-document-links-in-word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7198">在 Word 中開啟文件連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7198">Open document links in Word</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7199">當您在 Office 中按一下文件連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 Word App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7199">When you click a document link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the Word app by default.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7200">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7200">To update your preference go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7201">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7201">Learn more: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7202">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7202">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7203">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7203">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7204">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7204">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7205">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7205">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7206">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7206">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7207">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7207">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7208">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7208">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7209">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7209">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7210">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 Word 文件的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7210">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link tot a Word document stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7211">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7211">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7212">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7212">PowerPoint</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-presentation-links-in-powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7213">在 PowerPoint 中開啟簡報連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7213">Open presentation links in PowerPoint</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7214">當您在 Office 中按一下連結連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 PowerPoint App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7214">When you click a presentation link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the PowerPoint app by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7215">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7215">To update your preference go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7216">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7216">Learn more: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7217">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7217">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7218">此功能將預設為關閉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7218">Feature will default to off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7219">使用者可以透過 [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理] 設定來開啟它，也可以在 Win32 WXP 應用程式帶他們進行選擇加入體驗時選擇加入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7219">Users can either turn it on via Options->Advanced->Link Handling setting, or they can opt-in when Win32 WXP apps take them through an opt-in experience.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7220">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7220">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7221">若要變更此預設值，使用者可以更新 Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint 中的下列設定：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7221">To change this default, users can update the following setting in Outlook/Word/Excel/PowerPoint:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7222">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7222">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7223">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7223">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7224">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7224">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7225">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 PowerPoint 簡報的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7225">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link to a PowerPoint presentation stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7226">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7226">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7227">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7227">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="open-workbook-links-in-excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7228">在 Excel 中開啟活頁簿連結</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7228">Open workbook links in Excel</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7229">當您在 Office 中按一下活頁簿連結時，您可以更新您的喜好設定，以預設在 Excel App 中開啟該連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7229">When you click a workbook link in Office, you can update your preference to open in the Excel app by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7230">若要更新您的喜好設定，請移至 [檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7230">To update your preference, go to File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7231">深入了解：https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7231">Learn More: https://support.office.com/article/open-file-links-directly-in-office-desktop-apps-fe241745-9e05-4142-9ba8-1bb1dc044773?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7235">當使用者按一下透過 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 儲存在 OneDrive/商務用 OneDrive/SharePoint 上的 Word/PowerPoint/Excel 檔案時，這些連結依預設會在適當的 Office 應用程式中 (而非瀏覽器中) 開啟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7235">When users click on links to Word/PowerPoint/Excel files stored on OneDrive/OneDrive for Business/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel, these links will open in the appropriate Office application instead of the browser by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7237">[檔案] -> [選項] -> [進階] -> [連結處理]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7237">File->Options->Advanced->Link Handling</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7238">此設定會在 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 之間共用，而且可以在任一應用程式中設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7238">This setting is shared across Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel and can be set in any of these apps.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7240">若要觸發選擇加入體驗 - 從 Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel 開啟儲存在 OneDrive/SharePoint 中 Excel 活頁簿的連結 - 按一下 [在來自 Office Online 的用戶端中開啟] - 在 30 天內執行此動作兩次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7240">To trigger the opt-in experience - Open a link to an Excel workbook stored in OneDrive/SharePoint from Outlook/Word/PowerPoint/Excel - click on Open in Client from Office Online - do this twice in a 30 day window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7241">在您選擇加入之後，依預設會在 Win32 應用程式中啟動連結。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7241">After you opt-in, links will launch in the Win32 apps by default.</span></span>
 
## <a name="notable-fixes"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7242">值得注意的修正：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7242">Notable Fixes:</span></span>
 
### <a name="all"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7243">全部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7243">All</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7244">我們已修正即使在已停用自動儲存的情況下，檔案有時會自動儲存的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7244">We fixed an issue where files could sometimes be auto-saved even when auto-save was disabled</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7245">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7245">Word</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7247">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7247">Excel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7248">我們已修正可能對非作用中篩選器顯示不正確圖示的問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7248">We fixed an issue where an incorrect icon could be displayed for inactive filters</span></span>
 
### <a name="powerpoint"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7249">PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7249">PowerPoint</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7250">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7250">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7251">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7251">Outlook</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7252">我們已修正有些使用者在群組排程檢視中會不正確地顯示為離線的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7252">We fixed an issue where some users would incorrectly appear as Offline in a Group Schedule view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7253">我們已修正可能會防止 SafeLink 剖析包含尾端空格 URL 的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7253">We fixed an issue which prevented SafeLink from parsing a URL with a trailing space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7254">我們已修正會議室在非工作時間外顯示為可用的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7254">We fixed an issue where rooms were displayed as available outside of non-working hours</span></span>
 
### <a name="access"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7255">Access</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7255">Access</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7256">修正多項效能和穩定性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7256">Various performance and stability fixes</span></span>
 
### <a name="project"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7257">Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7257">Project</span></span>

## <a name="may-17-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7280">2019 年 5 月 17 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7280">May 17, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7281">版本 1906 (組建 11708.20006)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7281">Version 1906 (build 11708.20006)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7282">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7282">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7283">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7283">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="user-experience-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7284">使用者體驗更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7284">User Experience Updates</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7285">[即將推出] 中的更新現已發佈，其中包括簡化功能區、資料夾窗格的新版視覺效果、郵件清單，以及讀取窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7285">Updates that have been in Coming Soon are now here, featuring the Simplified Ribbon, and a visual refresh of the folder pane, message list, and reading pane.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7286">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7286">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7287">這些變更會成為新的預設 UI。自 12 月中旬起，即可透過 [即將推出] 開關切換使用這套 UI，協助您徹底發揮生產力</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7287">These change will be part of the new default UI; it has been available behind the Coming Soon switch since mid Dec for 100% prod</span></span>
 
#### <a name="customizable-simplified-ribbon"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7288">自訂簡化功能區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7288">Customizable Simplified Ribbon</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7289">提供輕鬆自訂功能，方便在傳統與 [簡化] 檢視之間切換，以及釘選/取消釘選命令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7289">Easily customizable to switch between classic and Simplified views and pin/unpin commands.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7290">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7290">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7291">使用者可以使用簡化功能區，方法是開啟 [即將推出] (在一開始)，然後按一下功能區中的＞形箭號，即可在傳統的多行功能區與新式的簡化單行功能區之間切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7291">Users can get to the simplified ribbon by turning on Coming Soon (initially) and clicking the chevron in the ribbon to toggle between the classic multi-line ribbon and the new simplified single-line ribbon.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7292">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7292">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7293">從傳統功能區切換到簡化功能區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7293">Switch from Classic ribbon to Simplified ribbon</span></span>
 
#### <a name="pick-your-favorite-action"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7294">挑選您的最愛動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7294">Pick your favorite action</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7295">不使用 [標幟] 和 [刪除] 嗎？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7295">Don't use Flag and Delete?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7296">那麼 [封存] 或 [標示為已讀取] 呢？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7296">How about Archive or Mark as Read?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7297">自訂快速動作功能表，加上您最常使用的命令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7297">Customize the quick action menu with the commands you use most.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7298">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7298">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7299">若要選取 [快速動作]，請以滑鼠右鍵按一下郵件清單中的 [電子郵件]，以顯示內容功能表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7299">To select your Quick Actions, right click on an email in the message list to bring up the Context Menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7300">然後按一下 [設定快速動作...]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7300">Then click "Set Quick Actions..."</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7301">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7301">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7302">將 [標幟] 和 [刪除] 的預設值變更為 [封存]、[移動]、[標示為已讀取] 或 [無]，以便清除郵件清單</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7302">Change the defaults from flag and delete to either archive, move,  mark as read, or none for a cleaner message list</span></span>
 
#### <a name="relaxed-or-tighter-layout-you-choose"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7303">寬鬆或緊密的版面配置？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7303">Relaxed or tighter layout?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7304">由您選擇</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7304">You choose</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7305">若您想讓郵件之間能有更多空間，可以採用「緊密間距」；或者，您也可以採用緊密的版面配置，以便查看更多郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7305">Use Tighter Spacing lets you decide if you want more space between items, or a tighter layout to see more.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7306">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7306">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7307">前往 [檢視] 索引標籤，勾選 [更緊密的間距] 核取方塊。若是使用傳統功能區，該核取方塊位於「郵件」群組內；若是使用簡化功能區，則是位於「目前檢視」設定當中</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7307">View tab, use tighter spacing checkbox - in Messages group for classic ribbon, Current View settings for simplified ribbon</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7308">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7308">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7309">使用 Outlook 在未啟用設定的情況下分類及撰寫電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7309">Use Outlook to triage and write email with and without the setting enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7310">如果開啟 [使用更緊密的間距]，即可讓每個頁面能夠容納得下更多郵件，並讓撰寫表單的控制項更為簡潔。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7310">With Use tighter spacing on, more messages fit per page, and controls on the compose forms are more streamlined.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="dedupe-mru-entries-when-using-the-onedrive-sync-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7311">使用 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端時的刪除重複資料 MRU 項目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7311">Dedupe MRU entries when using the Onedrive sync client</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7312">透過刪除重複資料 MRU 項目，改善 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端與雲端附件的整合度並加快附加速度，讓其速度足以媲美同步處理資料的複製行為</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7312">Enable better integration with onedrive sync client with cloud attachments by deduping the mru entries and to enable faster attach as copy behavior for synchronized data</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7313">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7313">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7314">若您使用的是 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端，將再也看不到「附加檔案 MRU」的檔案重複項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7314">If you use the OneDrive sync client, you will no longer see file duplicates in the Attach File MRU.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7315">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7315">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7316">啟用 OneDrive 同步處理用戶端，並使用 Outlook 電腦版的 [附加檔案] 功能表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7316">Enable the OneDrive sync client and use the Attach File menu in Outlook Desktop</span></span>
 
#### <a name="improved-shared-folder-synchronization-for-mailboxes-with-many-folders"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7317">已改善擁有多個資料夾的信箱共用資料夾同步處理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7317">Improved shared folder synchronization for mailboxes with many folders</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7318">Outlook 多年來在同步共用信箱時，其資料夾的數量限制最多為 500 個。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7318">For years Outlook has been limited to a maximum of 500 folders when synchronizing shared mailboxes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7319">透過這項變更已讓 Outlook 獲得改善，您在同步時將不會再遇到這 500 個資料夾的數量限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7319">With this change Outlook has been improved to sync in a way that will no longer encounter this 500 folder limit.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7320">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7320">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7321">在信箱中新增 1000 個資料夾、讓其他人存取信箱、新增「其他人」的 Outlook 設定檔，然後確認同步處理是否可正常運作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7321">Create 1000 folders in a mailbox, give someone else access to the mailbox, create an Outlook profile for the "someone else" and verify that sync works.</span></span>

Select the Eraser dropdown.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7326">選擇 [小型橡皮擦] 或 [中型橡皮擦]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7326">Choose Small Eraser or Medium Eraser.</span></span>

Select a pen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7329">畫出一道筆跡線條。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7329">Draw an ink stroke.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7330">選取 [橡皮擦] 下拉式清單。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7330">Select the Eraser dropdown.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7331">選擇 [小型橡皮擦] 或 [中型橡皮擦]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7331">Choose Small Eraser or Medium Eraser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7332">清除一小塊的筆跡線條。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7332">Erase just bits of the ink stroke.</span></span>

### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7398">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7398">Outlook</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7399">**共用行事曆更新的速度更快：** 針對 Office 365 中的共用行事曆，Outlook 可以使用 REST API 更新這些行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7399">**Shared calendar updates just got faster:** For shared calendars in Office 365, Outlook can update these calendars using the REST API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7400">開啟預覽以更快且更可靠地更新共用行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7400">Turn on the preview for faster and more reliable updates to shared calendars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7403">改善共同撰寫的體驗，盡可能讓其他人即時收到修改過的內容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7403">Improved the coauthoring experience by making it more likely that content changes will be received by others in real time.</span></span>
 
### <a name="visio"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7404">Visio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7404">Visio</span></span>

## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7422">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7422">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7423">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7423">Outlook</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7424">**搜尋人員時取得電子郵件建議：** 當您在 [搜尋] 方塊中輸入人員的名稱時，最相關的電子郵件訊息會包括在您的搜尋建議中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7424">**Get email suggestions when you search for a person:** When you type a person's name in the Search box, the most relevant email messages will be included with your search suggestions.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7425">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7425">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="improved-filled-maps-experience-using-data-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7426">使用資料類型改善區域分布圖體驗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7426">Improved Filled Maps experience using Data Types</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7427">此功能是針對使用 Excel 的地理資料類型繪製區域分布圖圖表使用者的增強功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7427">This feature is an improvement for users who plot Filled Map Charts using Excel's Geographic Data Types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7428">對使用者的優點是功能之間有更豐富的整合，以及使用者要對應的區域會有更好的精確度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7428">The benefit to the end users will be richer integration between the features and better accuracy of the region the end user wants to map.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7429">其他優點包括功能能夠對應城市多邊形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7429">Additional benefits include - ability to map city polygons.</span></span>
 
##### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7430">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7430">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7431">此功能是 Excel 內現有功能的增強功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7431">This feature is an improvement to the existing features within Excel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7432">若要使用增強功能，請將位置轉換為豐富的實體，並使用區域分布圖繪製。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7432">To use the improvement - convert locations into Rich Entities and plot with Filled Maps.</span></span> 
 
##### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7433">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7433">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7434">使用者可以嘗試對應城市、省/市、縣/市、國家/地區和郵遞區號。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7434">Users can try mapping cities, states, counties, countries and zip codes.</span></span>

## <a name="april-5-2019"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7482">2019 年 4 月 5 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7482">April 5, 2019</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7483">版本 1904 (組建 11527.20014)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7483">Version 1904 (build 11527.20014)</span></span>
 
## <a name="whats-new"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7484">新功能：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7484">What's New:</span></span>
 
### <a name="outlook"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7485">Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7485">Outlook</span></span>
 
#### <a name="outlook-for-windows--set-and-share-your-focused-inbox-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7486">Windows 版 Outlook：設定並共用您的 [焦點收件匣] 設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7486">Outlook for Windows:  set and share your Focused Inbox settings</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7487">[焦點收件匣] 喜好設定會儲存在雲端內，因此當您在任何電腦上使用 Windows 版 Outlook 和 Outlook 網頁版時，都可以取得相同的一致體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7487">Your Focused Inbox preferences are stored in the cloud so you can enjoy the same consistent experience when using Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web on any computer.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7488">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7488">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7489">在 [檔案] > [選項] > [一般] 索引標籤下，還有一個名為 [將我的 Outlook 設定儲存在雲端中] 的新喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7489">Under File > Options > General tab, there is a new preference for 'Store my Outlook settings in the cloud'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7490">使用者需要核取方塊，才能讓他們的 [焦點收件匣] 設定漫遊到其他電腦的 Outlook 安裝和 OWA。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7490">Users will need to check the box to enable their Focused Inbox setting to roam to other Desktop Outlook installations and OWA.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7491">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7491">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7492">在已開啟雲端設定喜好設定的電腦上變更 [焦點收件匣]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7492">Change Focused Inbox on the machine that has cloud settings preference turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7493">瀏覽至 OWA，然後查看那裡也同樣套用了喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7493">Navigate to OWA and see the preference applied there as well.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7494">在 OWA 變更 [焦點收件匣]，然後啟動電腦版 Outlook 查看已反映喜好設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7494">Change Focused Inbox in OWA and start Desktop Outlook to see the preference reflected.</span></span>
 
### <a name="word"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7495">Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7495">Word</span></span>
 
#### <a name="learning-tools-mode-has-additional-support-for-more-page-colors"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7496">[學習工具] 模式額外支援更多頁面色彩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7496">Learning Tools mode has additional support for more page colors</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7497">Word 中的 [學習工具] 新增更多頁面佈景主題色彩的支援，讓您能夠變更頁面的背景色彩。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7497">Learning Tools in Word adds support for more page theme colors, which allows the changing of the background color of the page.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7498">許多人在背景全白或全黑時閱讀會有困難，因此我們在 PC 版和 Mac 版 Word 中擴大了色彩選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7498">Many people have challenges reading with an all-white or all-black background, so we've expanded the choice of colors in Word on PC and Mac.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7499">快速入門：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7499">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7500">若要試用，請移至 [檢視] 索引標籤，選擇 [學習工具]，然後選擇 [頁面色彩]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7500">To try this out, go to the View tab and choose Learning Tools, and then Page Color.</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7501">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7501">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7502">若要試用，請移至 [檢視] 索引標籤，選擇 [學習工具]，然後選擇 [頁面色彩]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7502">To try this out, go to the View tab and choose Learning Tools, and then Page Color.</span></span>
 
### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7503">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7503">Excel</span></span>
 
#### <a name="elevate-creativity-with-animated-3d-models"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7504">以具備動畫效果的 3D 模型提高創意</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7504">Elevate Creativity with Animated 3D Models</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7505">Office 現在支援動畫模型，這類模型能在編輯器中播放，讓您的試算表更生動！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7505">Office now supports animated models, which will playback in the editor so you can bring your sheets to life!</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7506">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7506">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7507">開啟 Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7507">Open Excel</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7508">插入具備動畫效果的 3D 模型 (很快會進到 Remix，但現在請在此位置存取動畫模型：\\osan\ogx\Public\TestFiles\3D Models\Animated3D\C3Art)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7508">Insert an animated 3D Model (coming to Remix soon, but for now, access animated models here: \\osan\ogx\Public\TestFiles\3D Models\Animated3D\C3Art)</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7509">動畫模型會在編輯器中播放！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7509">The animated model will play in the editor!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7510">[檢查投影片放映] 模式 - 動畫模型也會在那裡播放！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7510">Check Slideshow mode - it will play there too!</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7511">在 3D 格式功能區中，探索模型中更多的動畫場景</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7511">In the 3D Format Ribbon, explore more animation scenes in the model</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7512">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7512">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
1. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7513">插入動畫模型，然後看它在編輯器中播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7513">Insert an animated model and watch it play in the editor</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7514">透過 3D 格式功能區中的 [場景庫]，探索動畫模型中可用的動畫場景</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7514">Explore the animation scenes available in the animated model via the Scenes Gallery, available in the 3D Format Ribbon</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7515">透過功能區、浮動工具列或空格鍵輕鬆地播放/暫停動畫</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7515">Easily play/pause the animation via the ribbon, floatie or space bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7544">版本 1904 (組建 11514.20004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7544">Version 1904 (build 11514.20004)</span></span>
 
## <a name="new-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7545">新功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7545">New Features</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7546">**隱私權控制：** 用於診斷資料和連線體驗的新增、更新及改良的控制項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7546">**Privacy controls:** New, updated, and improved controls for diagnostic data and connected experiences.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7547">深入了解 <https://docs.microsoft.com/DeployOffice/privacy/overview-privacy-controls?toc=/deployoffice/toc.json></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7547">Learn more <https://docs.microsoft.com/DeployOffice/privacy/overview-privacy-controls?toc=/deployoffice/toc.json></span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7548">**Office 圖示有新的外觀：** Office 圖示經過重新設計，以反映簡單、功能強大且智慧型的 Office 體驗。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7548">**Office icons have a new look:** The Office icons have been redesigned to reflect simple, powerful, and intelligent Office experiences.</span></span>

### <a name="morph-transition-enhancements---morph-by-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7664">轉化轉場增強效果 - 依名稱轉化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7664">Morph Transition Enhancements - Morph by Name</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7665">選取要轉化的圖形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7665">Specify the shapes you want to morph</span></span>
 
#### <a name="getting-started"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7666">開始使用：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7666">Getting Started:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7667">若要使轉化將兩個物件視為同一個物件，使用者可以使用 [選取窗格] 重新命名圖形。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7667">To get Morph to treat two objects as the same object, the user can rename the shapes using the Selection Pane.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7668">名稱前面必須加上「!!」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7668">The name must be prefaced with "!!"</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7669">(兩個半形驚嘆號)，轉化才能用來覆寫預設比對行為，例如「!!名稱」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7669">(two exclamation points) for Morph to use it to override our default matching behavior, e.g. "!!Name"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7670">使用者可以繼續將圖形重新命名為不是以「!!」為開頭的任何名稱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7670">Users can continue to rename shapes with any name that doesn't start with "!!"</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7671">不必擔心會變更轉化的運作方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7671">without worrying that it will change the way Morph works</span></span>
 
#### <a name="scenarios-to-try"></a><span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7672">可嘗試使用的案例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7672">Scenarios to Try:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7673">在投影片中插入圖形，讓我們假設是矩形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7673">Insert a Shape in a slide, let's say Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7674">建立新投影片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7674">Create a new slide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7675">在第 2 張投影片中插入不同的圖形，讓我們假設是三角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7675">Insert a different shape in the 2nd slide, let's say Triangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7676">開啟 [選取窗格]，將投影片 1 中的矩形重新命名為「!!圖形」，將投影片 2 中的三角形重新命名為「!!圖形」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7676">Open SelectionPane, rename the Rectangle in slide 1 to "!!shape", and rename the Triangle in slide 2 to "!!shape"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7677">將 [轉化] 套用至第 2 張投影片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7677">Apply Morph on the 2nd slide</span></span>
 
</BR>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7742">我們已修正繪圖畫布中複製/貼上圖形的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7742">We fixed an issue with copy/paste of shapes in a Drawing Canvas</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1d3c6-7745">我們已修正因為檔名大小造成 CSV 檔案儲存為 XLSX 失敗的問題</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1d3c6-7745">We fixed an issue where saving a CSV file as .XLSX was failing due to file name size</span></span>
